## Original SQL:
with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT a.register_no AS patientid, a.inpatient_name AS patientname, a.age, a.sex AS gender, DATE(a.in_date) AS indate, DATE(a.out_date) AS outdate, a.times AS inhospitaltimes, d.type, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN dr.diagnosis_codes END) AS diagnosiscode, o.operation_codes AS operationcode, b.total_cost AS medicalcost, a.person_type AS persontype, 'doctor' AS entrymode, a.patient_no AS serialno, 'remind' AS defaulttab, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes END) AS chinesediagnosiscode, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_names END) AS chinesediagnosename, a.current_dept_code AS deptcode, '440100' AS citycode FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY inp_no, visit_id, type ORDER BY CASE WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' THEN 2 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS rn FROM (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_name, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_names FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis WHERE file_visit_type = '2' GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag) AS diagnosis_filtered) dr INNER JOIN his_temp_ip_patient_info a ON dr.rn = 1 AND dr.inp_no = a.register_no AND dr.visit_id = a.times AND DATE(a.out_date) > '2025-01-01' LEFT JOIN his_temp_ip_settle b ON a.register_no = b.register_no AND a.times = b.times LEFT JOIN (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, STRING_AGG(operation_code, ',' ORDER BY operation_no) AS operation_codes FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_operation GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id) o ON a.register_no = o.inp_no AND a.times = o.visit_id CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT dr.type, dr.diagnosis_flag, dr.diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_names WHERE dr.rn = 1) d GROUP BY a.register_no, a.inpatient_name, a.age, a.sex, DATE(a.in_date), DATE(a.out_date), a.times, d.type, o.operation_codes, b.total_cost, a.person_type, a.patient_no, a.current_dept_code ORDER BY DATE(a.out_date) DESC;

  count(DISTINCT MebID) 
FROM 
  m_membermain mm 
WHERE

  AND substring(CreateTime, 1, 10) = '2025-09-02'

{"case_id": "37", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：查询通过 CTE a1 对 FEE_LIST_D 做了大量的聚合（多个 LISTAGG、SUM、MIN 等），并在 a2 中使用 `a1.*` 再做计算和过滤后与 SETL_D_MERGED 连接。实际最终 SELECT 只使用了 a1 中的一部分列（例如 b_fee、min_amt 等列并未被外层查询引用），但由于使用了 `a1.*` 导致这些不必要的列在聚合阶段就被计算/传递，增加了 CPU、内存与 I/O 开销，同时阻止了投影下推优化。建议通过投影下推（在 a1 中仅输出外层实际需要的列，避免 a1.*）来减少中间数据量与聚合成本；同时可考虑在 a1 中下推过滤谓词并为连接列建索引以进一步降低成本。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE FEE_LIST_D (setl_id VARCHAR2(50), MEDINS_LIST_CODG VARCHAR2(100), medins_list_name VARCHAR2(200), hilist_code VARCHAR2(100), hilist_name VARCHAR2(200), MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), CHRGITM_LV_NAME VARCHAR2(50), BILG_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), BILG_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), cnt NUMBER, det_item_fee_sumamt NUMBER(18,2), pric NUMBER(18,4), inscp_amt NUMBER(18,2));", "CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_setl_id ON FEE_LIST_D(setl_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_cnt ON FEE_LIST_D(cnt);", "CREATE TABLE SETL_D_MERGED (setl_id VARCHAR2(50) PRIMARY KEY, fixmedins_code VARCHAR2(50), fixmedins_name VARCHAR2(200), HOSP_LV_NAME VARCHAR2(50), mdtrt_id VARCHAR2(50), ipt_otp_no VARCHAR2(50), psn_no VARCHAR2(50), psn_name VARCHAR2(200), certno VARCHAR2(30), GEND_NAME VARCHAR2(20), brdy DATE, age NUMBER, insu_admdvs VARCHAR2(50), INSUTYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), PSN_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), "with
a1 as (
  select
  setl_id,
  -- 聚合项目信息
  listagg(distinct MEDINS_LIST_CODG, ',') within group (order by MEDINS_LIST_CODG) b_medins_list_codg,
  listagg(distinct medins_list_name, ',') within group (order by medins_list_name) b_medins_list_name,
  listagg(distinct f.hilist_code, ',') within group (order by f.hilist_code) b_hilist_code,
  listagg(distinct hilist_name, ',') within group (order by hilist_name) b_hilist_name,
  listagg(distinct MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME, ',') within group (order by MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME) MED_CHRGITM_TYPE,
  listagg(distinct CHRGITM_LV_NAME, ',') within group (order by CHRGITM_LV_NAME) CHRGITM_LV,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DEPT_NAME) BILG_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DR_NAME) BILG_DR_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DEPT_NAME) ACORD_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DR_NAME) ACORD_DR_NAME,
  -- 统一转换为“日”单位后的总数量
  sum(f.cnt ) as b_cnt,
  -- 总费用
  sum(f.det_item_fee_sumamt) as b_fee,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小单价
  min(f.pric ) as min_pric,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小金额
  min(abs(f.inscp_amt / f.cnt) ) as min_amt
  from FEE_LIST_D f
  -- 关联单位转换系数表
   where f.cnt <> 0
   and f.CHRGITM_LV_NAME in ('甲类','乙类')
  -- 按结算流水号分组
  group by f.setl_id
),
a2 as (
  select a1.*,
  -- 违规数量
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   else 0
  end as break_cnt,
  -- 违规金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_pric * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_fee,
  -- 违规范围内金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_amt * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_amt
  from a1
  -- 关联结算表获取住院天数
  inner join SETL_D_MERGED s on a1.setl_id = s.setl_id
  -- 过滤违规数据
  where a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   and s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0
)

(s.ipt_days * 12 + 24)) * (a1.min_amt * 1) ELSE 0 END AS break_amt FROM a1 INNER JOIN SETL_D_MERGED s ON a1.setl_id = s.setl_id AND s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0 AND a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days * 12 + 24) ) SELECT s.fixmedins_code, s.fixmedins_name, s.HOSP_LV_NAME, s.setl_id, s.mdtrt_id, s.ipt_otp_no, s.psn_no, s.psn_name, s.certno, s.GEND_NAME, s.brdy, s.age, s.insu_admdvs, s.INSUTYPE_NAME, s.PSN_TYPE_NAME, s.SP_PSN_TYPE_NAME, s.med_type_name, s.PAY_LOC_NAME, s.setl_time, s.adm_dept_name, s.dscg_dept_name, s.begntime, s.endtime, s.IPT_DAYS, s.chfpdr_name, s.adm_diag_dscr, s.dscg_maindiag_name, s.DIAG_NAME, s.dise_no, s.dise_name, s.OPRN_NAME, s.medfee_sumamt, CONCAT(TO_CHAR(s.pool_prop_selfpay * 100), '%'), s.hifp_pay, s.hifmi_pay, s.maf_pay, s.cvlserv_pay, s.othfund_pay, s.acct_pay, s.cash_payamt, s.fund_pay_sumamt, fl.MED_CHRGITM_TYPE, fl.BILG_DEPT_NAME, fl.BILG_DR_NAME, fl.ACORD_DEPT_NAME, fl.ACORD_DR_NAME, NULL, fl.b_medins_list_codg, fl.b_medins_list_name, fl.b_hilist_code, fl.b_hilist_name, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, fl.b_cnt, fl.min_pric, fl.break_cnt, fl.CHRGITM_LV, fl.break_fee, fl.break_amt, gettcamount(fl.break_amt, s.pool_prop_selfpay, s.hifp_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt), getdbamount(fl.break_amt, s.insutype, s.hifmi_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt), GETMAFAMOUNT(fl.break_amt, s.maf_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt), CASE WHEN SUBSTR(s.INSU_ADMDVS, 1, 4) != '{pool_no}' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END, 'CB_0020', '超标准收费', '按小时收费的血液净化类诊疗项目（如自动腹膜透析、连续性血液净化等），收费数量超过实际提供的诊疗服务数量。', '《江西省医疗服务价格项目目录（2023年修订版）》中血液净化类诊疗项目收费的真实性。' FROM SETL_D_MERGED s INNER JOIN a2 fl ON s.setl_id = fl.setl_id WHERE s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0

{"case_id": "38", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：该查询在 HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(B) 上有多重等值过滤（BU_ID、HAC_ID、KEY_STATION_ID 列和 MFG_PROCESS_ID、DEL_FLAG），并且在主表 P 上按 WORK_DATE 与 DEL_FLAG 进行筛选，同时包含一个关联的 EXISTS 子查询来确认员工在对应站点的有效执照记录。潜在性能问题包括：1) 如果用于比较的列与字面量类型不匹配（例如 WORK_DATE 字段若为 VARCHAR 则与 DATE 常量比较会发生隐式类型转换），会导致索引失效；2) 缺少覆盖这些谓词和关联列的复合索引，会使得优化器采用全表扫描或大量回表，增加 I/O；3) EXISTS 子查询使用逗号分隔的老式连接写法（F, H）且为相关子查询，会导致对每一行执行索引查找/范围扫描，若 H/F 没有在 (EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID) 与 (LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID) 上建立合适索引，会产生大量随机 I/O。建议：确认 WORK_DATE/相关列数据类型与谓词匹配以避免隐式转换；为 B 表建立复合索引覆盖 (BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG) 或拆分为多个选择性索引；为 P 表建立 (WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO) 索引以支持主谓词和后续关联；为 R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T 与 R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T 分别建立针对 (EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG) 与 (LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID, DEL_FLAG) 的索引；将 EXISTS 子查询改写为显式 JOIN 或至少使用关联索引以减少对每行的重复查找。同时建议将高选择性谓词（如 P.DEL_FLAG=0、B.DEL_FLAG=0、B.BU_ID 等）尽量作为最先评估的过滤条件，降低后续关联数据量。", "difficulty_level": "2", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_NAME_ENG VARCHAR2(200), BU_ID NUMBER, HAC_ID NUMBER, KEY_STATION_ID NUMBER, MFG_PROCESS_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL ON HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, WORK_DATE DATE, DEL_FLAG NUMBER, HWT_TYPE_ID NUMBER, LINE_ID NUMBER, STATION_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T(WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, LICENSE_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50), LOSE_FLAG NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T(EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T (LICENSE_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_STATION ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T(LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID, DEL_FLAG);"], "sql": "SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID,   --班別ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (P.HWT_TYPE_ID) SHIFT,   --班別
  B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID,   --機種ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME,  --機種名稱
  P.LINE_ID,  --線體ID
  GET_LOCATION_INFO (P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME,  --線體名稱
  P.STATION_ID,  --工站ID
  B.STATION_NAME_ENG,   --工站名稱
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.KEY_STATION_ID) KEY_STATION_TYPE,  --工站類型
  P.EMP_NO
  --,P.CONFIRM_FLAG, --確認狀態
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P
  -- 使用INNER,以便只要 同時符合預排配和工站基礎資訊的
  INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B
  ON  P.STATION_ID = B.ID
  AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND B.BU_ID = 245346  --iPad
  AND B.HAC_ID = 7137  --CD
  AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131)   --K/K+/K++
  AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185  --製程為Mainline
   WHERE  P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04'
  AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0
  -- 確認該員工有對應的「有效執照+在職」鑰匙站記錄（仍需站點一致）
  AND EXISTS
   (SELECT 1
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F,
  HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H
   WHERE  H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID
  AND H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO
  AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078
  AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT	120	200	16000	8000	40
1	  NESTED LOOPS	120	200	16000	8000	40
2	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL	10	200	8000	1000	5
3	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID C_BASE_STATION_T	30	200	8000	2000	10
4	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE	20	200	2000	1000	5
5	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T	70	200	8000	5000	20
6	   FILTER (P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04' AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0)	---	---	---	---	---
7	   NESTED LOOPS (correlated) -- EXISTS subquery	20	200	4000	2000	5
8	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE (H)	2	1	40	10	1
9	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T	5	1	40	20	1
10	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_STATION (F)	5	2	80	20	1
11	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T	8	2	80	30	1
12	  FILTER (EXISTS-subquery conditions applied per outer row)	---	---	---	---	---"}
case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_NAME_ENG VARCHAR2(200), BU_ID NUMBER, HAC_ID NUMBER, KEY_STATION_ID NUMBER, MFG_PROCESS_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);
CREATE INDEX IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL ON HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, WORK_DATE DATE, DEL_FLAG NUMBER, HWT_TYPE_ID NUMBER, LINE_ID NUMBER, STATION_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50));
CREATE INDEX IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T(WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, LICENSE_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50), LOSE_FLAG NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);
CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T(EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T (LICENSE_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);
CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_STATION ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T(LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID, DEL_FLAG);

## Explain Output in JSON:
ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT	120	200	16000	8000	40
1	  NESTED LOOPS	120	200	16000	8000	40
2	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL	10	200	8000	1000	5
3	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID C_BASE_STATION_T	30	200	8000	2000	10
4	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE	20	200	2000	1000	5
5	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T	70	200	8000	5000	20
6	   FILTER (P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04' AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0)	---	---	---	---	---
7	   NESTED LOOPS (correlated) -- EXISTS subquery	20	200	4000	2000	5
8	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE (H)	2	1	40	10	1
9	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T	5	1	40	20	1
10	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_STATION (F)	5	2	80	20	1
11	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T	8	2	80	30	1
12	  FILTER (EXISTS-subquery conditions applied per outer row)	---	---	---	---	---

## Original SQL:
SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID,   --班別ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (P.HWT_TYPE_ID) SHIFT,   --班別
  B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID,   --機種ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME,  --機種名稱
  P.LINE_ID,  --線體ID
  GET_LOCATION_INFO (P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME,  --線體名稱
  P.STATION_ID,  --工站ID
  B.STATION_NAME_ENG,   --工站名稱
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.KEY_STATION_ID) KEY_STATION_TYPE,  --工站類型
  P.EMP_NO
  --,P.CONFIRM_FLAG, --確認狀態
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P
  -- 使用INNER,以便只要 同時符合預排配和工站基礎資訊的
  INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B
  ON  P.STATION_ID = B.ID
  AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND B.BU_ID = 245346  --iPad
  AND B.HAC_ID = 7137  --CD
  AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131)   --K/K+/K++
  AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185  --製程為Mainline
   WHERE  P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04'
  AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0
  -- 確認該員工有對應的「有效執照+在職」鑰匙站記錄（仍需站點一致）
  AND EXISTS
   (SELECT 1
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F,
  HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H
   WHERE  H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID
  AND H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO
  AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078
  AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(P.HWT_TYPE_ID) AS SHIFT, B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME, P.LINE_ID, GET_LOCATION_INFO(P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME, P.STATION_ID, B.STATION_NAME_ENG, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(B.KEY_STATION_ID) AS KEY_STATION_TYPE, P.EMP_NO FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B ON P.STATION_ID = B.ID AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND B.BU_ID = 245346 AND B.HAC_ID = 7137 AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131) AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185 WHERE P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04' AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H ON H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID WHERE H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078 AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "39", "db_type": "sqlserver", "description": "问题概述：原始查询包含一个全表聚合 + 窗口函数的 CTE（rank_general），多个 LEFT JOIN 与一个 CROSS JOIN(me 子查询)，以及对 otr.otr_consulta 的行级展开 (CROSS APPLY (VALUES ...)) 再做 GROUP BY。性能瓶颈可能来自几处：
1) rank_general 需要对 flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago 做 GROUP BY 并按 SUM 排序再计算 ROW_NUMBER，若无合适索引/预聚合会导致全表扫描与昂贵的排序；
2) me 使用常量筛选但被 CROSS JOIN 到主查，若 me 返回多行会乘扩大外层行数；即使 me 仅返回一行，保留未被外层使用的列会造成不必要的数据传递（可用投影下推移除 proveedor 与 estilo）；
3) otr 子查询对 otr.otr_consulta 做了 VALUES 展开后 GROUP BY，若不把高选择性谓词（c.tienda = 3064）下推，会扫描大量无关行并产生大规模聚合中间结果；
4) 多个 LEFT JOIN（例如 ranking_tda_jerarquia、control_asignacion_matrices）若缺乏覆盖索引，会引发大量回表和随机 I/O。

建议（与实习生给出的规则一致）：
- 进行投影下推：在 me 子查询中移除未被外层用到的列（如 proveedor、estilo），减少中间结果宽度；
- 进行谓词下推：把高选择性条件 c.tienda = 3064 下推至 otr 的扫描/聚合子查询（即 WHERE oc.id_tienda = 3064），显著降低 otr 聚合量；
- 检查并建立必要索引：例如 otr.otr_consulta 上应有 (id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, id_subclase, tipo_articulo) 的复合索引或至少 id_tienda 的索引；catalogos.maestro_estilos 可在 (proveedor, estilo) 建索引；catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia 在 (id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase) 上建索引；clusters.tienda_atributos 在 (centro_comercial, clima, tienda) 建复合/前缀索引；catalogos.tiendas 在 TIENDA 列建主键/索引。 
- 对 rank_general 的全表排序开销敏感时，考虑离线物化/周期维护排名表或限制计算范围（若业务允许）。

在满足语义前提下（确保移除的列确实不被外层引用，且 c.tienda 为强选择性过滤），方式1 的投影与谓词下推是低风险且立即见效的改进；方式2（更激进的提前过滤/LEFT→INNER 等）若要采用需严格验证不会改变结果。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE catalogos.tiendas (TIENDA INT PRIMARY KEY, nombre NVARCHAR(200), tipo CHAR(1), estatus CHAR(1), marca INT, ciudad NVARCHAR(100), estado NVARCHAR(100), m2 DECIMAL(10,2));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_TIPO_MARCA ON catalogos.tiendas(tipo, estatus, marca);", "CREATE TABLE flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, TIENDA INT, MERCANCIASINIVA DECIMAL(18,4), FECHA DATETIME);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_VETAS_TIENDA ON flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago(TIENDA);", "CREATE TABLE clusters.tienda_atributos (tienda INT PRIMARY KEY, centro_comercial INT, clima NVARCHAR(200));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_ATR_CENTRO_CLIMA ON clusters.tienda_atributos(centro_comercial, clima, tienda);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.maestro_estilos (departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, proveedor INT, estilo NVARCHAR(100), tipo_articulo INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_MAESTRO_ESTILOS_PROV_ESTILO ON catalogos.maestro_estilos(proveedor, estilo);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia (id_tienda INT, departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, ranking INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_RJ_IDTIENDA_DEPT ON catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia(id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices (clasificacion INT, matrices_min INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_CAM_CLASIFICACION ON catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices(clasificacion);", "CREATE TABLE otr.otr_consulta (id_tienda INT, id_departamento INT, id_subdepartamento INT, id_clase INT, id_subclase INT, tipo_articulo INT, mes1_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes2_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes3_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes4_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes5_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes6_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes7_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes8_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes9_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes10_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes11_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes12_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_OTR_ID_TIENDA_FULL ON otr.otr_consulta(id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例"], "sql": ";WITH rank_general AS (
  SELECT 
  ta.TIENDA AS id,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (

  ) AS actual_rank_global
  FROM catalogos.tiendas ta
  LEFT JOIN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago v ON v.TIENDA = ta.TIENDA
  WHERE ta.tipo = 'S' AND estatus = 'A' AND ta.marca = 30
  GROUP BY ta.TIENDA

SELECT 
  rg.actual_rank_global   
  ,t.nombre
  ,vw_r.nombre as regional
  ,vw_s.nombre as supervisor
  ,t.estado
  ,'RUTA' as ruta  ----
  ,t.m2 as tienda_m2

  ,rj.ranking as rank_jerarquia_n4

  ,c.*

LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_supervisores vw_s ON c.tienda = vw_s.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_regionales vw_r ON c.tienda = vw_r.tienda

  WHERE me.proveedor = 1162 AND me.estilo = 'C21031101'

LEFT JOIN catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia rj 
  ON c.tienda = rj.id_tienda
  AND rj.departamento = me.departamento
  AND rj.subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND rj.clase = me.clase
  AND rj.subclase = me.subclase

  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,

  SUM(CASE WHEN n >= MONTH(GETDATE()) THEN ISNULL(val, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS abierto_otr
  FROM otr.otr_consulta oc
  CROSS APPLY (VALUES
  (1,  oc.mes1_compra_adicional),

  oc.id_departamento,

You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE catalogos.tiendas (TIENDA INT PRIMARY KEY, nombre NVARCHAR(200), tipo CHAR(1), estatus CHAR(1), marca INT, ciudad NVARCHAR(100), estado NVARCHAR(100), m2 DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_TIPO_MARCA ON catalogos.tiendas(tipo, estatus, marca);
CREATE TABLE flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, TIENDA INT, MERCANCIASINIVA DECIMAL(18,4), FECHA DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IDX_VETAS_TIENDA ON flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago(TIENDA);
CREATE TABLE clusters.tienda_atributos (tienda INT PRIMARY KEY, centro_comercial INT, clima NVARCHAR(200));
CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_ATR_CENTRO_CLIMA ON clusters.tienda_atributos(centro_comercial, clima, tienda);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.maestro_estilos (departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, proveedor INT, estilo NVARCHAR(100), tipo_articulo INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_MAESTRO_ESTILOS_PROV_ESTILO ON catalogos.maestro_estilos(proveedor, estilo);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia (id_tienda INT, departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, ranking INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_RJ_IDTIENDA_DEPT ON catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia(id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices (clasificacion INT, matrices_min INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_CAM_CLASIFICACION ON catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices(clasificacion);
CREATE TABLE otr.otr_consulta (id_tienda INT, id_departamento INT, id_subdepartamento INT, id_clase INT, id_subclase INT, tipo_articulo INT, mes1_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes2_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes3_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes4_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes5_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes6_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes7_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes8_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes9_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes10_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes11_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes12_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4));
CREATE INDEX IDX_OTR_ID_TIENDA_FULL ON otr.otr_consulta(id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, id_subclase, tipo_articulo);
CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_supervisores AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例
CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_regionales AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例

## Original SQL:
;WITH rank_general AS (
  SELECT 
  ta.TIENDA AS id,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
  ORDER BY SUM(v.MERCANCIASINIVA) DESC
  ) AS actual_rank_global
  FROM catalogos.tiendas ta
  LEFT JOIN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago v ON v.TIENDA = ta.TIENDA
  WHERE ta.tipo = 'S' AND estatus = 'A' AND ta.marca = 30
  GROUP BY ta.TIENDA
) 
SELECT 
  rg.actual_rank_global   
  ,t.nombre
  ,vw_r.nombre as regional
  ,vw_s.nombre as supervisor
  ,t.estado
  ,'RUTA' as ruta  ----
  ,t.m2 as tienda_m2
  ,'TAMAÑO' as tamanio   ----
  ,rj.ranking as rank_jerarquia_n4
  ,t.ciudad
  ,cam.matrices_min as propuesta
  ,otr.abierto_otr as abierto_otr
  ,c.* 
FROM clusters.tienda_atributos c
LEFT JOIN catalogos.tiendas t ON c.tienda = t.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_supervisores vw_s ON c.tienda = vw_s.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_regionales vw_r ON c.tienda = vw_r.tienda
LEFT JOIN rank_general rg ON c.tienda = rg.id
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase, proveedor, estilo, tipo_articulo
  FROM catalogos.maestro_estilos me
  WHERE me.proveedor = 1162 AND me.estilo = 'C21031101'
) me
LEFT JOIN catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia rj 
  ON c.tienda = rj.id_tienda
  AND rj.departamento = me.departamento
  AND rj.subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND rj.clase = me.clase
  AND rj.subclase = me.subclase
LEFT JOIN catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices cam
  ON rj.ranking = cam.clasificacion
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo,
  SUM(CASE WHEN n >= MONTH(GETDATE()) THEN ISNULL(val, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS abierto_otr
  FROM otr.otr_consulta oc
  CROSS APPLY (VALUES
  (1,  oc.mes1_compra_adicional),
  (2,  oc.mes2_compra_adicional),
  (3,  oc.mes3_compra_adicional),
  (4,  oc.mes4_compra_adicional),
  (5,  oc.mes5_compra_adicional),
  (6,  oc.mes6_compra_adicional),
  (7,  oc.mes7_compra_adicional),
  (8,  oc.mes8_compra_adicional),
  (9,  oc.mes9_compra_adicional),
  (10, oc.mes10_compra_adicional),
  (11, oc.mes11_compra_adicional),
  (12, oc.mes12_compra_adicional)
  ) m(n, val)
  GROUP BY
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo
) otr
  ON  otr.id_tienda = c.tienda
  AND otr.id_departamento = me.departamento
  AND otr.id_subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND otr.id_clase = me.clase
  AND otr.id_subclase = me.subclase
  AND otr.tipo_articulo = me.tipo_articulo
WHERE 1=1  AND c.centro_comercial = 1 AND c.clima LIKE '%calor todo el tiempo%' AND c.tienda = 3064

{"case_id": "40", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：此查询包含三层嵌套用于实现基于 ROWNUM 的分页（最内层包含大范围的 SELECT + 多个 LEFT JOIN + 多个标量子查询与函数调用；中间一层再包一层并限制 ROWNUM<=10；最外层再按 rn>0 过滤），导致不必要的视图物化与数据传递开销。主要性能隐患还有：1) 大量标量子查询（例如从 RES_SYS.PUB_MFR、RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE、RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL 等按 ID 查询名称）会对每一行触发独立索引/表访问，开销成倍放大；2) 频繁调用的行级函数（RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA / SF_GET_STAFF_NAME 等）若未缓存，会导致大量 CPU 时间；3) IN 子查询包含 CONNECT BY 的递归层次查询，若不先将其物化为较小集合，会使主表筛选成本增高；4) 宽表 SELECT *（以及许多未必要的列和文本转换）增加了 I/O 与网络传输量。建议：删除最外层冗余的 `where rn > 0` 并把分页逻辑简化；把 `ROWNUM <= 10` 的限制尽量下推或改为 `FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS` / 使用 FIRST_ROWS 优化；将标量子查询改写为 LEFT JOIN（或事先使用单表缓存/物化视图）以避免每行重复访问；为常用的连接/过滤列（ENT_ENTITY.ENTITY_ID、ENT_ROOM.ENTITY_ID、ENT_ENTITY.STATION_CODE、STA_STATION.STATION_CODE/ STATION_ID、STA_APP_INFO.STATION_ID、STA_BIZ_INFO.STATION_CODE、REG_MANAGE.REGION_ID）建立合适索引；对昂贵的行级函数考虑结果缓存或提前物化；对 CONNECT BY 结果先计算并临时表化以减少重复计算。这样可显著减少全表扫描、嵌套循环和重复的随机 I/O。", "difficulty_level": "2", 	B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID,
	B.IS_SHARE,
	B.SHARE_UNIT_ID,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_SPACE_NUM,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_BRAND,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MODEL_DC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_DC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MODEL,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_DC_AC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_SPACE_NUM AS INTEG_CABINET_SPACE_NUM_TEXT,
	EE.RES_FROM_PROJECT_NAME AS RES_FROM_PROJECT_NAME_TEXT,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_ID,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_ID) AS INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_ID_TEXT,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MFR_ID,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MODEL,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS INTEG_CABINET_AC_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.TIME_TO_OVERDUE) AS TIME_TO_OVERDUE_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE WHERE EQP_TYPE_ID=B.MANUAL_IDENT_RESULT_ID AND DELETE_STATE = '0') AS MANUAL_IDENT_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(B.AGENT_MNT_CONTACT) AS AGENT_MNT_CONTACT_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID = 1 THEN '有' WHEN B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID= 0 THEN '无' END AS IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.AIRBLAST_STYLE = 1 THEN '下送风' WHEN B.AIRBLAST_STYLE= 0 THEN '上送风' END AS AIRBLAST_STYLE_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.WNG_STYLE = 1 THEN '上走线' WHEN B.WNG_STYLE= 0 THEN '下走线' END AS WNG_STYLE_STYLE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_SHARE) AS IS_SHARE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.SHARE_UNIT_ID) AS SHARE_UNIT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.AUDIT_FLOW_RESULT_ID) AS AUDIT_FLOW_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.ENT_AUDIT_RESULT_ID) AS ENT_AUDIT_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_OIL_MACH_ROOM) AS IS_OIL_MACH_ROOM_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_HAVE_WALL) AS IS_HAVE_WALL_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.STRUCTURE_ID) AS STRUCTURE_ID_TEXT, 
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.VACANT_CABLE_SEAT) AS VACANT_CABLE_SEAT_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.STATION_ROAD_ID) AS STATION_ROAD_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.DEGREE_ARRIVAL_ID) AS DEGREE_ARRIVAL_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_ARRIVEL) AS IS_ARRIVEL_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_POWER) AS IS_POWER_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.INOUT_MODE) AS INOUT_MODE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_EXPAND_OIL_ROOM) AS IS_EXPAND_OIL_ROOM_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.SECURITY_ENVIRONMENT_ID) AS SECURITY_ENVIRONMENT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.WNG_STYLE) AS WNG_STYLE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.ROOM_GRADE_ID) AS ROOM_GRADE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.CHECK_MODE_ID) AS CHECK_MODE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.BUSINESS_ID) AS BUSINESS_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SUB_BUSINESS_ID) AS SUB_BUSINESS_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.PROP_ID) AS PROP_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.OLD_PROP_ID) AS OLD_PROP_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.PROPERTY_ID) AS PROPERTY_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.ENTITY_STATE_ID) AS ENTITY_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_LOCKED_ID) AS IS_LOCKED_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_FAULT_ID) AS IS_FAULT_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_OVERDUE) AS IS_OVERDUE_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.WARRANTY_GRADE_ID) AS WARRANTY_GRADE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_OUTMAINTENANCE_ID) AS IS_OUTMAINTENANCE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.ASSETS_RECEIVE_TYPE_ID) AS ASSETS_RECEIVE_TYPE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.ENTITY_CREATE_SOURCE_ID) AS ENTITY_CREATE_SOURCE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID) AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.CHECK_RESULT_ID) AS CHECK_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SERVICE_STATE_ID) AS SERVICE_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_MONITOR_ID) AS IS_MONITOR_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.MONITOR_STYLE_ID) AS MONITOR_STYLE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_UPLOAD_PHOTO) AS IS_UPLOAD_PHOTO_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.STORAGE_STATE_ID) AS STORAGE_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_STORAGE) AS IS_STORAGE_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.RES_FROM_PROJBUILDTYPE_ID) AS RES_FROM_PROJBUILDTYPE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SPLIT_MERGE_REASON_ID) AS SPLIT_MERGE_REASON_ID_TEXT,
	EE.SOURCE_RES_NO AS SOURCE_RES_NO_TEXT,
	(SELECT ENTITY_NAME FROM res_entity.ent_entity WHERE ENTITY_ID=EE.ROOM_ID and res_type_id='205' and delete_state='0') AS ROOM_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT RES_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_RES_TYPE WHERE RES_TYPE_ID=EE.RES_TYPE_ID and delete_state='0') AS RES_TYPE_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE WHERE EQP_TYPE_ID=EE.DEV_TYPE_ID and delete_state='0') AS DEV_TYPE_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_MODEL FROM RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL WHERE EQP_MODEL_ID=EE.DEV_MODEL_ID and delete_state='0') AS DEV_MODEL_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_MODEL FROM RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL WHERE EQP_MODEL_ID=EE.OLD_DEV_MODEL_ID and delete_state='0') AS OLD_DEV_MODEL_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.DW_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS DW_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.OLD_DW_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS OLD_DW_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.MNT_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS MNT_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.MODIFY_OP) AS MODIFY_OP_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.CREATE_OP) AS CREATE_OP_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.CHECK_PERSON) AS CHECK_PERSON_TEXT,
	ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID,
	ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID,
	ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID,
	ST.STATION_NAME,
	ST.STATION_NAME AS STATION_ID_TEXT,
	D.APP_REGION_ID,
	(SELECT REGION_NAME FROM res_entity.REG_MANAGE WHERE REGION_ID = D.APP_REGION_ID AND delete_state = '0') AS APP_REGION_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID) AS DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID) AS DISTRICT_REGION_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID) AS DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID) || res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID) || res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID) AS REGION_ID_TEXT 
FROM RES_ENTITY.ENT_ENTITY EE 
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.ENT_ROOM B ON B.ENTITY_ID = EE.ENTITY_ID
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.STA_STATION ST ON ST.STATION_CODE = EE.STATION_CODE  
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.STA_APP_INFO D ON ST.STATION_ID=D.STATION_ID
WHERE EE.DELETE_STATE = '0' AND EE.RES_TYPE_ID=205  
AND EE.STATION_CODE in  (select station_code  from res_entity.sta_biz_info  where  REGION_ID in (  select REGION_ID from res_entity.reg_manage  connect by prior REGION_ID = SUPER_REGION_ID and nvl(delete_state, '0') = '0' start with region_id in ('000102000000000000370100') ) ) 
)t where ROWNUM <= 10) where rn > 0;

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "41", "db_type": "postgresql", "description": "该SQL旨在统计四个不同时间窗口内（过去7、13、25、2小时），各行政区划的'zdjs'指标最大值。存在显著的性能问题：1. **冗余列投影**：最内层查询选取了`zdbh`、`zxjs`等后续聚合不需要的字段，增加了不必要的I/O和内存开销。2. **无效排序**：四个作为JOIN源表的子查询（Derived Table）内部均包含`ORDER BY "zdjs" desc`但无`LIMIT`，这种排序在关联操作中是无意义的，且可能触发额外的排序操作。3. **多层嵌套**：存在冗余的子查询层级，导致生成不必要的临时结果集。优化方向包括移除无效排序、裁剪非必要列以及子查询扁平化。", "difficulty_level": "3", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS WHYJ_SJZL;", "CREATE TABLE WHYJ_SJZL."ds_dm_tqyj_jssk" ("xzqhdm" VARCHAR(50), "zdbh" VARCHAR(50), "zdjs" NUMERIC, "zxjs" NUMERIC, "gxsj" TIMESTAMP);", "CREATE INDEX idx_ds_dm_tqyj_jssk_gxsj ON WHYJ_SJZL."ds_dm_tqyj_jssk"("gxsj");", "CREATE INDEX idx_ds_dm_tqyj_jssk_xzqhdm ON WHYJ_SJZL."ds_dm_tqyj_jssk"("xzqhdm");"], "sql": "select "a"."qh" as "qhmc","d"."zdjs" as "1xszdjs","a"."zdjs" as "6xszdjs","b"."zdjs" as "12xszdjs","c"."zdjs" as "24xszdjs" from
(select 
case substr("xzqhdm",1,6) 
	 when '420102' then '江岸区'
	 when '420103' then '江汉区'
	 when '420104' then '硚口区'
	 when '420105' then '汉阳区'
	 when '420106' then '武昌区'
	 when '420107' then '青山区'
	 when '420111' then '洪山区'

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH region_mapping AS (SELECT '420102' AS code, '江岸区' AS qh UNION ALL SELECT '420103', '江汉区' UNION ALL SELECT '420104', '硚口区' UNION ALL SELECT '420105', '汉阳区' UNION ALL SELECT '420106', '武昌区' UNION ALL SELECT '420107', '青山区' UNION ALL SELECT '420111', '洪山区' UNION ALL SELECT '420112', '东西湖区' UNION ALL SELECT '420113', '汉南区' UNION ALL SELECT '420114', '蔡甸区' UNION ALL SELECT '420115', '江夏区' UNION ALL SELECT '420116', '黄陂区' UNION ALL SELECT '420117', '新洲区'), time_windows AS (SELECT INTERVAL '1 hour' * hours AS offset, label FROM (VALUES (1, '1xszdjs'), (6, '6xszdjs'), (12, '12xszdjs'), (24, '24xszdjs')) AS t(hours, label)), aggregated_data AS (SELECT CASE substr(t.xzqhdm, 1, 6) WHEN '420102' THEN '江岸区' WHEN '420103' THEN '江汉区' WHEN '420104' THEN '硚口区' WHEN '420105' THEN '汉阳区' WHEN '420106' THEN '武昌区' WHEN '420107' THEN '青山区' WHEN '420111' THEN '洪山区' WHEN '420112' THEN '东西湖区' WHEN '420113' THEN '汉南区' WHEN '420114' THEN '蔡甸区' WHEN '420115' THEN '江夏区' WHEN '420116' THEN '黄陂区' WHEN '420117' THEN '新洲区' END AS qh, sum(t.zdjs) AS total_zdjs, t.xzqhdm AS orig_xzqhdm FROM WHYJ_SJZL."ds_dm_tqyj_jssk" t WHERE t."gxsj" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '25' HOUR GROUP BY t.xzqhdm), windowed_sums AS (SELECT qh, max(CASE WHEN offset = INTERVAL '1 hour' THEN total_zdjs END) AS "1xszdjs", max(CASE WHEN offset = INTERVAL '6 hour' THEN total_zdjs END) AS "6xszdjs", max(CASE WHEN offset = INTERVAL '12 hour' THEN total_zdjs END) AS "12xszdjs", max(CASE WHEN offset = INTERVAL '24 hour' THEN total_zdjs END) AS "24xszdjs" FROM aggregated_data a, time_windows w WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WHYJ_SJZL."ds_dm_tqyj_jssk" t WHERE t.xzqhdm = a.orig_xzqhdm AND t."gxsj" >= NOW() - w.offset) GROUP BY qh) SELECT qh AS qhmc, "1xszdjs", "6xszdjs", "12xszdjs", "24xszdjs" FROM windowed_sums ORDER BY "6xszdjs" DESC;

{"case_id": "42", "db_type": "mysql", "description": "该SQL查询存在显著的性能瓶颈，主要体现为：1. **谓词未下推**：核心过滤条件`CUSTOMER_ID`位于最外层，导致内部巨大的UNION ALL派生表（由四部分组成）必须先全量物化及聚合，无法利用索引提前过滤数据。2. **隐式内连接**：对LEFT JOIN表`t_dgm_send_info`的字段进行了`SEND_STATE='70'`的等值过滤，语义上已变为内连接，但写法可能误导优化器或导致低效的执行路径。3. **冗余的聚合与排序**：外层的`GROUP BY temp.MIXED_NO`在业务逻辑上可能是冗余的（子查询已确保唯一性或JOIN关系未导致膨胀），且`HAVING`子句中包含了本应在WHERE中过滤的非聚合条件，导致了不必要的临时表和排序开销。4. **宽表投影**：派生表输出了大量后续未使用的列，增加了内存和I/O负担。", "difficulty_level": "3", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_mpm;", "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_rmm;", "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_qdm;", "CREATE TABLE t_dgm_send_info_detail (SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID INT    v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   SUM(
  IF (
  t_sam_contract_detail.BUY_UNIT = '10',
  -- 单位测试
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * v_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT,
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(t_sam_contract_detail.NUMBER, 1)
  )
   ) AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   v_pre_product_material
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID
  WHERE
   v_pre_product_material.IS_ISSUED = '1'
   AND v_pre_product_material.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.NI36_TAG = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_STATE != '110'
   AND v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60'
   AND NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT
  1
  FROM
  v_pre_product_material v2
  WHERE
  v2.PACKAGE_NO = v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
  OR v2.MATERIAL_NO = v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  GROUP BY
  COALESCE(v2.PACKAGE_NO, v2.MATERIAL_NO)
  HAVING
  SUM(
   CASE
  WHEN IS_ISSUED != '1' THEN 1
  ELSE 0
   END
  ) > 0
   )
  GROUP BY
   COALESCE(
  v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
  v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
   )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '10' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   NULL AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_bdm_column.COLUMN_NAME AS `PSR_ID`,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   1 AS NUMBER,
   t_inm_store_info.NEW_WEIGHT AS `NET_WEIGHT`,
   t_inm_store_info.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_inm_store_info.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID,
   IF (
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH IS NOT NULL
  AND t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH != 0,
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  'C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_inm_store_info ON t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_NO = t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column t_bdm_column ON t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID = t_bdm_column.COLUMN_ID
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '10'
   AND t_inm_store_info.STOCK_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '30' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   t_pre_product_material.NUMBER AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   t_pre_product_material.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_pre_product_material.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STANDARD_ID AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,
   t_pre_product_material.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_pre_product_material ON t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
   OR t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30')
   AND t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.PRODUCT_NAME AS PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   NULL AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   NULL AS GROSS_WT,
   '/' AS STORE_ID,
   '/' AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_scrap.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,

   -- 单位测试
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT * t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_pre_scrap ON t_pre_scrap.SCRAP_INFO_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40'
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO
  ) as temp on temp.MIXED_NO = t_dgm_send_info_detail.MIXED_NO
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store t_rmm_store on t_rmm_store.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location t_rmm_location on t_rmm_location.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard t_qdm_standard on t_qdm_standard.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column t_bdm_column on t_bdm_column.COLUMN_ID = temp.STEEL_GRADE
WHERE
  t_dgm_send_info.SEND_STATE = '70'
  AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401'
group by

having

## Original SQL:
WITH StudentStats AS (
  SELECT 
  s.s_id,
  s.s_name,
  s.s_sex,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sc.c_id) AS course_count,
  AVG(sc.s_score) AS avg_score,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excellent_course_count
  FROM Student s
  JOIN Score sc ON s.s_id = sc.s_id
  GROUP BY s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_sex
  HAVING AVG(sc.s_score) > 80 AND SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2
)
SELECT 
  ss.s_id,
  ss.s_name,
  ss.s_sex,
  ss.course_count,
  ss.avg_score,
  ss.excellent_course_count,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ss.s_sex ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC) AS gender_rank
FROM StudentStats ss
ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC;

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.Optimized SQL: WITH StudentStats AS ( SELECT s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_sex, COUNT(DISTINCT sc.c_id) AS course_count, AVG(sc.s_score) AS avg_score, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excellent_course_count FROM Student s JOIN Score sc ON s.s_id = sc.s_id GROUP BY s.s_id HAVING AVG(sc.s_score) > 80 AND SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2 ) SELECT ss.s_id, ss.s_name, ss.s_sex, ss.course_count, ss.avg_score, ss.excellent_course_count, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ss.s_sex ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC) AS gender_rank FROM StudentStats ss ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC;

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH ranking_products AS ( SELECT o.user_id, p.product_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY o.user_id ORDER BY SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)) DESC) AS rank_num FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id GROUP BY o.user_id, p.product_name ), top_filtered AS ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT product_name ORDER BY product_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS top_products FROM ranking_products WHERE rank_num <= 3 GROUP BY user_id ) SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS total_orders, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS total_spent, COALESCE(AVG(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS avg_order_value, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date, tf.top_products FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN top_filtered tf ON tf.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.status = 'active' AND o.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) GROUP BY u.user_id, u.username HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 0 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

model_answer.original: select *  from ( select base.vehicle_type, base.booking_status, base.payment_method, base.ride_distance, coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0) as rate,  row_number() over(partition by base.vehicle_type order by abs(coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0)) desc ) as rank_num  from ride_bookings base  left join (  select vehicle_type, booking_status,payment_method,coalesce(avg(ride_distance), 0) as avg_v  from ride_bookings   group by vehicle_type, booking_status,payment_method ) avg_cust_rate  on base.vehicle_type = avg_cust_rate.vehicle_type and base.booking_status = avg_cust_rate.booking_status and base.payment_method = avg_cust_rate.payment_method   where abs(coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0)) >= 1  ) fn  where rank_num <=5;
model_answer.optimized: WITH avg_cust_rate AS (SELECT vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method, COALESCE(AVG(ride_distance), 0) AS avg_v FROM ride_bookings GROUP BY vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method), ranked AS (SELECT base.vehicle_type, base.booking_status, base.payment_method, base.ride_distance, (COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) AS rate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY base.vehicle_type ORDER BY ABS(COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) DESC, id) AS rank_num FROM ride_bookings base LEFT JOIN avg_cust_rate av ON base.vehicle_type = av.vehicle_type AND base.booking_status = av.booking_status AND base.payment_method = av.payment_method WHERE ABS(COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) >= 1) SELECT vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method, ride_distance, rate FROM ranked WHERE rank_num <= 5;

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH customer_summary AS (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) AS total_bookings, SUM(booking_value) AS total_revenue, AVG(driver_rating) AS avg_driver_rating, MAX(booking_date) AS last_booking_date FROM ride_bookings WHERE booking_status IN ('Completed', 'Cancelled', 'No Show') AND booking_date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) > 10) SELECT customer_id, total_bookings, total_revenue, avg_driver_rating, last_booking_date FROM customer_summary ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, avg_driver_rating ASC;

`purchase`）输出了大量外部查询不需要的列（如`AUDIT_STATUS`、`NEW_HOUSE_ID`、`PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE`等）。这导致中间结果集（临时表）宽度过大，显著增加了内存消耗和I/O开销。2. **子查询效率低**：`mo`子查询内部嵌套了分组聚合和IN子查询，且未有效过滤数据。3. **谓词下推机会**：主表`t_mdm_dlr_car_store`的过滤条件`IS_ENABLE='1'`位于WHERE子句，虽然优化器通常处理，但在复杂宽表连接中，显式下推或精简数据源能获得更稳定的执行计划。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE t_mdm_dlr_car_store {"case_id": "50", "db_type": "sqlserver", "description": "该SQL查询用于筛选特定的索赔记录（claim），逻辑上包含复杂的`OR`条件关联查询和用于去重的关联子查询。存在的主要性能瓶颈：1. **无输出的JOIN操作**：查询对`serie`表进行了两次LEFT JOIN（分别作为`serie`和`exchange_serie`），但在SELECT列表中并未请求这些表的任何字段，仅用于WHERE子句的过滤。这种写法增加了不必要的连接开销。2. **谓词未下推**：WHERE子句中包含跨表的`OR`逻辑 `(A AND B) OR (C AND D)`，这通常阻止优化器有效地利用索引进行过滤，导致优化器可能选择扫描整个`claim`表后再进行过滤，而不是先通过索引定位。3. **昂贵的关联子查询**：为了保留每个`claim_folder_id`下的最新记录，使用了关联子查询 `c.id = (SELECT MAX(...) ...)`，这会导致对每一行结果都执行一次子查询（N+1问题），在数据量大时性能急剧下降。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE claim (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000), claim_folder_id int, repair_date datetime, claim_status_id int, is_e2e bit, serie_id int, exchange_serie_id int, serial_number nvarchar(4000), production_code nvarchar(4000), exchange_serial_number nvarchar(4000), exchange_production_code nvarchar(4000));", "CREATE TABLE serie (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000));", "CREATE INDEX idx_claim_folder ON claim(claim_folder_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_claim_serial ON claim(serial_number);", "CREATE INDEX idx_serie_sap ON serie(sap_code);"], "sql": "SELECT c.id, 
   c.sap_code, 
   c.claim_folder_id, 
   DATEDIFF(day, c.repair_date, GETDATE()) AS DATE_REPAIR_DIFF, 
   c.claim_status_id AS status, 
   c.is_e2e AS e2e 
FROM claim c 
LEFT JOIN serie 
ON serie.id = c.serie_id 
LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie 
ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id 
WHERE ( ((serie.sap_code = @P0 
OR serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P1)) 
AND c.serial_number = @P2 
AND c.production_code = @P3) 
OR ((exchange_serie.sap_code = @P4 
OR exchange_serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P5)) 
AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6 
AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7) ) 
AND (c.serial_number NOT IN (@P8) 
AND c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)) 
AND c.id = 
   (
   SELECT MAX(c2.id) 
   FROM claim c2 
   WHERE c2.claim_folder_id = c.claim_folder_id 
   OR (c.claim_folder_id IS NULL 
  AND c2.id = c.id)
   ) 
ORDER BY c.id DESC

*/
(@P0 nvarchar(4000),@P1 nvarchar(4000),@P2 nvarchar(4000),@P3 nvarchar(4000),@P4 nvarchar(4000),@P5 
nvarchar(4000),@P6 nvarchar(4000),@P7 nvarchar(4000),@P8 nvarchar(4000),@P9 nvarchar(4000),@P10  
nvarchar(4000),@P11 nvarchar(4000)) 
/* BEGIN ACTIVE SECTION (comment inserted by DPA) */  
SELECT c.id,  
   c.sap_code,  
   c.claim_folder_id,  
   DATEDIFF(day, c.repair_date, GETDATE()) AS DATE_REPAIR_DIFF,  
   c.claim_status_id AS status,  
   c.is_e2e AS e2e  
FROM claim c  
LEFT JOIN serie  
ON serie.id = c.serie_id  
LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie  
ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id  
WHERE ( ((serie.sap_code = @P0  
OR serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P1))  
AND c.serial_number = @P2  
AND c.production_code = @P3)  
OR ((exchange_serie.sap_code = @P4  
OR exchange_serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P5))  
AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6  
AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7) )  
AND (c.serial_number NOT IN (@P8)  
AND c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11))  
AND c.id =  
   ( 
   SELECT MAX(c2.id)  
   FROM claim c2  
   WHERE c2.claim_folder_id = c.claim_folder_id  
   OR (c.claim_folder_id IS NULL  
  AND c2.id = c.id) 
   )  
ORDER BY c.id DESC", "explain": "  |--Sort(ORDER BY:([c].[id] DESC))
       |--Filter(WHERE:([c].[id]=[Expr1009]))
            |--Nested Loops(Left Outer Join, WHERE:(... OR ...))
                 |--Nested Loops(Left Outer Join, WHERE:(...))
                 |    |--Table Scan(OBJECT:([claim] AS [c]), WHERE:([c].[serial_number] NOT IN (@P8) AND [c].[production_code] NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)))
                 |    |--Index Seek(OBJECT:([serie] AS [serie]), SEEK:([serie].[id]=[c].[serie_id]))
                 |--Index Seek(OBJECT:([serie] AS [exchange_serie]), SEEK:([exchange_serie].[id]=[c].[exchange_serie_id]))
            |--Stream Aggregate(DEFINE:([Expr1009]=MAX([c2].[id])))
                 |--Index Seek(OBJECT:([claim] AS [c2]), SEEK:([c2].[claim_folder_id]=[c].[claim_folder_id]))"}

CREATE TABLE claim (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000), claim_folder_id int, repair_date datetime, claim_status_id int, is_e2e bit, serie_id int, exchange_serie_id int, serial_number nvarchar(4000), production_code nvarchar(4000), exchange_serial_number nvarchar(4000), exchange_production_code nvarchar(4000));
CREATE TABLE serie (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000));
CREATE INDEX idx_claim_folder ON claim(claim_folder_id);

   ) 
ORDER BY c.id DESC

nvarchar(4000),@P6 nvarchar(4000),@P7 nvarchar(4000),@P8 nvarchar(4000),@P9 nvarchar(4000),@P10  
nvarchar(4000),@P11 nvarchar(4000)) 
/* BEGIN ACTIVE SECTION (comment inserted by DPA) */  
SELECT c.id,

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT c.id, c.sap_code, c.claim_folder_id, DATEDIFF(day, c.repair_date, GETDATE()) AS DATE_REPAIR_DIFF, c.claim_status_id AS status, c.is_e2e AS e2e FROM claim c INNER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN claim_folder_id IS NULL THEN id ELSE MAX(id) OVER (PARTITION BY claim_folder_id) END AS max_id FROM claim) AS latest ON c.id = latest.max_id LEFT JOIN serie ON serie.id = c.serie_id LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id WHERE ((serie.sap_code IN (@P0, CONCAT('4000', @P1)) AND c.serial_number = @P2 AND c.production_code = @P3) OR (exchange_serie.sap_code IN (@P4, CONCAT('4000', @P5)) AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6 AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7)) AND (c.serial_number <> @P8) AND (c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)) ORDER BY c.id DESC

{"case_id": "21", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "本次改写的核心技术是将score_model_factor表的JOIN转换为EXISTS子查询。原SQL中,虽然JOIN了score_model_factor表,但SELECT子句中并未使用该表的任何列(仅用于过滤),这正是JOIN转EXISTS优化的典型场景。改写后,通过EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM score_model_factor f WHERE f.model_factor_id = t.model_factor_id)实现了相同的语义:只有当SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL.model_factor_id在score_model_factor表中存在时,该行才被保留。EXISTS的优势在于:(1)利用主键索引快速验证;(2)找到第一条匹配记录即返回TRUE,无需扫描所有匹配行;(3)不需要传递score_model_factor的列数据,减少内存和网络开销。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_record_seq; CREATE TABLE SCORE_RATING_RECORD (score_rating_record_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, rpt_dt DATE NOT NULL); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER score_rating_record_bi BEFORE INSERT ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.score_rating_record_id IS NULL THEN SELECT score_rating_record_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.score_rating_record_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_region_record_seq; CREATE TABLE score_rating_region_record (score_rating_region_record_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, score_rating_record_id NUMBER NOT NULL, region_cd VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL); CREATE TABLE SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL (score_rating_record_detail_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, score_rating_region_record_id NUMBER NOT NULL, model_factor_id NUMBER NOT NULL, factor_cd VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, factor_value NUMBER(18,4), option_init VARCHAR2(100)); join SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL t on s.score_rating_region_record_id =t.score_rating_region_record_id

order by s.region_cd , t.factor_cd;

CREATE SEQUENCE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ; CREATE TABLE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_MODEL_ID NUMBER, FD_MODEL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_READ_TIME TIMESTAMP); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_BI BEFORE INSERT ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_name ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_NAME);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_id ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_time ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_READ_TIME);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE (FD_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.FD_ID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.FD_ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_manual_file_id ON MANUAL_FILE(FD_FILE_ID);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_NO VARCHAR2(100), MANUAL_ID NUMBER, IS_DELETED VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT '0'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_manual_id ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(MANUAL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_is_deleted ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(IS_DELETED);
CREATE SEQUENCE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, TYPE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_xmbi_type_id ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO(TYPE_ID);

## Original SQL:
SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (
  SELECT  max(FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID,sum(countNumber) sumNumber ,max(FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM (
  SELECT FD_MODEL_ID,count(1) countNumber from
  SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME= 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND  FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL
  <if test="startDate != null and startDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  <if test="endDate != null and endDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) t LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = t.FD_MODEL_ID
  GROUP BY FD_FILE_ID order by  sumNumber desc ) w
  LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi
  ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID
  left join XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi  ON xmbi.PKID  = mfbi.MANUAL_ID
  <where>
   mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0'
   <if test=" typeIdsByMfId != null  and typeIdsByMfId.size>0">
  and  xmbi.TYPE_ID in
  <foreach collection="typeIdsByMfId" item="typeId" open="(" separator="," close=")">
  #{typeId}
  </foreach>
   </if>
   and rownum <![CDATA[ <= ]]> 10
  </where>

model_answer.optimizedSQL: SELECT /*+ LEADING(s) USE_NL(mf) NO_MERGE(s) */ mfbi.pkid, mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME, mfbi.FD_NO fdNo, w.sumNumber countNumber FROM ( SELECT max(s.FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID, sum(s.countNumber) sumNumber, max(mf.FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT FD_MODEL_ID, count(1) countNumber FROM SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME = 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL AND FD_READ_TIME >= CASE WHEN :startDate IS NOT NULL THEN TO_DATE(:startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE FD_READ_TIME END AND FD_READ_TIME <= CASE WHEN :endDate IS NOT NULL THEN TO_DATE(:endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE FD_READ_TIME END GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) s LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = s.FD_MODEL_ID GROUP BY mf.FD_FILE_ID ORDER BY sumNumber DESC ) w LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi ON xmbi.PKID = mfbi.MANUAL_ID WHERE mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0' AND (:typeIdsByMfId IS NULL OR xmbi.TYPE_ID IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(:typeIdsByMfId))) AND ROWNUM <= 10

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ; CREATE TABLE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_MODEL_ID NUMBER, FD_MODEL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_READ_TIME TIMESTAMP); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_BI BEFORE INSERT ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_name ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_NAME);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_id ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_time ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_READ_TIME);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE (FD_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.FD_ID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.FD_ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_manual_file_id ON MANUAL_FILE(FD_FILE_ID);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_NO VARCHAR2(100), MANUAL_ID NUMBER, IS_DELETED VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT '0'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_manual_id ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(MANUAL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_is_deleted ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(IS_DELETED);
CREATE SEQUENCE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, TYPE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_xmbi_type_id ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO(TYPE_ID);

## Original SQL:
SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (
  SELECT  max(FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID,sum(countNumber) sumNumber ,max(FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM (
  SELECT FD_MODEL_ID,count(1) countNumber from
  SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME= 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND  FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL
  <if test="startDate != null and startDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  <if test="endDate != null and endDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) t LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = t.FD_MODEL_ID
  GROUP BY FD_FILE_ID order by  sumNumber desc ) w
  LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi
  ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID
  left join XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi  ON xmbi.PKID  = mfbi.MANUAL_ID
  <where>
   mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0'
   <if test=" typeIdsByMfId != null  and typeIdsByMfId.size>0">
  and  xmbi.TYPE_ID in
  <foreach collection="typeIdsByMfId" item="typeId" open="(" separator="," close=")">
  #{typeId}
  </foreach>
   </if>
   and rownum <![CDATA[ <= ]]> 10
  </where>

CREATE TABLE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_MODEL_ID NUMBER, FD_MODEL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_READ_TIME TIMESTAMP); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_BI BEFORE INSERT ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_name ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_NAME);", "CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_id ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_ID);", "CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_time ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_READ_TIME);", "CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE (FD_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.FD_ID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.FD_ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_manual_file_id ON MANUAL_FILE(FD_FILE_ID);", "CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_NO VARCHAR2(100), MANUAL_ID NUMBER, IS_DELETED VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT '0'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_manual_id ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(MANUAL_ID);", "CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_is_deleted ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(IS_DELETED);", "CREATE SEQUENCE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, TYPE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_xmbi_type_id ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO(TYPE_ID);"], "sql": "SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (
  SELECT  max(FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID,sum(countNumber) sumNumber ,max(FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM (
  SELECT FD_MODEL_ID,count(1) countNumber from
  SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME= 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND  FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL
  <if test="startDate != null and startDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  <if test="endDate != null and endDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) t LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = t.FD_MODEL_ID
  GROUP BY FD_FILE_ID order by  sumNumber desc ) w
  LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi
  ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID
  left join XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi  ON xmbi.PKID  = mfbi.MANUAL_ID
  <where>
   mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0'
   <if test=" typeIdsByMfId != null  and typeIdsByMfId.size>0">
  and  xmbi.TYPE_ID in
  <foreach collection="typeIdsByMfId" item="typeId" open="(" separator="," close=")">
  #{typeId}
  </foreach>
   </if>
   and rownum <![CDATA[ <= ]]> 10
  </where>", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT  	101	10	670	32701838	100
1	  COUNT STOPKEY 					
2	  NESTED LOOPS  	101	10	670	32701838	100

18	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO	2	1	41	16423	2", "expected": {"optimization_rules": [{"rule_id": "1", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "投影下推,通过投影下推优化，移除了子查询w中未被外部使用的列FD_MODEL_ID。该列在聚合后未传递到外层查询，属于冗余投影。消除该列可减少约30%-50%的临时表内存占用和I/O开销，尤其当数据量大（如10万行以上）时，性能提升更显著。"}, {"rule_id": "2", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "谓词下推,将外层WHERE条件中的mfbi.IS_DELETED='0'下推至子查询，提前过滤MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO表。同时将xmbi.TYPE_ID条件移动到左连接ON子句中，以在连接时过滤XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO表；并为保持语义，在typeIdsByMfId条件存在时添加`xmbi.PKID IS NOT NULL`条件（替代原xmbi.TYPE_ID过滤效果）。这减少了参与连接的数据量，提升了查询效率。"}, {"rule_id": "3", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "没有LIMIT的子查询排序消除,消除子查询w中无用的ORDER BY排序（order by sumNumber desc），因为：1) 子查询作为LEFT JOIN源表且无LIMIT；2) JOIN操作会重新组织数据，使子查询排序失效；3) 移除冗余排序可提升执行效率"}, {"rule_id": "4", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "隐式转换,优化了时间筛选条件中的隐式转换风险：1) 将简化的日期格式改为完整时间戳格式 2) 调整起始时间的比较运算符 3) 消除了Oracle需要补全时间部分的隐式转换开销"}]}}
case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ; CREATE TABLE SYS_READ_HIS_LOG (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_MODEL_ID NUMBER, FD_MODEL_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_READ_TIME TIMESTAMP); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_BI BEFORE INSERT ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT SYS_READ_HIS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_name ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_NAME);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_model_id ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_MODEL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_sys_read_time ON SYS_READ_HIS_LOG(FD_READ_TIME);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE (FD_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.FD_ID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.FD_ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_manual_file_id ON MANUAL_FILE(FD_FILE_ID);
CREATE SEQUENCE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, FD_FILE_NAME VARCHAR2(200), FD_NO VARCHAR2(100), MANUAL_ID NUMBER, IS_DELETED VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT '0'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_manual_id ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(MANUAL_ID);
CREATE INDEX idx_mfbi_is_deleted ON MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO(IS_DELETED);
CREATE SEQUENCE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ; CREATE TABLE XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO (PKID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, TYPE_ID NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_BI BEFORE INSERT ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.PKID IS NULL THEN SELECT XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.PKID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_xmbi_type_id ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO(TYPE_ID);

## Original SQL:
SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (
  SELECT  max(FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID,sum(countNumber) sumNumber ,max(FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM (
  SELECT FD_MODEL_ID,count(1) countNumber from
  SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME= 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND  FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL
  <if test="startDate != null and startDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  <if test="endDate != null and endDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) t LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = t.FD_MODEL_ID
  GROUP BY FD_FILE_ID order by  sumNumber desc ) w
  LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi
  ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID
  left join XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi  ON xmbi.PKID  = mfbi.MANUAL_ID
  <where>
   mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0'
   <if test=" typeIdsByMfId != null  and typeIdsByMfId.size>0">
  and  xmbi.TYPE_ID in
  <foreach collection="typeIdsByMfId" item="typeId" open="(" separator="," close=")">
  #{typeId}
  </foreach>
   </if>
   and rownum <![CDATA[ <= ]]> 10
  </where>

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimizedSQL: SELECT /*+ LEADING(s) USE_NL(mf) NO_MERGE(s) */ mfbi.pkid, mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME, mfbi.FD_NO fdNo, w.sumNumber countNumber FROM ( SELECT max(s.FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID, sum(s.countNumber) sumNumber, max(mf.FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM ( SELECT FD_MODEL_ID, count(1) countNumber FROM SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME = 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL AND FD_READ_TIME >= CASE WHEN :startDate IS NOT NULL THEN TO_DATE(:startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE FD_READ_TIME END AND FD_READ_TIME <= CASE WHEN :endDate IS NOT NULL THEN TO_DATE(:endDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') ELSE FD_READ_TIME END GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) s LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = s.FD_MODEL_ID GROUP BY mf.FD_FILE_ID ORDER BY sumNumber DESC ) w LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi ON xmbi.PKID = mfbi.MANUAL_ID WHERE mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0' AND (:typeIdsByMfId IS NULL OR xmbi.TYPE_ID IN (SELECT column_value FROM TABLE(:typeIdsByMfId))) AND ROWNUM <= 10

{"case_id": "23", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "此次改写将子查询内部的'LEFT JOIN mrtrecordinfo B ON A.ID = B.ID'改为'INNER JOIN'。改写的理论基础是：由于外层查询使用了WHERE A.ID IN (SELECT bid FROM ...)条件，而bid来源于B.ID，这意味着只有B.ID存在的记录才会被选中。因此LEFT JOIN产生的NULL行在后续过滤中会被完全排除，使用INNER JOIN语义上等价且理论上可减少NULL处理开销。然而实际测试显示，Oracle优化器在处理原始LEFT JOIN时已经识别出这种模式并进行了等价优化，导致手动改写未产生实质性能提升。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE mrtopration_seq; CREATE TABLE mrtopration (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, PRAMARYID NUMBER, OPERCODE VARCHAR2(50), OPERNAME VARCHAR2(100), OPERDEPT VARCHAR2(100), OPERDATE DATE NOT NULL, MARK VARCHAR2(500), MARK2 VARCHAR2(500), MARK3 VARCHAR2(500), MARK4 VARCHAR2(500), OPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), NEXTOPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), PREOPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), VALID NUMBER(1), CONFIRMUSER VARCHAR2(100), CONFIRMDEPT VARCHAR2(100), VERSIONNUMBER NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER mrtopration_bi BEFORE INSERT ON mrtopration FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.ID IS NULL THEN SELECT mrtopration_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_mrtopration_operdate ON mrtopration(OPERDATE);", "CREATE INDEX idx_mrtopration_opercode ON mrtopration(OPERCODE);", "CREATE SEQUENCE mrtrecordinfo_seq; CREATE TABLE mrtrecordinfo (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, IN_TIMES NUMBER, NAME VARCHAR2(100), IN_DATE DATE, OUT_DATE DATE, OUT_DEPT VARCHAR2(100), RECORD_STATE VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER mrtrecordinfo_bi BEFORE INSERT ON mrtrecordinfo FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.ID IS NULL THEN SELECT mrtrecordinfo_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_mrtrecordinfo_indate ON mrtrecordinfo(IN_DATE);", "CREATE TABLE mrtrecordregresses (RECODE_NO NUMBER NOT NULL, OPER_DATE DATE NOT NULL, OPERID VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, BACKREASON VARCHAR2(500), CONSTRAINT pk_mrtrecordregresses PRIMARY KEY (RECODE_NO, OPER_DATE, OPERID));"], "sql": "SELECT A.ID AS id, A.PRAMARYID AS primaryId, A.OPERCODE AS operCode, A.OPERNAME AS operName, A.OPERDEPT AS operDept, A.OPERDATE AS operDate, A.MARK AS mark, C.BACKREASON AS mark1, A.MARK2 AS mark2, A.MARK3 AS mark3, A.MARK4 AS mark4, A.OPERTYPE AS operType, A.NEXTOPERTYPE AS nextOperType, A.PREOPERTYPE AS preOperType, A.VALID AS valid, A.CONFIRMUSER AS confirmUser, A.CONFIRMDEPT AS confirmDept, A.VERSIONNUMBER AS versionNumber, B.IN_TIMES AS inTimes, B.NAME AS patient, B.IN_DATE AS inDate, B.OUT_DATE AS outDate, B.OUT_DEPT AS outDept, B.RECORD_STATE AS recordState FROM mrtopration A LEFT JOIN mrtrecordinfo B ON A.ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN mrtrecordregresses C ON B.ID = C.RECODE_NO AND A.OPERDATE = C.OPER_DATE AND A.OPERCODE = C.OPERID WHERE A.ID IN (SELECT bid FROM (SELECT B.ID AS bid, B.IN_DATE AS inDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.IN_DATE DESC) AS rn FROM mrtopration A LEFT JOIN mrtrecordinfo B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE B.ID LIKE :"SYS_B_0" || :1 || :" SYS_B_1" GROUP BY B.ID, B.IN_DATE) WHERE rn BETWEEN :2 + :"SYS_B_2" AND :3 + :4 ) ORDER BY A.OPERDATE DESC", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST

27	   TABLE ACCESS FULL MRTRECORDREGRESSES	1	1	39	9021	1", "expected": {"optimization_rules": [{"rule_id": "1", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "投影下推,在IN子查询内部应用投影下推，移除未使用的inDate列。窗口函数仍使用该列排序但不再物化结果，减少派生表17%的数据体积"}, {"rule_id": "2", "difficulty_level": "3", "rationale": "无输出JOIN转EXISTS / LEFT转INNER,将子查询中的LEFT JOIN改为INNER JOIN，因为B.ID的LIKE过滤和分组已排除NULL记录。主查询保留LEFT JOIN因输出需要C表列且无强过滤条件"}]}}
