select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",
  z.nortran_posn "POSN NO",
  b.nobtran_effective_date "QUERY DATE", 
  b.nobtran_acat_code "ACAT CODE",
  n1.nortran_value "CURRENT HIRE DATE",
  n2.nortran_value "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE",
  n3.nortran_value "SALARY GROUP",
  n4.nortran_value "APPOINTMENT PERCENT",
  n5.nortran_value "ANNUAL SALARY",
  t1.nortern_effective_date "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE",
  t1.nortern_earn_code "PAY DATA EARNINGS",
  t1.nortern_hrs "PAY DATA HOURS",
  t1.nortern_special_rate "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE",
  n6.nortran_value "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE",
  n7.nortran_value "END PERSONNEL DATE"
   ,case b.nobtran_trans_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved'
   when 'C' then 'Completed'
   when 'V' then 'Voided' 
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
   when 'P' then 'Pending'
   when 'W' then 'Waiting'
   when 'T' then 'Partially Completed'
   when 'N' then 'Cancelled'
   when 'U' then 'Superuser Update'
  end trans_status   
  ,case r.norrout_queue_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved by that Approver'
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'F' then 'FYI'
   when 'I' then 'In Queue'
   when 'K' then 'Acknowledged'
   when 'L' then 'Applied by Applier'
   when 'M' then 'More Information'
   when 'O' then 'Overridden'
   when 'P' then 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier '
   when 'Q' then 'Removed from Queue'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
  end queue_status
  ,r.norrout_level_no
  

  from nobtran b,spriden s, norrout r, pebempl pp, /*nbrjobs nbr,*/
  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value
  from nortran nc
   where nc.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE'
  ) n1, /* Current Hire Date */
  (select nb.nortran_transaction_no,nb.nortran_apty_code,nb.nortran_aufd_code,nb.nortran_value

  (select ns.nortran_transaction_no,ns.nortran_apty_code,ns.nortran_aufd_code,ns.nortran_value

  (select na.nortran_transaction_no,na.nortran_apty_code,na.nortran_aufd_code,na.nortran_value
  from nortran na
   where na.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT'
  ) n4, /*Appointment Percent*/ 
  (select nu.nortran_transaction_no,nu.nortran_apty_code,nu.nortran_aufd_code,nu.nortran_value
  from nortran nu
   where nu.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY'
  ) n5, /*Annual Salary*/
  (select nj.nortran_transaction_no,nj.nortran_apty_code,nj.nortran_aufd_code,nj.nortran_value
  from nortran nj
   where nj.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE'  
  and nj.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n6,  /*End Job Effective Date*/
  (select np.nortran_transaction_no,np.nortran_apty_code,np.nortran_aufd_code,np.nortran_value
  from nortran np
   where np.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE'  
  and np.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n7,  /*End Personnel Date*/

  (select t.nortern_transaction_no,t.nortern_effective_date,t.nortern_earn_code,
   t.nortern_hrs, t.nortern_special_rate
  from nortern t) t1 

   ,(select unique zz.nortran_transaction_no,zz.nortran_posn
  from nortran zz
   where zz.nortran_posn is not null
  ) z

 where b.nobtran_acat_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM') /*employee*/
  /*waiting,completed,partially completedc,ancelled,supperuser update */
  /* and nobtran_trans_status_ind in ('W','C','T','U') */
   and b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm
   and s.spriden_change_ind is null
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no(+) /*Pay Data*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Current Hire Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Begin Personnnel Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Salary Group*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Appointment Percent*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Annual Salary*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Job Effective Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Personnel Date*/
   
   and nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no(+)
   --get all queue status
   /*and r.norrout_queue_status_ind = 'A'*/
   and r.norrout_level_no = 90 /* Pending HR approval Queue */
   -- not applied yet
   and b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' /*Applied ePAFs will not be listed*/
   --HR does not care about voided ePAFs
   and nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V'
   --get posn
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no
   and r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A'
  -- exclude student

   and pp.pebempl_ecls_code not in ('RE','FW','GS','MW')

   order by 3

THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Completed' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Voided' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending' WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waiting' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Partially Completed' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Superuser Update' END AS trans_status, CASE r.norrout_queue_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved by that Approver' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FYI' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Queue' WHEN 'K' THEN 'Acknowledged' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Applied by Applier' WHEN 'M' THEN 'More Information' WHEN 'O' THEN 'Overridden' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier ' WHEN 'Q' THEN 'Removed from Queue' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' END AS queue_status, r.norrout_level_no FROM nobtran b INNER JOIN spriden s ON b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm AND s.spriden_change_ind IS NULL INNER JOIN pebempl pp ON s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm INNER JOIN ( SELECT nortran_transaction_no, nortran_posn FROM nortran WHERE nortran_posn IS NOT NULL ) z ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortern t1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortran n1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no AND n1.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n2 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no AND n2.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n3 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no AND n3.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE' LEFT JOIN nortran n4 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no AND n4.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT' LEFT JOIN nortran n5 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no AND n5.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY' LEFT JOIN nortran n6 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no AND n6.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE' AND n6.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN nortran n7 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no AND n7.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' AND n7.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN norrout r ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no AND r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A' AND r.norrout_level_no = 90 WHERE b.nobtran_acat_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') AND b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' AND b.nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V' AND pp.pebempl_ecls_code NOT IN ('RE', 'FW', 'GS', 'MW') ORDER BY 3

{"case_id": "30", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "此改写的核心是将原SQL中针对nortran表的7个独立子查询(n1-n7)和1个去重子查询(z)通过CTE的GROUP BY + MAX + CASE WHEN技术合并。原SQL中每个子查询都有WHERE条件过滤不同的nortran_aufd_code，改写后通过CASE WHEN在单次扫描中同时提取所有需要的字段值，然后用MAX聚合选择每个transaction的值。这种行列转换技术将EAV(Entity-Attribute-Value)模型的多行数据透视为宽表的单行数据。同时，将nobtran的过滤条件前置，减少JOIN时的数据量。这种改写方式在OLAP场景中常用于优化维度属性的多次JOIN。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nobtran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nobtran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nobtran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nobtran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nobtran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_acat_code ON nobtran(nobtran_acat_code);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_pidm ON nobtran(nobtran_pidm);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_transaction_no ON nobtran(nobtran_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_status ON nobtran(nobtran_trans_status_ind);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_apply_ind ON nobtran(nobtran_apply_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE spriden_seq; CREATE TABLE spriden (spriden_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, spriden_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, spriden_last_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, spriden_first_name VARCHAR2(100), spriden_change_ind VARCHAR2(1)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER spriden_bi BEFORE INSERT ON spriden FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.spriden_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT spriden_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.spriden_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);"], "sql": "select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",
  z.nortran_posn "POSN NO",
  b.nobtran_effective_date "QUERY DATE", 
  b.nobtran_acat_code "ACAT CODE",
  n1.nortran_value "CURRENT HIRE DATE",
  n2.nortran_value "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE",
  n3.nortran_value "SALARY GROUP",
  n4.nortran_value "APPOINTMENT PERCENT",
  n5.nortran_value "ANNUAL SALARY",
  t1.nortern_effective_date "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE",
  t1.nortern_earn_code "PAY DATA EARNINGS",
  t1.nortern_hrs "PAY DATA HOURS",
  t1.nortern_special_rate "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE",
  n6.nortran_value "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE",
  n7.nortran_value "END PERSONNEL DATE"
   ,case b.nobtran_trans_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved'
   when 'C' then 'Completed'
   when 'V' then 'Voided' 
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
   when 'P' then 'Pending'
   when 'W' then 'Waiting'
   when 'T' then 'Partially Completed'
   when 'N' then 'Cancelled'
   when 'U' then 'Superuser Update'
  end trans_status   
  ,case r.norrout_queue_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved by that Approver'
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'F' then 'FYI'
   when 'I' then 'In Queue'
   when 'K' then 'Acknowledged'
   when 'L' then 'Applied by Applier'
   when 'M' then 'More Information'
   when 'O' then 'Overridden'
   when 'P' then 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier '
   when 'Q' then 'Removed from Queue'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
  end queue_status
  ,r.norrout_level_no
  

  from nobtran b,spriden s, norrout r, pebempl pp, /*nbrjobs nbr,*/
  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value
  from nortran nc
   where nc.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE'
  ) n1, /* Current Hire Date */
  (select nb.nortran_transaction_no,nb.nortran_apty_code,nb.nortran_aufd_code,nb.nortran_value
  from nortran nb
   where nb.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' 
  ) n2,  /*Begin Personnnel Date*/ 
  (select ns.nortran_transaction_no,ns.nortran_apty_code,ns.nortran_aufd_code,ns.nortran_value
  from nortran ns
   where ns.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE'
   ) n3, /* Salary Group */
  (select na.nortran_transaction_no,na.nortran_apty_code,na.nortran_aufd_code,na.nortran_value
  from nortran na
   where na.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT'
  ) n4, /*Appointment Percent*/ 
  (select nu.nortran_transaction_no,nu.nortran_apty_code,nu.nortran_aufd_code,nu.nortran_value
  from nortran nu
   where nu.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY'
  ) n5, /*Annual Salary*/
  (select nj.nortran_transaction_no,nj.nortran_apty_code,nj.nortran_aufd_code,nj.nortran_value
  from nortran nj
   where nj.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE'  
  and nj.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n6,  /*End Job Effective Date*/
  (select np.nortran_transaction_no,np.nortran_apty_code,np.nortran_aufd_code,np.nortran_value
  from nortran np
   where np.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE'  
  and np.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n7,  /*End Personnel Date*/

  (select t.nortern_transaction_no,t.nortern_effective_date,t.nortern_earn_code,
   t.nortern_hrs, t.nortern_special_rate
  from nortern t) t1 

   ,(select unique zz.nortran_transaction_no,zz.nortran_posn
  from nortran zz
   where zz.nortran_posn is not null
  ) z

 where b.nobtran_acat_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM') /*employee*/
  /*waiting,completed,partially completedc,ancelled,supperuser update */
  /* and nobtran_trans_status_ind in ('W','C','T','U') */
   and b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm
   and s.spriden_change_ind is null
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no(+) /*Pay Data*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Current Hire Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Begin Personnnel Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Salary Group*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Appointment Percent*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Annual Salary*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Job Effective Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Personnel Date*/
   
   and nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no(+)
   --get all queue status
   /*and r.norrout_queue_status_ind = 'A'*/
   and r.norrout_level_no = 90 /* Pending HR approval Queue */
   -- not applied yet
   and b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' /*Applied ePAFs will not be listed*/
   --HR does not care about voided ePAFs
   and nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V'
   --get posn
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no
   and r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A'
  -- exclude student
   and s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm
   and pp.pebempl_ecls_code not in ('RE','FW','GS','MW')

   order by 3", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST

You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nobtran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nobtran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nobtran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nobtran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nobtran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_acat_code ON nobtran(nobtran_acat_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_pidm ON nobtran(nobtran_pidm);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_transaction_no ON nobtran(nobtran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_status ON nobtran(nobtran_trans_status_ind);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_apply_ind ON nobtran(nobtran_apply_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE spriden_seq; CREATE TABLE spriden (spriden_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, spriden_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, spriden_last_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, spriden_first_name VARCHAR2(100), spriden_change_ind VARCHAR2(1)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER spriden_bi BEFORE INSERT ON spriden FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.spriden_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT spriden_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.spriden_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);

## Original SQL:
select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",
  z.nortran_posn "POSN NO",
  b.nobtran_effective_date "QUERY DATE", 
  b.nobtran_acat_code "ACAT CODE",
  n1.nortran_value "CURRENT HIRE DATE",
  n2.nortran_value "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE",
  n3.nortran_value "SALARY GROUP",
  n4.nortran_value "APPOINTMENT PERCENT",
  n5.nortran_value "ANNUAL SALARY",
  t1.nortern_effective_date "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE",
  t1.nortern_earn_code "PAY DATA EARNINGS",
  t1.nortern_hrs "PAY DATA HOURS",
  t1.nortern_special_rate "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE",
  n6.nortran_value "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE",
  n7.nortran_value "END PERSONNEL DATE"
   ,case b.nobtran_trans_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved'
   when 'C' then 'Completed'
   when 'V' then 'Voided' 
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
   when 'P' then 'Pending'
   when 'W' then 'Waiting'
   when 'T' then 'Partially Completed'
   when 'N' then 'Cancelled'
   when 'U' then 'Superuser Update'
  end trans_status   
  ,case r.norrout_queue_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved by that Approver'
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'F' then 'FYI'
   when 'I' then 'In Queue'
   when 'K' then 'Acknowledged'
   when 'L' then 'Applied by Applier'
   when 'M' then 'More Information'
   when 'O' then 'Overridden'
   when 'P' then 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier '
   when 'Q' then 'Removed from Queue'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
  end queue_status
  ,r.norrout_level_no
  

  from nobtran b,spriden s, norrout r, pebempl pp, /*nbrjobs nbr,*/
  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value
  from nortran nc
   where nc.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE'
  ) n1, /* Current Hire Date */
  (select nb.nortran_transaction_no,nb.nortran_apty_code,nb.nortran_aufd_code,nb.nortran_value
  from nortran nb
   where nb.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' 
  ) n2,  /*Begin Personnnel Date*/ 
  (select ns.nortran_transaction_no,ns.nortran_apty_code,ns.nortran_aufd_code,ns.nortran_value
  from nortran ns
   where ns.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE'
   ) n3, /* Salary Group */
  (select na.nortran_transaction_no,na.nortran_apty_code,na.nortran_aufd_code,na.nortran_value
  from nortran na
   where na.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT'
  ) n4, /*Appointment Percent*/ 
  (select nu.nortran_transaction_no,nu.nortran_apty_code,nu.nortran_aufd_code,nu.nortran_value
  from nortran nu
   where nu.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY'
  ) n5, /*Annual Salary*/
  (select nj.nortran_transaction_no,nj.nortran_apty_code,nj.nortran_aufd_code,nj.nortran_value
  from nortran nj
   where nj.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE'  
  and nj.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n6,  /*End Job Effective Date*/
  (select np.nortran_transaction_no,np.nortran_apty_code,np.nortran_aufd_code,np.nortran_value
  from nortran np
   where np.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE'  
  and np.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n7,  /*End Personnel Date*/

  (select t.nortern_transaction_no,t.nortern_effective_date,t.nortern_earn_code,
   t.nortern_hrs, t.nortern_special_rate
  from nortern t) t1 

   ,(select unique zz.nortran_transaction_no,zz.nortran_posn
  from nortran zz
   where zz.nortran_posn is not null
  ) z

 where b.nobtran_acat_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM') /*employee*/
  /*waiting,completed,partially completedc,ancelled,supperuser update */
  /* and nobtran_trans_status_ind in ('W','C','T','U') */
   and b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm
   and s.spriden_change_ind is null
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no(+) /*Pay Data*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Current Hire Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Begin Personnnel Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Salary Group*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Appointment Percent*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Annual Salary*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Job Effective Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Personnel Date*/
   
   and nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no(+)
   --get all queue status
   /*and r.norrout_queue_status_ind = 'A'*/
   and r.norrout_level_no = 90 /* Pending HR approval Queue */
   -- not applied yet
   and b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' /*Applied ePAFs will not be listed*/
   --HR does not care about voided ePAFs
   and nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V'
   --get posn
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no
   and r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A'
  -- exclude student
   and s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm
   and pp.pebempl_ecls_code not in ('RE','FW','GS','MW')

   order by 3

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT s.spriden_id AS EID, s.spriden_last_name || ', ' || s.spriden_first_name AS "NAME", b.nobtran_transaction_no AS "TRANS NO.", z.nortran_posn AS "POSN NO", b.nobtran_effective_date AS "QUERY DATE", b.nobtran_acat_code AS "ACAT CODE", n1.nortran_value AS "CURRENT HIRE DATE", n2.nortran_value AS "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE", n3.nortran_value AS "SALARY GROUP", n4.nortran_value AS "APPOINTMENT PERCENT", n5.nortran_value AS "ANNUAL SALARY", t1.nortern_effective_date AS "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE", t1.nortern_earn_code AS "PAY DATA EARNINGS", t1.nortern_hrs AS "PAY DATA HOURS", t1.nortern_special_rate AS "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE", n6.nortran_value AS "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE", n7.nortran_value AS "END PERSONNEL DATE", CASE b.nobtran_trans_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Completed' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Voided' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending' WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waiting' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Partially Completed' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Superuser Update' END AS trans_status, CASE r.norrout_queue_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved by that Approver' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FYI' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Queue' WHEN 'K' THEN 'Acknowledged' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Applied by Applier' WHEN 'M' THEN 'More Information' WHEN 'O' THEN 'Overridden' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier ' WHEN 'Q' THEN 'Removed from Queue' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' END AS queue_status, r.norrout_level_no FROM nobtran b INNER JOIN spriden s ON b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm AND s.spriden_change_ind IS NULL INNER JOIN pebempl pp ON s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm INNER JOIN ( SELECT nortran_transaction_no, nortran_posn FROM nortran WHERE nortran_posn IS NOT NULL ) z ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortern t1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortran n1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no AND n1.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n2 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no AND n2.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n3 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no AND n3.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE' LEFT JOIN nortran n4 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no AND n4.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT' LEFT JOIN nortran n5 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no AND n5.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY' LEFT JOIN nortran n6 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no AND n6.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE' AND n6.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN nortran n7 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no AND n7.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' AND n7.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN norrout r ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no AND r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A' AND r.norrout_level_no = 90 WHERE b.nobtran_acat_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') AND b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' AND b.nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V' AND pp.pebempl_ecls_code NOT IN ('RE', 'FW', 'GS', 'MW') ORDER BY 3

{"case_id": "30", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "此改写的核心是将原SQL中针对nortran表的7个独立子查询(n1-n7)和1个去重子查询(z)通过CTE的GROUP BY + MAX + CASE WHEN技术合并。原SQL中每个子查询都有WHERE条件过滤不同的nortran_aufd_code，改写后通过CASE WHEN在单次扫描中同时提取所有需要的字段值，然后用MAX聚合选择每个transaction的值。这种行列转换技术将EAV(Entity-Attribute-Value)模型的多行数据透视为宽表的单行数据。同时，将nobtran的过滤条件前置，减少JOIN时的数据量。这种改写方式在OLAP场景中常用于优化维度属性的多次JOIN。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nobtran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nobtran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nobtran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nobtran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nobtran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_acat_code ON nobtran(nobtran_acat_code);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_pidm ON nobtran(nobtran_pidm);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_transaction_no ON nobtran(nobtran_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_status ON nobtran(nobtran_trans_status_ind);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_apply_ind ON nobtran(nobtran_apply_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE spriden_seq; CREATE TABLE spriden (spriden_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, spriden_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, spriden_last_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, spriden_first_name VARCHAR2(100), spriden_change_ind VARCHAR2(1)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER spriden_bi BEFORE INSERT ON spriden FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.spriden_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT spriden_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.spriden_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);"], "sql": "select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",

  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value

case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nobtran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nobtran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nobtran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nobtran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nobtran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_acat_code ON nobtran(nobtran_acat_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_pidm ON nobtran(nobtran_pidm);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_transaction_no ON nobtran(nobtran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_status ON nobtran(nobtran_trans_status_ind);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_apply_ind ON nobtran(nobtran_apply_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE spriden_seq; CREATE TABLE spriden (spriden_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, spriden_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, spriden_last_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, spriden_first_name VARCHAR2(100), spriden_change_ind VARCHAR2(1)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER spriden_bi BEFORE INSERT ON spriden FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.spriden_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT spriden_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.spriden_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);

## Original SQL:
select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",
  z.nortran_posn "POSN NO",
  b.nobtran_effective_date "QUERY DATE", 
  b.nobtran_acat_code "ACAT CODE",
  n1.nortran_value "CURRENT HIRE DATE",
  n2.nortran_value "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE",
  n3.nortran_value "SALARY GROUP",
  n4.nortran_value "APPOINTMENT PERCENT",
  n5.nortran_value "ANNUAL SALARY",
  t1.nortern_effective_date "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE",
  t1.nortern_earn_code "PAY DATA EARNINGS",
  t1.nortern_hrs "PAY DATA HOURS",
  t1.nortern_special_rate "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE",
  n6.nortran_value "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE",
  n7.nortran_value "END PERSONNEL DATE"
   ,case b.nobtran_trans_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved'
   when 'C' then 'Completed'
   when 'V' then 'Voided' 
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
   when 'P' then 'Pending'
   when 'W' then 'Waiting'
   when 'T' then 'Partially Completed'
   when 'N' then 'Cancelled'
   when 'U' then 'Superuser Update'
  end trans_status   
  ,case r.norrout_queue_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved by that Approver'
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'F' then 'FYI'
   when 'I' then 'In Queue'
   when 'K' then 'Acknowledged'
   when 'L' then 'Applied by Applier'
   when 'M' then 'More Information'
   when 'O' then 'Overridden'
   when 'P' then 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier '
   when 'Q' then 'Removed from Queue'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
  end queue_status
  ,r.norrout_level_no
  

  from nobtran b,spriden s, norrout r, pebempl pp, /*nbrjobs nbr,*/
  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value
  from nortran nc
   where nc.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE'
  ) n1, /* Current Hire Date */
  (select nb.nortran_transaction_no,nb.nortran_apty_code,nb.nortran_aufd_code,nb.nortran_value
  from nortran nb
   where nb.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' 
  ) n2,  /*Begin Personnnel Date*/ 
  (select ns.nortran_transaction_no,ns.nortran_apty_code,ns.nortran_aufd_code,ns.nortran_value
  from nortran ns
   where ns.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE'
   ) n3, /* Salary Group */
  (select na.nortran_transaction_no,na.nortran_apty_code,na.nortran_aufd_code,na.nortran_value
  from nortran na
   where na.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT'
  ) n4, /*Appointment Percent*/ 
  (select nu.nortran_transaction_no,nu.nortran_apty_code,nu.nortran_aufd_code,nu.nortran_value
  from nortran nu
   where nu.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY'
  ) n5, /*Annual Salary*/
  (select nj.nortran_transaction_no,nj.nortran_apty_code,nj.nortran_aufd_code,nj.nortran_value
  from nortran nj
   where nj.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE'  
  and nj.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n6,  /*End Job Effective Date*/
  (select np.nortran_transaction_no,np.nortran_apty_code,np.nortran_aufd_code,np.nortran_value
  from nortran np
   where np.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE'  
  and np.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n7,  /*End Personnel Date*/

  (select t.nortern_transaction_no,t.nortern_effective_date,t.nortern_earn_code,
   t.nortern_hrs, t.nortern_special_rate
  from nortern t) t1 

   ,(select unique zz.nortran_transaction_no,zz.nortran_posn
  from nortran zz
   where zz.nortran_posn is not null
  ) z

 where b.nobtran_acat_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM') /*employee*/
  /*waiting,completed,partially completedc,ancelled,supperuser update */
  /* and nobtran_trans_status_ind in ('W','C','T','U') */
   and b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm
   and s.spriden_change_ind is null
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no(+) /*Pay Data*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Current Hire Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Begin Personnnel Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Salary Group*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Appointment Percent*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Annual Salary*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Job Effective Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Personnel Date*/
   
   and nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no(+)
   --get all queue status
   /*and r.norrout_queue_status_ind = 'A'*/
   and r.norrout_level_no = 90 /* Pending HR approval Queue */
   -- not applied yet
   and b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' /*Applied ePAFs will not be listed*/
   --HR does not care about voided ePAFs
   and nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V'
   --get posn
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no
   and r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A'
  -- exclude student
   and s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm
   and pp.pebempl_ecls_code not in ('RE','FW','GS','MW')

   order by 3

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT s.spriden_id AS EID, s.spriden_last_name || ', ' || s.spriden_first_name AS "NAME", b.nobtran_transaction_no AS "TRANS NO.", z.nortran_posn AS "POSN NO", b.nobtran_effective_date AS "QUERY DATE", b.nobtran_acat_code AS "ACAT CODE", n1.nortran_value AS "CURRENT HIRE DATE", n2.nortran_value AS "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE", n3.nortran_value AS "SALARY GROUP", n4.nortran_value AS "APPOINTMENT PERCENT", n5.nortran_value AS "ANNUAL SALARY", t1.nortern_effective_date AS "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE", t1.nortern_earn_code AS "PAY DATA EARNINGS", t1.nortern_hrs AS "PAY DATA HOURS", t1.nortern_special_rate AS "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE", n6.nortran_value AS "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE", n7.nortran_value AS "END PERSONNEL DATE", CASE b.nobtran_trans_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Completed' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Voided' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending' WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waiting' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Partially Completed' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Superuser Update' END AS trans_status, CASE r.norrout_queue_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved by that Approver' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FYI' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Queue' WHEN 'K' THEN 'Acknowledged' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Applied by Applier' WHEN 'M' THEN 'More Information' WHEN 'O' THEN 'Overridden' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier ' WHEN 'Q' THEN 'Removed from Queue' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' END AS queue_status, r.norrout_level_no FROM nobtran b INNER JOIN spriden s ON b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm AND s.spriden_change_ind IS NULL INNER JOIN pebempl pp ON s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm INNER JOIN ( SELECT nortran_transaction_no, nortran_posn FROM nortran WHERE nortran_posn IS NOT NULL ) z ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortern t1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortran n1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no AND n1.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n2 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no AND n2.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n3 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no AND n3.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE' LEFT JOIN nortran n4 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no AND n4.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT' LEFT JOIN nortran n5 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no AND n5.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY' LEFT JOIN nortran n6 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no AND n6.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE' AND n6.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN nortran n7 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no AND n7.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' AND n7.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN norrout r ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no AND r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A' AND r.norrout_level_no = 90 WHERE b.nobtran_acat_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') AND b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' AND b.nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V' AND pp.pebempl_ecls_code NOT IN ('RE', 'FW', 'GS', 'MW') ORDER BY 3

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "31", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "本次改写是一个纯语法层面的变更，仅将派生表（子查询）的别名从't'改为't2'，并相应更新外层SELECT语句中的列引用（t.age→t2.age等）。这种改写不改变SQL的语义、执行逻辑或数据访问路径，对数据库优化器来说两个查询完全等价。从性能优化角度看，这不是一个有效的改写方案，因为它不涉及任何能够提升性能的技术手段，如索引利用、连接顺序调整、谓词下推、子查询展开等。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BSIS (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BUZEI VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, HKONT VARCHAR2(10), DMBTR NUMBER(15,2), WAERS VARCHAR2(3), MONAT VARCHAR2(2), BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bsis PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR, BUZEI));", "CREATE INDEX idx_bsis_query ON SAPR3.BSIS(GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, MANDT, BUZEI, WAERS, MONAT, BLDAT);", "CREATE INDEX idx_bsis_join ON SAPR3.BSIS(BELNR, GJAHR, BUKRS);", "CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BKPF (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bkpf PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR));"], "sql": "SELECT
  t.age,
  CASE 
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 0 AND 3 THEN '0-3 Days'
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '3-7 Days'
  ELSE 'Above 7 Days'
  END AS age_bucket,
  t.amount_local,
  t.hkont AS gl_account,
  t.bukrs AS company_code
FROM (
  SELECT 
  b.BUKRS,
  b.HKONT,
  b.DMBTR AS amount_local,
  (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT,'YYYYMMDD')) AS age
  FROM (
  SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(30) */
   BELNR, GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, DMBTR
  FROM SAPR3.BSIS
  WHERE GJAHR = '2025'
  AND BUKRS = '0100'
  AND HKONT = '0000895200'
  AND MANDT = '500'
  AND BUZEI = '002'
  AND WAERS = 'INR'
  AND MONAT = '01'

SELECT
  t.age,
  CASE 
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 0 AND 3 THEN '0-3 Days'
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '3-7 Days'
  ELSE 'Above 7 Days'
  END AS age_bucket,
  t.amount_local,
  t.hkont AS gl_account,
  t.bukrs AS company_code
FROM (
  SELECT 
  b.BUKRS,
  b.HKONT,
  b.DMBTR AS amount_local,
  (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT,'YYYYMMDD')) AS age
  FROM (
  SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(30) */
   BELNR, GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, DMBTR
  FROM SAPR3.BSIS
  WHERE GJAHR = '2025'
  AND BUKRS = '0100'
  AND HKONT = '0000895200'
  AND MANDT = '500'
  AND BUZEI = '002'
  AND WAERS = 'INR'
  AND MONAT = '01'
  AND BLDAT = '20240401'
  ) b
  JOIN SAPR3.BKPF k
   ON b.BELNR = k.BELNR
  AND b.GJAHR = k.GJAHR
  AND b.BUKRS = k.BUKRS
) t
ORDER BY t.age;

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "32", "db_type": "postgresql", "description": "本次改写采用了经典的查询优化技术组合：

1. **谓词下推（Predicate Pushdown）**：将out_date的过滤条件从最外层WHERE子句移到tmep_ip CTE内部。这样可以尽早过滤数据，减少CTE物化的数据量，虽然在本例中优化器已经将过滤推到了Parallel Seq Scan阶段，但显式下推使逻辑更清晰，且在某些复杂场景下能帮助优化器更好地生成执行计划。

2. **投影裁剪（Column Pruning）**：在diagnosis_ranked子查询中，移除了不再需要的diagnosis_type_name字段。该字段仅用于窗口函数的排序，在rn=1筛选后就没有实际意义了，因此在WindowAgg之后立即裁剪，避免传递到上层的GroupAggregate和Materialize节点。

3. **聚合维度优化**：diagnosis_end的GROUP BY从4个字段减少到3个字段。因为diagnosis_type_name在窗口函数排序后已被隐含使用（通过rn=1保证了每组只保留优先级最高的记录），在最终聚合时不需要再作为分组键。这减少了哈希表的键空间和比较开销。

4. **逻辑等价性保证**：虽然进行了多处优化，但查询的核心逻辑保持不变：
   - 诊断类型的优先级排序规则完全一致
   - ROW_NUMBER()窗口函数的分区和排序逻辑相同
   - MAX聚合对diagnosis_flag分组的处理逻辑相同
   - 最终JOIN关联条件和结果集完全一致", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_patient_info (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, inpatient_name VARCHAR(100), age INTEGER, sex VARCHAR(10), in_date TIMESTAMP, out_date TIMESTAMP, times VARCHAR(20), person_type VARCHAR(50), patient_no VARCHAR(50), current_dept_code VARCHAR(50));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(register_no, times);", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_out_date ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(out_date);", "CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_settle (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, times VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, total_cost DECIMAL(12,2));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_settle_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_settle(register_no, times);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_type_name VARCHAR(100), diagnosis_flag VARCHAR(1), diagnosis_code VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_name VARCHAR(200), diagnosis_no INTEGER, file_visit_type VARCHAR(10));", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_file_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(file_visit_type, inp_no, visit_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_group ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_operation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, operation_code VARCHAR(50), operation_no INTEGER);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_operation_inp_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_operation(inp_no, visit_id);"], "sql": "with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc", "explain": "QUERY PLAN
Sort  (cost=445130.58..445963.91 rows=333333 width=308)
  Sort Key: (date(a.out_date)) DESC
  ->  Merge Left Join  (cost=64922.35..318848.93 rows=333333 width=308)
  Merge Cond: (((a.register_no)::text = (diagnosis_ranked.inp_no)::text) AND ((a.times)::text = (diagnosis_ranked.times)::text))
  ->  Gather Merge  (cost=64668.41..197286.44 rows=333333 width=111)
  Workers Planned: 2
  ->  Merge Left Join  (cost=63668.38..157811.52 rows=138889 width=111)
  Merge Cond: (((a.register_no)::text = (emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.inp_no)::text) AND ((a.times)::text = (emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.visit_id)::text))
  ->  Sort  (cost=63667.28..64014.50 rows=138889 width=79)
  Sort Key: a.register_no, a.times
  ->  Parallel Hash Right Join  (cost=24279.33..45629.67 rows=138889 width=79)
  Hash Cond: (((b.register_no)::text = (a.register_no)::text) AND ((b.times)::text = (a.times)::text))
  ->  Parallel Seq Scan on his_temp_ip_settle b  (cost=0.00..11519.67 rows=416667 width=22)
  ->  Parallel Hash  (cost=20432.00..20432.00 rows=138889 width=73)
  ->  Parallel Seq Scan on his_temp_ip_patient_info a  (cost=0.00..20432.00 rows=138889 width=73)
  Filter: (date(out_date) > '2025-01-01'::date)
  ->  GroupAggregate  (cost=1.11..91601.88 rows=100000 width=44)
  Group Key: emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.inp_no, emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.visit_id
  ->  Incremental Sort  (cost=1.11..82851.88 rows=1000000 width=25)
  Sort Key: emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.inp_no, emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.visit_id, emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.operation_no
  Presorted Key: emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.inp_no, emr_temp_ip_patient_operation.visit_id
  ->  Index Scan using idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_operation_inp_visit on emr_temp_ip_patient_operation  (cost=0.42..51742.24 rows=1000000 width=25)

## Original SQL:
with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT a.register_no AS patientid, a.inpatient_name AS patientname, a.age, a.sex AS gender, DATE(a.in_date) AS indate, DATE(a.out_date) AS outdate, a.times AS inhospitaltimes, d.type, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN dr.diagnosis_codes END) AS diagnosiscode, o.operation_codes AS operationcode, b.total_cost AS medicalcost, a.person_type AS persontype, 'doctor' AS entrymode, a.patient_no AS serialno, 'remind' AS defaulttab, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes END) AS chinesediagnosiscode, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_names END) AS chinesediagnosename, a.current_dept_code AS deptcode, '440100' AS citycode FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY inp_no, visit_id, type ORDER BY CASE WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' THEN 2 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS rn FROM (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_name, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_names FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis WHERE file_visit_type = '2' GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag) AS diagnosis_filtered) dr INNER JOIN his_temp_ip_patient_info a ON dr.rn = 1 AND dr.inp_no = a.register_no AND dr.visit_id = a.times AND DATE(a.out_date) > '2025-01-01' LEFT JOIN his_temp_ip_settle b ON a.register_no = b.register_no AND a.times = b.times LEFT JOIN (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, STRING_AGG(operation_code, ',' ORDER BY operation_no) AS operation_codes FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_operation GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id) o ON a.register_no = o.inp_no AND a.times = o.visit_id CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT dr.type, dr.diagnosis_flag, dr.diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_names WHERE dr.rn = 1) d GROUP BY a.register_no, a.inpatient_name, a.age, a.sex, DATE(a.in_date), DATE(a.out_date), a.times, d.type, o.operation_codes, b.total_cost, a.person_type, a.patient_no, a.current_dept_code ORDER BY DATE(a.out_date) DESC;

{"case_id": "32", "db_type": "postgresql", "description": "本次改写采用了经典的查询优化技术组合：

1. **谓词下推（Predicate Pushdown）**：将out_date的过滤条件从最外层WHERE子句移到tmep_ip CTE内部。这样可以尽早过滤数据，减少CTE物化的数据量，虽然在本例中优化器已经将过滤推到了Parallel Seq Scan阶段，但显式下推使逻辑更清晰，且在某些复杂场景下能帮助优化器更好地生成执行计划。

2. **投影裁剪（Column Pruning）**：在diagnosis_ranked子查询中，移除了不再需要的diagnosis_type_name字段。该字段仅用于窗口函数的排序，在rn=1筛选后就没有实际意义了，因此在WindowAgg之后立即裁剪，避免传递到上层的GroupAggregate和Materialize节点。

3. **聚合维度优化**：diagnosis_end的GROUP BY从4个字段减少到3个字段。因为diagnosis_type_name在窗口函数排序后已被隐含使用（通过rn=1保证了每组只保留优先级最高的记录），在最终聚合时不需要再作为分组键。这减少了哈希表的键空间和比较开销。

4. **逻辑等价性保证**：虽然进行了多处优化，但查询的核心逻辑保持不变：
   - 诊断类型的优先级排序规则完全一致
   - ROW_NUMBER()窗口函数的分区和排序逻辑相同
   - MAX聚合对diagnosis_flag分组的处理逻辑相同
   - 最终JOIN关联条件和结果集完全一致", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_patient_info (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, inpatient_name VARCHAR(100), age INTEGER, sex VARCHAR(10), in_date TIMESTAMP, out_date TIMESTAMP, times VARCHAR(20), person_type VARCHAR(50), patient_no VARCHAR(50), current_dept_code VARCHAR(50));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(register_no, times);", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_out_date ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(out_date);", "CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_settle (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, times VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, total_cost DECIMAL(12,2));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_settle_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_settle(register_no, times);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_type_name VARCHAR(100), diagnosis_flag VARCHAR(1), diagnosis_code VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_name VARCHAR(200), diagnosis_no INTEGER, file_visit_type VARCHAR(10));", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_file_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(file_visit_type, inp_no, visit_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_group ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_operation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, operation_code VARCHAR(50), operation_no INTEGER);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_operation_inp_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_operation(inp_no, visit_id);"], "sql": "with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate,

),
diagnosis as (

  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,

  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag

diagnosis_ranked as (

  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2

)

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_patient_info (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, inpatient_name VARCHAR(100), age INTEGER, sex VARCHAR(10), in_date TIMESTAMP, out_date TIMESTAMP, times VARCHAR(20), person_type VARCHAR(50), patient_no VARCHAR(50), current_dept_code VARCHAR(50));
CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(register_no, times);
CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_out_date ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(out_date);
CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_settle (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, times VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, total_cost DECIMAL(12,2));
CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_settle_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_settle(register_no, times);
CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_type_name VARCHAR(100), diagnosis_flag VARCHAR(1), diagnosis_code VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_name VARCHAR(200), diagnosis_no INTEGER, file_visit_type VARCHAR(10));
CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_file_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(file_visit_type, inp_no, visit_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_group ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag);
CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_operation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, operation_code VARCHAR(50), operation_no INTEGER);
CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_operation_inp_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_operation(inp_no, visit_id);

= '2'::text)"}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}]}, 'JIT': {'Functions': 59, 'Options': {'Inlining': False, 'Optimization': False, 'Expressions': True, 'Deforming': True}}}]

## Original SQL:
with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT a.register_no AS patientid, a.inpatient_name AS patientname, a.age, a.sex AS gender, DATE(a.in_date) AS indate, DATE(a.out_date) AS outdate, a.times AS inhospitaltimes, d.type, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN dr.diagnosis_codes END) AS diagnosiscode, o.operation_codes AS operationcode, b.total_cost AS medicalcost, a.person_type AS persontype, 'doctor' AS entrymode, a.patient_no AS serialno, 'remind' AS defaulttab, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes END) AS chinesediagnosiscode, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_names END) AS chinesediagnosename, a.current_dept_code AS deptcode, '440100' AS citycode FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY inp_no, visit_id, type ORDER BY CASE WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' THEN 2 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS rn FROM (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_name, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_names FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis WHERE file_visit_type = '2' GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag) AS diagnosis_filtered) dr INNER JOIN his_temp_ip_patient_info a ON dr.rn = 1 AND dr.inp_no = a.register_no AND dr.visit_id = a.times AND DATE(a.out_date) > '2025-01-01' LEFT JOIN his_temp_ip_settle b ON a.register_no = b.register_no AND a.times = b.times LEFT JOIN (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, STRING_AGG(operation_code, ',' ORDER BY operation_no) AS operation_codes FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_operation GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id) o ON a.register_no = o.inp_no AND a.times = o.visit_id CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT dr.type, dr.diagnosis_flag, dr.diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_names WHERE dr.rn = 1) d GROUP BY a.register_no, a.inpatient_name, a.age, a.sex, DATE(a.in_date), DATE(a.out_date), a.times, d.type, o.operation_codes, b.total_cost, a.person_type, a.patient_no, a.current_dept_code ORDER BY DATE(a.out_date) DESC;

{"case_id": "33", "db_type": "mysql", "description": "这次改写的核心思想是消除WHERE子句中的LEFT函数调用，因为函数作用于列会阻止索引使用。改写策略是将前缀匹配逻辑展开为21个具体的等值比较条件（对应字符串'745070056000500070090'的每个前缀）。每个条件形式为：(code_length = N AND CODE = 'prefix')。理论上，这种改写可以让优化器使用索引，因为CODE列现在是等值比较而非函数参数。然而实际效果适得其反，原因是：1) 条件数量过多（21个OR）导致评估开销增加；2) 每个条件仍需调用CHAR_LENGTH函数验证长度；3) MySQL对多OR条件的索引使用优化有限，最终仍选择全表扫描。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE t_org_architecture (ID INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, NAME VARCHAR(100), CODE VARCHAR(50), TYPE VARCHAR(50), principal VARCHAR(100), CATEGORY VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_code ON t_org_architecture(CODE);"], "sql": "SELECT 
  ID, 
  `NAME`, 
  `CODE`, 
  `TYPE`, 
  principal, 
  CATEGORY 
FROM 
  t_org_architecture 
WHERE 
  LEFT('745070056000500070090',  LENGTH(`CODE`)) = `CODE`

{"case_id": "35", "db_type": "mysql", "description": "这是一个典型的消除无用计算的优化案例。当外层查询只是COUNT(*)时，内层子查询中计算的所有列值（包括通过子查询计算的auditJobIdcounts）都不会影响最终结果。COUNT(*)只关心有多少行满足WHERE条件，而不关心这些行的具体内容。因此可以直接将内层子查询展开，删除所有不必要的列选择和子查询计算，只保留WHERE条件。这种改写消除了189504次依赖子查询执行、临时表物化和34个列的数据读取，大幅提升性能。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE hotel_price_adjustment (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), brand_code VARCHAR(50), brand_name VARCHAR(200), hotel_code VARCHAR(50), hotel_name VARCHAR(200), currency VARCHAR(10), category VARCHAR(50), rate_code VARCHAR(50), rate_name VARCHAR(200), price_array_type VARCHAR(50), price_array_code VARCHAR(50), price_array_sequence INT, price_array TEXT, price_array2 TEXT, date_segment VARCHAR(100), weeks VARCHAR(50), brand_maximum_price DECIMAL(18,2), brand_minimum_price DECIMAL(18,2), room_code VARCHAR(50), room_name VARCHAR(200), room_standard_price DECIMAL(18,2), pre_adjustment_price DECIMAL(18,2), adjusted_price DECIMAL(18,2), price_adjustment_range VARCHAR(50), occupancy INT, status VARCHAR(20), reason TEXT, approve_status VARCHAR(20), approve_reason TEXT, operator VARCHAR(100), create_time DATETIME, update_time DATETIME, CREATE_USER_ID BIGINT) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_hotel_code ON hotel_price_adjustment(HOTEL_CODE);", "CREATE INDEX idx_create_user_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(CREATE_USER_ID);", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(apply_id);", "CREATE TABLE price_adjustment_audit_job (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), job_id VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id_job_id ON price_adjustment_audit_job(apply_id, job_id);"], "sql": "SELECT 
  COUNT(*) 
FROM 
  (
  SELECT 
   id, 
   apply_id, 
   brand_code, 
   brand_name, 
   hotel_code, 
   hotel_name, 
   currency, 
   category, 
   rate_code, 
   rate_name, 
   price_array_type, 
   price_array_code, 
   price_array_sequence,

   date_segment,

   occupancy, 
   status, 
   reason, 
   approve_status, 
   approve_reason, 
   operator, 
   create_time, 
   update_time, 
   CREATE_USER_ID, 
   (
   SELECT 
   count(paaj.id) 
   FROM 
   price_adjustment_audit_job paaj 
   WHERE 
   paaj.apply_id = pa1.apply_id 
   AND paaj.job_id = '4_004'
   ) AS auditJobIdcounts 
  FROM 
   hotel_price_adjustment pa1 
  WHERE 
   (
   HOTEL_CODE IN ('6199', 'JJXRSEH802967') 
   OR CREATE_USER_ID = 289865
   )
  ) TOTAL;", "explain": "id	select_type	table	partitions	type	possible_keys	key	key_len	ref	rows	filtered	Extra

## Original SQL:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) 
FROM 
  (
  SELECT 
   id, 
   apply_id, 
   brand_code, 
   brand_name, 
   hotel_code, 
   hotel_name, 
   currency, 
   category, 
   rate_code, 
   rate_name, 
   price_array_type, 
   price_array_code, 
   price_array_sequence, 
   price_array, 
   price_array2, 
   date_segment, 
   weeks, 
   brand_maximum_price, 
   brand_minimum_price, 
   room_code, 
   room_name, 
   room_standard_price, 
   pre_adjustment_price, 
   adjusted_price, 
   price_adjustment_range, 
   occupancy, 
   status, 
   reason, 
   approve_status, 
   approve_reason, 
   operator, 
   create_time, 
   update_time, 
   CREATE_USER_ID, 
   (
   SELECT 
   count(paaj.id) 
   FROM 
   price_adjustment_audit_job paaj 
   WHERE 
   paaj.apply_id = pa1.apply_id 
   AND paaj.job_id = '4_004'
   ) AS auditJobIdcounts 
  FROM 
   hotel_price_adjustment pa1 
  WHERE 
   (
   HOTEL_CODE IN ('6199', 'JJXRSEH802967') 
   OR CREATE_USER_ID = 289865
   )
  ) TOTAL;

{"case_id": "35", "db_type": "mysql", "description": "这是一个典型的消除无用计算的优化案例。当外层查询只是COUNT(*)时，内层子查询中计算的所有列值（包括通过子查询计算的auditJobIdcounts）都不会影响最终结果。COUNT(*)只关心有多少行满足WHERE条件，而不关心这些行的具体内容。因此可以直接将内层子查询展开，删除所有不必要的列选择和子查询计算，只保留WHERE条件。这种改写消除了189504次依赖子查询执行、临时表物化和34个列的数据读取，大幅提升性能。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE hotel_price_adjustment (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), brand_code VARCHAR(50), brand_name VARCHAR(200), hotel_code VARCHAR(50), hotel_name VARCHAR(200), currency VARCHAR(10), category VARCHAR(50), rate_code VARCHAR(50), rate_name VARCHAR(200), price_array_type VARCHAR(50), price_array_code VARCHAR(50), price_array_sequence INT, price_array TEXT, price_array2 TEXT, date_segment VARCHAR(100), weeks VARCHAR(50), brand_maximum_price DECIMAL(18,2), brand_minimum_price DECIMAL(18,2), room_code VARCHAR(50), room_name VARCHAR(200), room_standard_price DECIMAL(18,2), pre_adjustment_price DECIMAL(18,2), adjusted_price DECIMAL(18,2), price_adjustment_range VARCHAR(50), occupancy INT, status VARCHAR(20), reason TEXT, approve_status VARCHAR(20), approve_reason TEXT, operator VARCHAR(100), create_time DATETIME, update_time DATETIME, CREATE_USER_ID BIGINT) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_hotel_code ON hotel_price_adjustment(HOTEL_CODE);", "CREATE INDEX idx_create_user_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(CREATE_USER_ID);", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(apply_id);", "CREATE TABLE price_adjustment_audit_job (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), job_id VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id_job_id ON price_adjustment_audit_job(apply_id, job_id);"], "sql": "SELECT

## Original SQL:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) 
FROM 
  (
  SELECT 
   id, 
   apply_id, 
   brand_code, 
   brand_name, 
   hotel_code, 
   hotel_name, 
   currency, 
   category, 
   rate_code, 
   rate_name, 
   price_array_type, 
   price_array_code, 
   price_array_sequence, 
   price_array, 
   price_array2, 
   date_segment, 
   weeks, 
   brand_maximum_price, 
   brand_minimum_price, 
   room_code, 
   room_name, 
   room_standard_price, 
   pre_adjustment_price, 
   adjusted_price, 
   price_adjustment_range, 
   occupancy, 
   status, 
   reason, 
   approve_status, 
   approve_reason, 
   operator, 
   create_time, 
   update_time, 
   CREATE_USER_ID, 
   (
   SELECT 
   count(paaj.id) 
   FROM 
   price_adjustment_audit_job paaj 
   WHERE 
   paaj.apply_id = pa1.apply_id 
   AND paaj.job_id = '4_004'
   ) AS auditJobIdcounts 
  FROM 
   hotel_price_adjustment pa1 
  WHERE 
   (
   HOTEL_CODE IN ('6199', 'JJXRSEH802967') 
   OR CREATE_USER_ID = 289865
   )
  ) TOTAL;
