   t_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,

   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,

  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(

  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,

  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM

model_answer.optimizedSQL: WITH union_materials AS ( SELECT v.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, IFNULL(v.PACKAGE_NO, v.MATERIAL_NO) AS MIXED_NO, '30' AS SPOT_TYPE, v.MATERIAL_NO, v.PACKAGE_NO, v.PSR_ID, v.CUSTOMER_ID, v.CONTRACT_ID, v.CONTRACT_NO, v.NUMBER, v.NET_WEIGHT, v.GROSS_WT, v.STORE_ID, v.LOCATION_ID, v.STANDARD_ID, v.STEEL_GRADE, v.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, v.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, CASE WHEN v.LENGTH IS NOT NULL AND v.LENGTH != 0 THEN CONCAT(v.THICK, '*', v.WIDTH, '*', v.LENGTH) ELSE CONCAT(v.THICK, '*', v.WIDTH, '*C') END AS specs, SUM(CASE WHEN scd.BUY_UNIT = '10' THEN scd.TAX_PRICE * v.NET_WEIGHT ELSE scd.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(scd.NUMBER, 1) END) AS PRICE, v.IS_ISSUED, v.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE, v.NI36_TAG, v.MATERIAL_STATE, v.CONTRACT_TYPE FROM v_pre_product_material v LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey mk ON mk.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail scd ON mk.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID WHERE v.IS_ISSUED = '1' AND v.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE = '0' AND v.NI36_TAG = '0' AND v.MATERIAL_STATE != '110' AND v.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM v_pre_product_material v2 WHERE v2.IS_ISSUED != '1' AND (v2.PACKAGE_NO = v.PACKAGE_NO OR v2.MATERIAL_NO = v.MATERIAL_NO) LIMIT 1 ) GROUP BY COALESCE(v.PACKAGE_NO, v.MATERIAL_NO) UNION ALL SELECT scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MIXED_NO, '10' AS SPOT_TYPE, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MATERIAL_NO, NULL AS PACKAGE_NO, bc.COLUMN_NAME AS PSR_ID, sc.CUSTOMER_ID, sc.CONTRACT_ID, sc.CONTRACT_NO, 1 AS NUMBER, st.NEW_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, st.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT, st.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID, st.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, NULL AS STANDARD_ID, st.STEEL_GRADE, NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, st.VARIETY_ID, CASE 'C') END AS specs, scd.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_inm_store_info st ON st.MATERIAL_NO = scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column bc ON st.VARIETY_ID = bc.COLUMN_ID WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE = '10' AND st.STOCK_ID IS NOT NULL AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO UNION ALL SELECT ppm.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID AS PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, NUMBER, ppm.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, ppm.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT, ppm.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID, ppm.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, ppm.STANDARD_ID AS STANDARD_ID, ppm.STEEL_GRADE, ppm.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC AS CONCAT(ppm.THICK, '*', ppm.WIDTH, '*C') END AS specs, scd.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_pre_product_material ppm ON (scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.PACKAGE_NO OR scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.MATERIAL_NO) WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30') AND ppm.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO UNION ALL SELECT scd.SCRAP_INFO_ID AS sc.CONTRACT_NO, NULL AS NUMBER, ps.WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, NULL AS GROSS_WT, '/' AS STORE_ID, '/' AS LOCATION_ID, NULL AS STANDARD_ID, ps.STEEL_GRADE, NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, NULL AS specs, ps.WEIGHT * scd.TAX_PRICE AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_pre_scrap ps ON ps.SCRAP_INFO_ID = scd.SCRAP_INFO_ID WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE = '40' AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY ps.BATCH_NO) SELECT temp.*, ts.STORE_NAME, tl.LOCATION_NAME, qs.STANDARD_NAME, bc.COLUMN_NAME AS STEEL_GRADE_NAME, dsi.SEND_ID AS CONNECT_ID, dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS CONNECT_DETAIL_ID, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dsid.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dsid.NUMBER, 0) END AS SEND_NUMBER, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dret.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dret.NUMBER, 0) END AS RETURN_NUMBER FROM t_dgm_send_info_detail dsid JOIN t_dgm_send_info dsi ON dsi.SEND_ID = dsid.SEND_ID AND dsi.SEND_STATE = '70' LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info_return_detail dret ON dret.CONNECT_DETAIL_ID = dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID JOIN union_materials temp ON temp.MIXED_NO = dsid.MIXED_NO AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401' LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store ts ON ts.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location tl ON tl.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard qs ON qs.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column bc ON bc.COLUMN_ID = temp.STEEL_GRADE GROUP BY dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID HAVING (CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dsid.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dsid.NUMBER, 0) temp.MIXED_NO`在业务逻辑上可能是冗余的（子查询已确保唯一性或JOIN关系未导致膨胀），且`HAVING`子句中包含了本应在WHERE中过滤的非聚合条件，导致了不必要的临时表和排序开销。4. **宽表投影**：派生表输出了大量后续未使用的列，增加了内存和I/O负担。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS   t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS `CONNECT_DETAIL_ID`,
  IF (
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.WEIGHT, 0),
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.NUMBER, 0)
  ) AS `SEND_NUMBER`,

  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',

  ) AS `RETURN_NUMBER`

  )

  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(t_sam_contract_detail.NUMBER, 1)
  )
   ) AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   v_pre_product_material
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID

   AND v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_STATE != '110'
   AND v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60'

   t_inm_store_info.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,

   t_inm_store_info.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,

   t_inm_store_info.STEEL_GRADE,

   t_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,

   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,

  (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)

  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`

   LEFT JOIN t_pre_product_material ON t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO

  WHERE

   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30')
   AND t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY

   NULL AS NUMBER,

SELECT
  temp.*,
  t_rmm_store.STORE_NAME,
  t_rmm_location.LOCATION_NAME,
  t_qdm_standard.STANDARD_NAME,
  t_bdm_column.COLUMN_NAME AS `STEEL_GRADE_NAME`,
  t_dgm_send_info.SEND_ID AS `CONNECT_ID`,
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS `CONNECT_DETAIL_ID`,
  IF (
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.WEIGHT, 0),
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.NUMBER, 0)
  ) AS `SEND_NUMBER`,
  IF (
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.WEIGHT, 0),
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.NUMBER, 0)
  ) AS `RETURN_NUMBER`
FROM
  t_dgm_send_info_detail
  LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info ON t_dgm_send_info.SEND_ID = t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_ID
  LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info_return_detail ON t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.CONNECT_DETAIL_ID = t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID
  LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
   v_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID,
   IFNULL(
  v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
  v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
   ) AS MIXED_NO,
   '30' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.PSR_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CUSTOMER_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.NUMBER,
   v_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT,
   v_pre_product_material.GROSS_WT,
   v_pre_product_material.STORE_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.LOCATION_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.STANDARD_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,
   v_pre_product_material.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   SUM(
  IF (
  t_sam_contract_detail.BUY_UNIT = '10',
  -- 单位测试
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * v_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT,
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(t_sam_contract_detail.NUMBER, 1)
  )
   ) AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   v_pre_product_material
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID
  WHERE
   v_pre_product_material.IS_ISSUED = '1'
   AND v_pre_product_material.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.NI36_TAG = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_STATE != '110'
   AND v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60'
   AND NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT
  1
  FROM
  v_pre_product_material v2
  WHERE
  v2.PACKAGE_NO = v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
  OR v2.MATERIAL_NO = v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  GROUP BY
  COALESCE(v2.PACKAGE_NO, v2.MATERIAL_NO)
  HAVING
  SUM(
   CASE
  WHEN IS_ISSUED != '1' THEN 1
  ELSE 0
   END
  ) > 0
   )
  GROUP BY
   COALESCE(
  v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
  v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
   )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '10' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   NULL AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_bdm_column.COLUMN_NAME AS `PSR_ID`,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   1 AS NUMBER,
   t_inm_store_info.NEW_WEIGHT AS `NET_WEIGHT`,
   t_inm_store_info.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_inm_store_info.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID,
   IF (
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH IS NOT NULL
  AND t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH != 0,
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  'C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_inm_store_info ON t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_NO = t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column t_bdm_column ON t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID = t_bdm_column.COLUMN_ID
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '10'
   AND t_inm_store_info.STOCK_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '30' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   t_pre_product_material.NUMBER AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   t_pre_product_material.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_pre_product_material.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STANDARD_ID AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,
   t_pre_product_material.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_pre_product_material ON t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
   OR t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30')
   AND t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.PRODUCT_NAME AS PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   NULL AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   NULL AS GROSS_WT,
   '/' AS STORE_ID,
   '/' AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_scrap.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   NULL AS specs,
   -- 单位测试
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT * t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE AS `PRICE`
  FROM

   LEFT JOIN t_pre_scrap ON t_pre_scrap.SCRAP_INFO_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID
  WHERE

   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40'
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO
  ) as temp on temp.MIXED_NO = t_dgm_send_info_detail.MIXED_NO
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store t_rmm_store on t_rmm_store.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location t_rmm_location on t_rmm_location.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard t_qdm_standard on t_qdm_standard.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID

WHERE

  AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401'
group by

JOIN t_pre_product_material ppm ON (scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.PACKAGE_NO OR scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.MATERIAL_NO) WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, NULL AS specs, ps.WEIGHT * scd.TAX_PRICE AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_pre_scrap ps ON ps.SCRAP_INFO_ID = scd.SCRAP_INFO_ID WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE = '40' AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY ps.BATCH_NO) SELECT temp.*, ts.STORE_NAME, tl.LOCATION_NAME, qs.STANDARD_NAME, bc.COLUMN_NAME AS STEEL_GRADE_NAME, dsi.SEND_ID AS CONNECT_ID, dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS CONNECT_DETAIL_ID, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dsid.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dsid.NUMBER, 0) END AS SEND_NUMBER, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dret.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dret.NUMBER, 0) END AS RETURN_NUMBER FROM t_dgm_send_info_detail dsid JOIN t_dgm_send_info dsi ON dsi.SEND_ID = dsid.SEND_ID AND dsi.SEND_STATE = '70' LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info_return_detail dret ON dret.CONNECT_DETAIL_ID = dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID JOIN union_materials temp ON temp.MIXED_NO = dsid.MIXED_NO AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401' LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store ts ON ts.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location tl ON tl.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard qs ON qs.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID LEFT JOIN   t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',

  ),

  )
   ) AS specs,

   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'

   AND t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')

Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_mpm;
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_rmm;
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS zjjs_qdm;
CREATE TABLE t_dgm_send_info_detail (SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, SEND_ID INT, MIXED_NO VARCHAR(50), SPOT_TYPE VARCHAR(10), WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), NUMBER INT, INDEX(SEND_ID), INDEX(MIXED_NO));
CREATE TABLE t_dgm_send_info (SEND_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, SEND_STATE VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE t_dgm_send_info_return_detail (CONNECT_DETAIL_ID INT, WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), NUMBER INT, INDEX(CONNECT_DETAIL_ID));
CREATE TABLE v_pre_product_material (PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID INT, PACKAGE_NO VARCHAR(50), MATERIAL_NO VARCHAR(50), PSR_ID VARCHAR(50), CUSTOMER_ID VARCHAR(50), CONTRACT_ID VARCHAR(50), CONTRACT_NO VARCHAR(50), NUMBER INT, NET_WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), GROSS_WT DECIMAL(10,2), STORE_ID VARCHAR(50), LOCATION_ID VARCHAR(50), STANDARD_ID VARCHAR(50), STEEL_GRADE VARCHAR(50), SURFACE_GROUP_DESC VARCHAR(100), CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID INT, THICK DECIMAL(10,2), WIDTH DECIMAL(10,2), LENGTH DECIMAL(10,2), CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID INT, IS_ISSUED VARCHAR(10), IS_SPOT_RESOURCE VARCHAR(10), NI36_TAG VARCHAR(10), MATERIAL_STATE VARCHAR(10), CONTRACT_TYPE VARCHAR(10));
CREATE TABLE t_dgm_send_plan_detail (MATERIAL_NO VARCHAR(50), PACKAGE_NO VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey (CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID INT, CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID INT, INDEX(CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID));
CREATE TABLE t_sam_contract_detail (CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID INT PRIMARY KEY, CONTRACT_ID VARCHAR(50), BUY_UNIT VARCHAR(10), TAX_PRICE DECIMAL(10,2), NUMBER INT, IN_TAX_TOTAL DECIMAL(10,2), PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO VARCHAR(50), SPOT_TYPE VARCHAR(10), IS_DELETE VARCHAR(10), SCRAP_INFO_ID INT);
CREATE TABLE t_sam_contract (CONTRACT_ID VARCHAR(50), CUSTOMER_ID VARCHAR(50), CONTRACT_NO VARCHAR(50), CONTRACT_TYPE VARCHAR(10), IS_DELETE VARCHAR(10), CONTRACT_STATE VARCHAR(10), INDEX(CONTRACT_ID));
CREATE TABLE t_inm_store_info (MATERIAL_NO VARCHAR(50), NEW_WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), GROSS_WT DECIMAL(10,2), STORE_ID VARCHAR(50), LOCATION_ID VARCHAR(50), STEEL_GRADE VARCHAR(50), VARIETY_ID VARCHAR(50), MATERIAL_LENGTH DECIMAL(10,2), MATERIAL_THICK DECIMAL(10,2), MATERIAL_WIDTH DECIMAL(10,2), STOCK_ID VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column (COLUMN_ID VARCHAR(50), COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE t_pre_product_material (PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID INT, PACKAGE_NO VARCHAR(50), MATERIAL_NO VARCHAR(50), PSR_ID VARCHAR(50), NUMBER INT, NET_WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), GROSS_WT DECIMAL(10,2), STORE_ID VARCHAR(50), LOCATION_ID VARCHAR(50), STANDARD_ID VARCHAR(50), STEEL_GRADE VARCHAR(50), SURFACE_GROUP_DESC VARCHAR(100), THICK DECIMAL(10,2), WIDTH DECIMAL(10,2), LENGTH DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE TABLE t_pre_scrap (SCRAP_INFO_ID INT, BATCH_NO VARCHAR(50), PRODUCT_NAME VARCHAR(100), WEIGHT DECIMAL(10,2), STEEL_GRADE VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store (STORE_ID VARCHAR(50), STORE_NAME VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location (LOCATION_ID VARCHAR(50), LOCATION_NAME VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard (STANDARD_ID VARCHAR(50), STANDARD_NAME VARCHAR(100));

## Original SQL:
SELECT
  temp.*,
  t_rmm_store.STORE_NAME,
  t_rmm_location.LOCATION_NAME,
  t_qdm_standard.STANDARD_NAME,
  t_bdm_column.COLUMN_NAME AS `STEEL_GRADE_NAME`,
  t_dgm_send_info.SEND_ID AS `CONNECT_ID`,
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS `CONNECT_DETAIL_ID`,
  IF (
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.WEIGHT, 0),
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_detail.NUMBER, 0)
  ) AS `SEND_NUMBER`,
  IF (
  t_dgm_send_info_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40',
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.WEIGHT, 0),
  IFNULL(t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.NUMBER, 0)
  ) AS `RETURN_NUMBER`
FROM
  t_dgm_send_info_detail
  LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info ON t_dgm_send_info.SEND_ID = t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_ID
  LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info_return_detail ON t_dgm_send_info_return_detail.CONNECT_DETAIL_ID = t_dgm_send_info_detail.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID
  LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
   v_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID,
   IFNULL(
  v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
  v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
   ) AS MIXED_NO,
   '30' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.PSR_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CUSTOMER_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_NO,
   v_pre_product_material.NUMBER,
   v_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT,
   v_pre_product_material.GROSS_WT,
   v_pre_product_material.STORE_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.LOCATION_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.STANDARD_ID,
   v_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,
   v_pre_product_material.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (v_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  v_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  v_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   SUM(
  IF (
  t_sam_contract_detail.BUY_UNIT = '10',
  -- 单位测试
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * v_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT,
  t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(t_sam_contract_detail.NUMBER, 1)
  )
   ) AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   v_pre_product_material
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO
   LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail ON t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID
  WHERE
   v_pre_product_material.IS_ISSUED = '1'
   AND v_pre_product_material.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.NI36_TAG = '0'
   AND v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_STATE != '110'
   AND v_pre_product_material.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60'
   AND NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT
  1
  FROM
  v_pre_product_material v2
  WHERE
  v2.PACKAGE_NO = v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
  OR v2.MATERIAL_NO = v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  GROUP BY
  COALESCE(v2.PACKAGE_NO, v2.MATERIAL_NO)
  HAVING
  SUM(
   CASE
  WHEN IS_ISSUED != '1' THEN 1
  ELSE 0
   END
  ) > 0
   )
  GROUP BY
   COALESCE(
  v_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO,
  v_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
   )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '10' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   NULL AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_bdm_column.COLUMN_NAME AS `PSR_ID`,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   1 AS NUMBER,
   t_inm_store_info.NEW_WEIGHT AS `NET_WEIGHT`,
   t_inm_store_info.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_inm_store_info.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID,
   IF (
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH IS NOT NULL
  AND t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH != 0,
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT_WS(
  "*",
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_THICK,
  t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_WIDTH,
  'C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_inm_store_info ON t_inm_store_info.MATERIAL_NO = t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
   LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column t_bdm_column ON t_inm_store_info.VARIETY_ID = t_bdm_column.COLUMN_ID
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '10'
   AND t_inm_store_info.STOCK_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   '30' AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_product_material.PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   t_pre_product_material.NUMBER AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_product_material.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   t_pre_product_material.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT,
   t_pre_product_material.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STANDARD_ID AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_product_material.STEEL_GRADE,
   t_pre_product_material.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   IF(
  (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH IS NOT NULL)
  AND (t_pre_product_material.LENGTH != 0),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.LENGTH
  ),
  CONCAT(
  t_pre_product_material.THICK,
  '*',
  t_pre_product_material.WIDTH,
  '*C'
  )
   ) AS specs,
   t_sam_contract_detail.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_pre_product_material ON t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.PACKAGE_NO
   OR t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = t_pre_product_material.MATERIAL_NO
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30')
   AND t_pre_product_material.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_sam_contract_detail.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
   t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID AS `PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MIXED_NO`,
   t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE AS SPOT_TYPE,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `MATERIAL_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO AS `PACKAGE_NO`,
   t_pre_scrap.PRODUCT_NAME AS PSR_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CUSTOMER_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID,
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_NO,
   NULL AS NUMBER,
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT,
   NULL AS GROSS_WT,
   '/' AS STORE_ID,
   '/' AS LOCATION_ID,
   NULL AS STANDARD_ID,
   t_pre_scrap.STEEL_GRADE,
   NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC,
   t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID,
   NULL AS VARIETY_ID,
   NULL AS specs,
   -- 单位测试
   t_pre_scrap.WEIGHT * t_sam_contract_detail.TAX_PRICE AS `PRICE`
  FROM
   t_sam_contract_detail
   LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract ON t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.CONTRACT_ID
   LEFT JOIN t_pre_scrap ON t_pre_scrap.SCRAP_INFO_ID = t_sam_contract_detail.SCRAP_INFO_ID
  WHERE
   t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract.IS_DELETE = '0'
   AND t_sam_contract_detail.SPOT_TYPE = '40'
   AND t_sam_contract.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70')
  GROUP BY
   t_pre_scrap.BATCH_NO
  ) as temp on temp.MIXED_NO = t_dgm_send_info_detail.MIXED_NO
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store t_rmm_store on t_rmm_store.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location t_rmm_location on t_rmm_location.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard t_qdm_standard on t_qdm_standard.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID
  LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column t_bdm_column on t_bdm_column.COLUMN_ID = temp.STEEL_GRADE
WHERE
  t_dgm_send_info.SEND_STATE = '70'
  AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401'
group by
  temp.MIXED_NO
having
  SEND_NUMBER > RETURN_NUMBER
LIMIT
  100

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimizedSQL: WITH union_materials AS ( SELECT v.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, IFNULL(v.PACKAGE_NO, v.MATERIAL_NO) AS MIXED_NO, '30' AS SPOT_TYPE, v.MATERIAL_NO, v.PACKAGE_NO, v.PSR_ID, v.CUSTOMER_ID, v.CONTRACT_ID, v.CONTRACT_NO, v.NUMBER, v.NET_WEIGHT, v.GROSS_WT, v.STORE_ID, v.LOCATION_ID, v.STANDARD_ID, v.STEEL_GRADE, v.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, v.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, CASE WHEN v.LENGTH IS NOT NULL AND v.LENGTH != 0 THEN CONCAT(v.THICK, '*', v.WIDTH, '*', v.LENGTH) ELSE CONCAT(v.THICK, '*', v.WIDTH, '*C') END AS specs, SUM(CASE WHEN scd.BUY_UNIT = '10' THEN scd.TAX_PRICE * v.NET_WEIGHT ELSE scd.TAX_PRICE * IFNULL(scd.NUMBER, 1) END) AS PRICE, v.IS_ISSUED, v.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE, v.NI36_TAG, v.MATERIAL_STATE, v.CONTRACT_TYPE FROM v_pre_product_material v LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail material ON v.MATERIAL_NO = material.MATERIAL_NO LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_plan_detail package ON v.PACKAGE_NO = package.PACKAGE_NO LEFT JOIN t_mao_contract_delivery_subkey mk ON mk.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID = v.CONTRACT_DELIVERY_ID LEFT JOIN t_sam_contract_detail scd ON mk.CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID = scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID WHERE v.IS_ISSUED = '1' AND v.IS_SPOT_RESOURCE = '0' AND v.NI36_TAG = '0' AND v.MATERIAL_STATE != '110' AND v.CONTRACT_TYPE != '60' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM v_pre_product_material v2 WHERE v2.IS_ISSUED != '1' AND (v2.PACKAGE_NO = v.PACKAGE_NO OR v2.MATERIAL_NO = v.MATERIAL_NO) LIMIT 1 ) GROUP BY COALESCE(v.PACKAGE_NO, v.MATERIAL_NO) UNION ALL SELECT scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MIXED_NO, '10' AS SPOT_TYPE, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MATERIAL_NO, NULL AS PACKAGE_NO, bc.COLUMN_NAME AS PSR_ID, sc.CUSTOMER_ID, sc.CONTRACT_ID, sc.CONTRACT_NO, 1 AS NUMBER, st.NEW_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, st.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT, st.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID, st.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, NULL AS STANDARD_ID, st.STEEL_GRADE, NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, st.VARIETY_ID, CASE WHEN st.MATERIAL_LENGTH IS NOT NULL AND st.MATERIAL_LENGTH != 0 THEN CONCAT_WS('*', st.MATERIAL_THICK, st.MATERIAL_WIDTH, st.MATERIAL_LENGTH) ELSE CONCAT_WS('*', st.MATERIAL_THICK, st.MATERIAL_WIDTH, 'C') END AS specs, scd.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_inm_store_info st ON st.MATERIAL_NO = scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column bc ON st.VARIETY_ID = bc.COLUMN_ID WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE = '10' AND st.STOCK_ID IS NOT NULL AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO UNION ALL SELECT ppm.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID AS PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MIXED_NO, '30' AS SPOT_TYPE, scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO AS MATERIAL_NO, ppm.PACKAGE_NO AS PACKAGE_NO, ppm.PSR_ID, sc.CUSTOMER_ID, sc.CONTRACT_ID, sc.CONTRACT_NO, ppm.NUMBER AS NUMBER, ppm.NET_WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, ppm.GROSS_WT AS GROSS_WT, ppm.STORE_ID AS STORE_ID, ppm.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID, ppm.STANDARD_ID AS STANDARD_ID, ppm.STEEL_GRADE, ppm.SURFACE_GROUP_DESC AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, CASE WHEN ppm.LENGTH IS NOT NULL AND ppm.LENGTH != 0 THEN CONCAT(ppm.THICK, '*', ppm.WIDTH, '*', ppm.LENGTH) ELSE CONCAT(ppm.THICK, '*', ppm.WIDTH, '*C') END AS specs, scd.IN_TAX_TOTAL AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_pre_product_material ppm ON (scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.PACKAGE_NO OR scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO = ppm.MATERIAL_NO) WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE IN ('20', '30') AND ppm.PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY scd.PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NO UNION ALL SELECT scd.SCRAP_INFO_ID AS PRODUCE_MATERIAL_ID, ps.BATCH_NO AS MIXED_NO, scd.SPOT_TYPE AS SPOT_TYPE, ps.BATCH_NO AS MATERIAL_NO, ps.BATCH_NO AS PACKAGE_NO, ps.PRODUCT_NAME AS PSR_ID, sc.CUSTOMER_ID, sc.CONTRACT_ID, sc.CONTRACT_NO, NULL AS NUMBER, ps.WEIGHT AS NET_WEIGHT, NULL AS GROSS_WT, '/' AS STORE_ID, '/' AS LOCATION_ID, NULL AS STANDARD_ID, ps.STEEL_GRADE, NULL AS SURFACE_GROUP_DESC, scd.CONTRACT_DETAILS_ID AS CONTRACT_DETAIL_ID, NULL AS VARIETY_ID, NULL AS specs, ps.WEIGHT * scd.TAX_PRICE AS PRICE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM t_sam_contract_detail scd JOIN t_sam_contract sc ON sc.CONTRACT_ID = scd.CONTRACT_ID JOIN t_pre_scrap ps ON ps.SCRAP_INFO_ID = scd.SCRAP_INFO_ID WHERE sc.CONTRACT_TYPE = '20' AND scd.IS_DELETE = '0' AND sc.IS_DELETE = '0' AND scd.SPOT_TYPE = '40' AND sc.CONTRACT_STATE IN ('40', '50', '70') GROUP BY ps.BATCH_NO) SELECT temp.*, ts.STORE_NAME, tl.LOCATION_NAME, qs.STANDARD_NAME, bc.COLUMN_NAME AS STEEL_GRADE_NAME, dsi.SEND_ID AS CONNECT_ID, dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID AS CONNECT_DETAIL_ID, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dsid.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dsid.NUMBER, 0) END AS SEND_NUMBER, CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dret.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dret.NUMBER, 0) END AS RETURN_NUMBER FROM t_dgm_send_info_detail dsid JOIN t_dgm_send_info dsi ON dsi.SEND_ID = dsid.SEND_ID AND dsi.SEND_STATE = '70' LEFT JOIN t_dgm_send_info_return_detail dret ON dret.CONNECT_DETAIL_ID = dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID JOIN union_materials temp ON temp.MIXED_NO = dsid.MIXED_NO AND temp.CUSTOMER_ID = '1930921074703462401' LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_store ts ON ts.STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_rmm.t_rmm_location tl ON tl.LOCATION_ID = temp.LOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_qdm.t_qdm_standard qs ON qs.STANDARD_ID = temp.STANDARD_ID LEFT JOIN zjjs_mpm.t_bdm_column bc ON bc.COLUMN_ID = temp.STEEL_GRADE GROUP BY dsid.SEND_PRODUCT_DETAIL_ID HAVING (CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dsid.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dsid.NUMBER, 0) END) > (CASE WHEN dsid.SPOT_TYPE = '40' THEN COALESCE(dret.WEIGHT, 0) ELSE COALESCE(dret.NUMBER, 0) END) LIMIT 100;

{"case_id": "45", "db_type": "postgresql", "description": "改写后的SQL直接将原始SQL中的WITH子句直接在句同为一层的查询中，移除了不必要的子查询结构（CTE），这是优化SQL编写方式的常用方法。在PostgreSQL处理用例，对于非递归的CTE，查询优化器通常能够直接优化内部逻辑，故改写可能带来可见提升效果不明显。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE Student (s_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, s_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, s_sex CHAR(1) NOT NULL);", "CREATE TABLE Score (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, s_id INTEGER NOT NULL, c_id INTEGER NOT NULL, s_score NUMERIC(5,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (s_id) REFERENCES Student (s_id));", "CREATE INDEX idx_score_s_id ON Score(s_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_score_s_score ON Score(s_score);", "CREATE INDEX idx_score_c_id ON Score(c_id);"], "sql": "WITH StudentStats AS (
  SELECT 
  s.s_id,
  s.s_name,
  s.s_sex,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sc.c_id) AS course_count,
  AVG(sc.s_score) AS avg_score,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excellent_course_count
  FROM Student s
  JOIN Score sc ON s.s_id = sc.s_id
  GROUP BY s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_sex
  HAVING AVG(sc.s_score) > 80 AND SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2
)
SELECT 
  ss.s_id,
  ss.s_name,
  ss.s_sex,
  ss.course_count,
  ss.avg_score,
  ss.excellent_course_count,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ss.s_sex ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC) AS gender_rank
FROM StudentStats ss
ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC;", "explain": "QUERY PLAN
Sort  (cost=87015.43..87154.32 rows=55556 width=74)
  Sort Key: ss.avg_score DESC
  ->  WindowAgg  (cost=79055.04..80166.16 rows=55556 width=74)
  ->  Sort  (cost=79055.04..79193.93 rows=55556 width=66)
  Sort Key: ss.s_sex, ss.avg_score DESC
  ->  Subquery Scan on ss  (cost=3.35..72394.76 rows=55556 width=66)
  ->  GroupAggregate  (cost=3.35..72394.76 rows=55556 width=66)
  Group Key: s.s_id
  Filter: ((avg(sc.s_score) > '80'::numeric) AND (sum(CASE WHEN (sc.s_score > '90'::numeric) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2))

  Sort Key: s.s_id, sc.c_id
  Presorted Key: s.s_id
  ->  Merge Join  (cost=3.27..34894.76 rows=500000 width=27)
  Merge Cond: (s.s_id = sc.s_id)
  ->  Index Scan using student_pkey on student s  (cost=0.42..16184.42 rows=500000 width=18)

## Original SQL:
WITH StudentStats AS (
  SELECT 
  s.s_id,
  s.s_name,
  s.s_sex,
  COUNT(DISTINCT sc.c_id) AS course_count,
  AVG(sc.s_score) AS avg_score,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excellent_course_count
  FROM Student s
  JOIN Score sc ON s.s_id = sc.s_id
  GROUP BY s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_sex
  HAVING AVG(sc.s_score) > 80 AND SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2
)
SELECT 
  ss.s_id,
  ss.s_name,
  ss.s_sex,
  ss.course_count,
  ss.avg_score,
  ss.excellent_course_count,
  RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ss.s_sex ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC) AS gender_rank
FROM StudentStats ss
ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC;

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.Optimized SQL: WITH StudentStats AS ( SELECT s.s_id, s.s_name, s.s_sex, COUNT(DISTINCT sc.c_id) AS course_count, AVG(sc.s_score) AS avg_score, SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS excellent_course_count FROM Student s JOIN Score sc ON s.s_id = sc.s_id GROUP BY s.s_id HAVING AVG(sc.s_score) > 80 AND SUM(CASE WHEN sc.s_score > 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 2 ) SELECT ss.s_id, ss.s_name, ss.s_sex, ss.course_count, ss.avg_score, ss.excellent_course_count, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY ss.s_sex ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC) AS gender_rank FROM StudentStats ss ORDER BY ss.avg_score DESC;

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH ranking_products AS ( SELECT o.user_id, p.product_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY o.user_id ORDER BY SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)) DESC) AS rank_num FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id GROUP BY o.user_id, p.product_name ), top_filtered AS ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT product_name ORDER BY product_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS top_products FROM ranking_products WHERE rank_num <= 3 GROUP BY user_id ) SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS total_orders, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS total_spent, COALESCE(AVG(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS avg_order_value, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date, tf.top_products FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN top_filtered tf ON tf.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.status = 'active' AND o.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) GROUP BY u.user_id, u.username HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 0 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

WITH ranking_products AS ( SELECT o.user_id, p.product_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY o.user_id ORDER BY SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)) DESC) AS rank_num FROM order_items oi JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON p.product_id = oi.product_id GROUP BY o.user_id, p.product_name ), top_filtered AS ( SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT product_name ORDER BY product_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS top_products FROM ranking_products WHERE rank_num <= 3 GROUP BY user_id ) SELECT u.user_id, u.username, COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) AS total_orders, COALESCE(SUM(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS total_spent, COALESCE(AVG(oi.quantity * oi.unit_price * (1 - oi.discount / 100)), 0) AS avg_order_value, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date, tf.top_products FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id LEFT JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN top_filtered tf ON tf.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.status = 'active' AND o.order_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 YEAR) GROUP BY u.user_id, u.username HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT o.order_id) > 0 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

model_answer.original: select *  from ( select base.vehicle_type, base.booking_status, base.payment_method, base.ride_distance, coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0) as rate,  row_number() over(partition by base.vehicle_type order by abs(coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0)) desc ) as rank_num  from ride_bookings base  left join (  select vehicle_type, booking_status,payment_method,coalesce(avg(ride_distance), 0) as avg_v  from ride_bookings   group by vehicle_type, booking_status,payment_method ) avg_cust_rate  on base.vehicle_type = avg_cust_rate.vehicle_type and base.booking_status = avg_cust_rate.booking_status and base.payment_method = avg_cust_rate.payment_method   where abs(coalesce(base.ride_distance, 0) - coalesce(avg_cust_rate.avg_v, 0)) >= 1  ) fn  where rank_num <=5;
model_answer.optimized: WITH avg_cust_rate AS (SELECT vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method, COALESCE(AVG(ride_distance), 0) AS avg_v FROM ride_bookings GROUP BY vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method), ranked AS (SELECT base.vehicle_type, base.booking_status, base.payment_method, base.ride_distance, (COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) AS rate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY base.vehicle_type ORDER BY ABS(COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) DESC, id) AS rank_num FROM ride_bookings base LEFT JOIN avg_cust_rate av ON base.vehicle_type = av.vehicle_type AND base.booking_status = av.booking_status AND base.payment_method = av.payment_method WHERE ABS(COALESCE(base.ride_distance, 0) - COALESCE(av.avg_v, 0)) >= 1) SELECT vehicle_type, booking_status, payment_method, ride_distance, rate FROM ranked WHERE rank_num <= 5;

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH customer_summary AS (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) AS total_bookings, SUM(booking_value) AS total_revenue, AVG(driver_rating) AS avg_driver_rating, MAX(booking_date) AS last_booking_date FROM ride_bookings WHERE booking_status IN ('Completed', 'Cancelled', 'No Show') AND booking_date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) > 10) SELECT customer_id, total_bookings, total_revenue, avg_driver_rating, last_booking_date FROM customer_summary ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, avg_driver_rating ASC;

WITH customer_summary AS (SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) AS total_bookings, SUM(booking_value) AS total_revenue, AVG(driver_rating) AS avg_driver_rating, MAX(booking_date) AS last_booking_date FROM ride_bookings WHERE booking_status IN ('Completed', 'Cancelled', 'No Show') AND booking_date >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT booking_id) > 10) SELECT customer_id, total_bookings, total_revenue, avg_driver_rating, last_booking_date FROM customer_summary ORDER BY total_revenue DESC, avg_driver_rating ASC;

tumod.DLR_ID = c.DLR_ID INNER JOIN T_USC_MDM_ORG_CITY CI ON CI.CITY_ID = tumod.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_zb_stock tvdzs ON tvdzs.ZB_STOCK_ID = c.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_car_stock_house tvdcsh ON tvdcsh.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID = c.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN T_VE_DB_CAR_STOCK_HOUSE SHd ON SHd.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID = c.CAR_SALE_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_ve_car_optionalpag optionl ON optionl.OPTIONAL_PAG_ID = CAR.OPTIONAL_PAG_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_car_color cols ON cols.CAR_COLOR_ID = CAR.CAR_COLOR_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_car_incolor incol ON incol.CAR_INCOLOR_ID = CAR.CAR_INCOLOR_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_car_stock_house oge ON oge.CAR_HOUSE_CODE = SOD.DELIVERY_FAC_HW_CODE LEFT JOIN t_ve_finance_wholesale_purchase_order ord ON ord.SALES_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN t_ve_bu_invoice_info_upload tvbiiu ON tvbiiu.WHOLESALE_PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE = ord.WHOLESALE_PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE AND tvbiiu.IS_ENABLE = '1' LEFT JOIN t_prc_mds_lookup_value v5 ON v5.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = ord.ORDER_STATUS AND v5.LOOKUP_TYPE_CODE = 'VE1414' LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE) AS PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE, SALE_PLAN_CODE FROM t_ve_bu_purchase_order GROUP BY SALE_PLAN_CODE) purchase ON purchase.SALE_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE WHERE c.IS_ENABLE = '1'

t_ve_bu_sale_order_d SOD ON SOD.SALE_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN t_ve_bu_sale_order SO ON SO.SALE_ORDER_ID = SOD.SALE_ORDER_ID INNER JOIN t_mdm_ve_car_config con ON con.CAR_CONFIG_ID = CAR.CAR_CONFIG_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_bu_inv_apply_d iad ON iad.link_order_id = SO.SALE_ORDER_ID AND iad.is_Enable = '1' LEFT JOIN (SELECT t1.MOVESTOCK_ORDER_CODE, t1.CAR_ID, t1.AUDIT_STATUS, t1.NEW_HOUSE_ID, t1.NEW_DLR_ID FROM t_ve_bu_movestock_order t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(MOVESTOCK_ORDER_CODE) AS MOVESTOCK_ORDER_CODE FROM t_ve_bu_movestock_order WHERE VIN IS NOT NULL GROUP BY VIN) t2 ON t1.MOVESTOCK_ORDER_CODE = t2.MOVESTOCK_ORDER_CODE) mo ON mo.CAR_ID = c.CAR_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_bu_month_plan_d mpd ON mpd.SALES_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE INNER JOIN t_usc_mdm_org_dlr tumod ON tumod.DLR_ID = c.DLR_ID INNER JOIN T_USC_MDM_ORG_CITY CI ON CI.CITY_ID = tumod.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_zb_stock tvdzs ON tvdzs.ZB_STOCK_ID = c.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_car_stock_house tvdcsh ON tvdcsh.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID = c.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN T_VE_DB_CAR_STOCK_HOUSE SHd ON SHd.CAR_STOCK_HOUSE_ID = c.CAR_SALE_HOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_ve_car_optionalpag optionl ON optionl.OPTIONAL_PAG_ID = CAR.OPTIONAL_PAG_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_car_color cols ON cols.CAR_COLOR_ID = CAR.CAR_COLOR_ID LEFT JOIN t_mdm_car_incolor incol ON incol.CAR_INCOLOR_ID = CAR.CAR_INCOLOR_ID LEFT JOIN t_ve_db_car_stock_house oge ON oge.CAR_HOUSE_CODE = SOD.DELIVERY_FAC_HW_CODE LEFT JOIN t_ve_finance_wholesale_purchase_order ord ON ord.SALES_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE LEFT JOIN t_ve_bu_invoice_info_upload tvbiiu ON tvbiiu.WHOLESALE_PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE = ord.WHOLESALE_PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE AND tvbiiu.IS_ENABLE = '1' LEFT JOIN t_prc_mds_lookup_value v5 ON v5.LOOKUP_VALUE_CODE = ord.ORDER_STATUS AND v5.LOOKUP_TYPE_CODE = 'VE1414' LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE) AS PURCHASE_ORDER_CODE, SALE_PLAN_CODE FROM t_ve_bu_purchase_order GROUP BY SALE_PLAN_CODE) purchase ON purchase.SALE_PLAN_CODE = c.SALES_PLAN_CODE WHERE c.IS_ENABLE = '1'

{"case_id": "50", "db_type": "sqlserver", "description": "该SQL查询用于筛选特定的索赔记录（claim），逻辑上包含复杂的`OR`条件关联查询和用于去重的关联子查询。存在的主要性能瓶颈：1. **无输出的JOIN操作**：查询对`serie`表进行了两次LEFT JOIN（分别作为`serie`和`exchange_serie`），但在SELECT列表中并未请求这些表的任何字段，仅用于WHERE子句的过滤。这种写法增加了不必要的连接开销。2. **谓词未下推**：WHERE子句中包含跨表的`OR`逻辑 `(A AND B) OR (C AND D)`，这通常阻止优化器有效地利用索引进行过滤，导致优化器可能选择扫描整个`claim`表后再进行过滤，而不是先通过索引定位。3. **昂贵的关联子查询**：为了保留每个`claim_folder_id`下的最新记录，使用了关联子查询 `c.id = (SELECT MAX(...) ...)`，这会导致对每一行结果都执行一次子查询（N+1问题），在数据量大时性能急剧下降。", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE claim (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000), claim_folder_id int, repair_date datetime, claim_status_id int, is_e2e bit, serie_id int, exchange_serie_id int, serial_number nvarchar(4000), production_code nvarchar(4000), exchange_serial_number nvarchar(4000), exchange_production_code nvarchar(4000));", "CREATE TABLE serie (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000));", "CREATE INDEX idx_claim_folder ON claim(claim_folder_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_claim_serial ON claim(serial_number);", "CREATE INDEX idx_serie_sap ON serie(sap_code);"], "sql": "SELECT c.id,

ORDER BY c.id DESC

case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.

Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE claim (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000), claim_folder_id int, repair_date datetime, claim_status_id int, is_e2e bit, serie_id int, exchange_serie_id int, serial_number nvarchar(4000), production_code nvarchar(4000), exchange_serial_number nvarchar(4000), exchange_production_code nvarchar(4000));
CREATE TABLE serie (id int PRIMARY KEY, sap_code nvarchar(4000));
CREATE INDEX idx_claim_folder ON claim(claim_folder_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_claim_serial ON claim(serial_number);
CREATE INDEX idx_serie_sap ON serie(sap_code);

                 |    |--Index Seek(OBJECT:([serie] AS [serie]), SEEK:([serie].[id]=[c].[serie_id]))
                 |--Index Seek(OBJECT:([serie] AS [exchange_serie]), SEEK:([exchange_serie].[id]=[c].[exchange_serie_id]))
            |--Stream Aggregate(DEFINE:([Expr1009]=MAX([c2].[id])))

## Original SQL:
SELECT c.id, 
   c.sap_code,

   c.is_e2e AS e2e 
FROM claim c 
LEFT JOIN serie 
ON serie.id = c.serie_id 
LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie 
ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id 
WHERE ( ((serie.sap_code = @P0 
OR serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P1)) 
AND c.serial_number = @P2 
AND c.production_code = @P3) 
OR ((exchange_serie.sap_code = @P4 
OR exchange_serie.sap_code = CONCAT('4000', @P5)) 
AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6 
AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7) ) 
AND (c.serial_number NOT IN (@P8) 
AND c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)) 
AND c.id = 
   (
   SELECT MAX(c2.id) 
   FROM claim c2 
   WHERE c2.claim_folder_id = c.claim_folder_id 
   OR (c.claim_folder_id IS NULL 
  AND c2.id = c.id)
   ) 
ORDER BY c.id DESC

nvarchar(4000),@P6 nvarchar(4000),@P7 nvarchar(4000),@P8 nvarchar(4000),@P9 nvarchar(4000),@P10  
nvarchar(4000),@P11 nvarchar(4000)) 
/* BEGIN ACTIVE SECTION (comment inserted by DPA) */  
SELECT c.id,

FROM claim c

LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie  
ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT c.id, c.sap_code, c.claim_folder_id, DATEDIFF(day, c.repair_date, GETDATE()) AS DATE_REPAIR_DIFF, c.claim_status_id AS status, c.is_e2e AS e2e FROM claim c INNER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN claim_folder_id IS NULL THEN id ELSE MAX(id) OVER (PARTITION BY claim_folder_id) END AS max_id FROM claim) AS latest ON c.id = latest.max_id LEFT JOIN serie ON serie.id = c.serie_id LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id WHERE ((serie.sap_code IN (@P0, CONCAT('4000', @P1)) AND c.serial_number = @P2 AND c.production_code = @P3) OR (exchange_serie.sap_code IN (@P4, CONCAT('4000', @P5)) AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6 AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7)) AND (c.serial_number <> @P8) AND (c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)) ORDER BY c.id DESC

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT c.id, c.sap_code, c.claim_folder_id, DATEDIFF(day, c.repair_date, GETDATE()) AS DATE_REPAIR_DIFF, c.claim_status_id AS status, c.is_e2e AS e2e FROM claim c INNER JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN claim_folder_id IS NULL THEN id ELSE MAX(id) OVER (PARTITION BY claim_folder_id) END AS max_id FROM claim) AS latest ON c.id = latest.max_id LEFT JOIN serie ON serie.id = c.serie_id LEFT JOIN serie exchange_serie ON exchange_serie.id = c.exchange_serie_id WHERE ((serie.sap_code IN (@P0, CONCAT('4000', @P1)) AND c.serial_number = @P2 AND c.production_code = @P3) OR (exchange_serie.sap_code IN (@P4, CONCAT('4000', @P5)) AND c.exchange_serial_number = @P6 AND c.exchange_production_code = @P7)) AND (c.serial_number <> @P8) AND (c.production_code NOT IN (@P9, @P10, @P11)) ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT student_id, MAX(enrollment_date) latest_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '1993-11-26' OR enrollment_date < '1991-11-26' GROUP BY student_id HAVING student_id = 1999

{"case_id": "21", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "本次改写的核心技术是将score_model_factor表的JOIN转换为EXISTS子查询。原SQL中,虽然JOIN了score_model_factor表,但SELECT子句中并未使用该表的任何列(仅用于过滤),这正是JOIN转EXISTS优化的典型场景。改写后,通过EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM score_model_factor f WHERE f.model_factor_id = t.model_factor_id)实现了相同的语义:只有当SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL.model_factor_id在score_model_factor表中存在时,该行才被保留。EXISTS的优势在于:(1)利用主键索引快速验证;(2)找到第一条匹配记录即返回TRUE,无需扫描所有匹配行;(3)不需要传递score_model_factor的列数据,减少内存和网络开销。", "difficulty_level": "2", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_record_seq; ## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_record_seq; CREATE TABLE SCORE_RATING_RECORD (score_rating_record_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, rpt_dt DATE NOT NULL); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER score_rating_record_bi BEFORE INSERT ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.score_rating_record_id IS NULL THEN SELECT score_rating_record_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.score_rating_record_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_region_record_seq; CREATE TABLE score_rating_region_record (score_rating_region_record_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, score_rating_record_id NUMBER NOT NULL, region_cd VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER score_rating_region_record_bi BEFORE INSERT ON score_rating_region_record FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.score_rating_region_record_id IS NULL THEN SELECT score_rating_region_record_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.score_rating_region_record_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_srr_score_rating_record_id ON score_rating_region_record(score_rating_record_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_srr_region_cd ON score_rating_region_record(region_cd);
CREATE SEQUENCE score_rating_record_detail_seq; CREATE TABLE SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL (score_rating_record_detail_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, score_rating_region_record_id NUMBER NOT NULL, model_factor_id NUMBER NOT NULL, factor_cd VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, factor_value NUMBER(18,4), option_init VARCHAR2(100)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER score_rating_record_detail_bi BEFORE INSERT ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.score_rating_record_detail_id IS NULL THEN SELECT score_rating_record_detail_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.score_rating_record_detail_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_srrd_region_record_id ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL(score_rating_region_record_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_srrd_model_factor_id ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL(model_factor_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_srrd_factor_cd ON SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL(factor_cd);
CREATE SEQUENCE score_model_factor_seq; CREATE TABLE score_model_factor (model_factor_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, factor_name VARCHAR2(100), factor_desc VARCHAR2(500)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER score_model_factor_bi BEFORE INSERT ON score_model_factor FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.model_factor_id IS NULL THEN SELECT score_model_factor_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.model_factor_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT /*+ LEADING(a s t f) USE_NL(s) USE_NL(t) INDEX(t IDX_SRRD_REGION_RECORD_ID) */ a.rpt_dt, s.region_cd, t.factor_cd, t.factor_value, t.option_init FROM SCORE_RATING_RECORD a INNER JOIN score_rating_region_record s ON a.score_rating_record_id = s.score_rating_record_id INNER JOIN SCORE_RATING_RECORD_DETAIL t ON s.score_rating_region_record_id = t.score_rating_region_record_id INNER JOIN score_model_factor f ON f.model_factor_id = t.model_factor_id WHERE a.score_rating_record_id = 1951215209649586177 ORDER BY s.region_cd, t.factor_cd;

END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_xmbi_type_id ON XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO(TYPE_ID);"], "sql": "SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (

SELECT mfbi.pkid,mfbi.FD_FILE_NAME,mfbi.FD_NO fdNo,w.sumNumber countNumber FROM (
  SELECT  max(FD_MODEL_ID) FD_MODEL_ID,sum(countNumber) sumNumber ,max(FD_FILE_ID) FD_FILE_ID FROM (
  SELECT FD_MODEL_ID,count(1) countNumber from
  SYS_READ_HIS_LOG WHERE FD_MODEL_NAME= 'com.xmair.core.entity.DO.XmairManualFileNew' AND  FD_MODEL_ID IS NOT NULL
  <if test="startDate != null and startDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  <if test="endDate != null and endDate != ''">
   and FD_READ_TIME <= to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd')
  </if>
  GROUP BY FD_MODEL_ID ) t LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE mf ON mf.FD_ID = t.FD_MODEL_ID
  GROUP BY FD_FILE_ID order by  sumNumber desc ) w
  LEFT JOIN MANUAL_FILE_BASIC_INFO mfbi
  ON mfbi.PKID = w.FD_FILE_ID
  left join XMAIR_MANUAL_BASIC_INFO xmbi  ON xmbi.PKID  = mfbi.MANUAL_ID
  <where>
   mfbi.IS_DELETED = '0'
   <if test=" typeIdsByMfId != null  and typeIdsByMfId.size>0">
  and  xmbi.TYPE_ID in
  <foreach collection="typeIdsByMfId" item="typeId" open="(" separator="," close=")">
  #{typeId}
  </foreach>
   </if>
   and rownum <![CDATA[ <= ]]> 10

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE mrtopration_seq; CREATE TABLE mrtopration (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, PRAMARYID NUMBER, OPERCODE VARCHAR2(50), OPERNAME VARCHAR2(100), OPERDEPT VARCHAR2(100), OPERDATE DATE NOT NULL, MARK VARCHAR2(500), MARK2 VARCHAR2(500), MARK3 VARCHAR2(500), MARK4 VARCHAR2(500), OPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), NEXTOPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), PREOPERTYPE VARCHAR2(50), VALID NUMBER(1), CONFIRMUSER VARCHAR2(100), CONFIRMDEPT VARCHAR2(100), VERSIONNUMBER NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER mrtopration_bi BEFORE INSERT ON mrtopration FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.ID IS NULL THEN SELECT mrtopration_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.ID FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_mrtopration_operdate ON mrtopration(OPERDATE);

SELECT A.ID AS id, A.PRAMARYID AS primaryId, A.OPERCODE AS operCode, A.OPERNAME AS operName, A.OPERDEPT AS operDept, A.OPERDATE AS operDate, A.MARK AS mark, C.BACKREASON AS mark1, A.MARK2 AS mark2, A.MARK3 AS mark3, A.MARK4 AS mark4, A.OPERTYPE AS operType, A.NEXTOPERTYPE AS nextOperType, A.PREOPERTYPE AS preOperType, A.VALID AS valid, A.CONFIRMUSER AS confirmUser, A.CONFIRMDEPT AS confirmDept, A.VERSIONNUMBER AS versionNumber, B.IN_TIMES AS inTimes, B.NAME AS patient, B.IN_DATE AS inDate, B.OUT_DATE AS outDate, B.OUT_DEPT AS outDept, B.RECORD_STATE AS recordState FROM mrtopration A LEFT JOIN mrtrecordinfo B ON A.ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN mrtrecordregresses C ON B.ID = C.RECODE_NO AND A.OPERDATE = C.OPER_DATE AND A.OPERCODE = C.OPERID WHERE A.ID IN (SELECT bid FROM (SELECT B.ID AS bid, B.IN_DATE AS inDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.IN_DATE DESC) AS rn FROM mrtopration A LEFT JOIN mrtrecordinfo B ON A.ID = B.ID WHERE B.ID LIKE :"SYS_B_0" || :1 || :" SYS_B_1" GROUP BY B.ID, B.IN_DATE) WHERE rn BETWEEN :2 + :"SYS_B_2" AND :3 + :4 ) ORDER BY A.OPERDATE DESC

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.Explain Output Analysis: The query plan reveals critical inefficiencies, including an outer nested loops join (cost 3,714) after a hash join semi on MRTRECORDINFO (cost 3,413). Notably, the execution plan involves a WINDOW NOSORT STOPKEY operation (step 14) indicating the use of ROW_NUMBER() for pagination. However, the suboptimal structure may arise from redundant operations: the nested loops outer (cost 3724) follows a hash join, which could imply inefficiency due to join order. Additionally, a full table scan on MRTRECORDINFO (cost 2081) suggests the queries' predicates do not effectively leverage indexes. Furthermore, the original query uses an inefficient pagination subquery with a GROUP BY clause that may not be necessary; the subquery also lacks appropriate filters, contributing to increased cardinality estimates. The presence of additional joins in the outer query may be causing repeated filtering, indicating opportunities for simplification through materialized views or restructuring. The query plan also shows many redundant table accesses that could be merged.
model_answer.Optimization Strategy: 1. Use a simpler pagination approach by replacing the nested subquery with a direct SELECT on the relevant columns, avoiding unnecessary ROW_NUMBER() over a fully scanned set when only a subset is required; the window function should be applied after filtering to reduce data scanning. 2. Introduce CTEs (Common Table Expressions) to precompute the IDs needed for pagination, ensuring pagination is performed on the reduced set before other joins, thus minimizing cost. 3. Apply conditions directly within the CTE to limit rows as much as possible—this may involve moving the LIKE filter earlier. 4. Ensure the CTE uses the index on MRTRECORDINFO.IN_DATE to allow the WINDOW NOSORT STOPKEY to work efficiently. 5. Change the join order for better performance; start with the mrtrecordinfo table filtered by the LIKE condition, then join to mrtopration, and finally to mrtrecordregresses, as this matches the indexes. 6. Use a direct join instead of LEFT JOIN on mrtrecordinfo for WHERE conditions that are not null to enable better optimizations; the original query's LEFT JOIN may be transformed to an inner join. 7. Consider materializing the CTE if the result set is large; however, this can be handled by the database's query planner. 8. Additionally, ensure that the IDs selected are from mrtrecordinfo, as the original subquery only references B.ID (mrtrecordinfo.ID) but the outer query's IN clause uses A.ID. This might be a logical error; the query should be adjusted to filter on mrtrecordinfo's ID directly.

{"case_id": "24", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "这是一种经典的UNION ALL消除优化技术。当UNION ALL的多个分支查询相同的表，且仅在SELECT列表的计算逻辑或WHERE条件的常量值上有差异时，可以通过CASE表达式将不同的计算逻辑统一到一个SELECT语句中。改写的核心是将'metric_name IN (集合1) 返回round(VALUE,2)'和'metric_name IN (集合2) 返回round(VALUE*10,2)'两个分支，合并为'metric_name IN (集合1+集合2) 返回CASE WHEN...END'。这样WHERE条件从两次分别过滤变为一次过滤更大的集合，SELECT列表使用CASE根据metric_name动态选择计算方式。这种改写在保证逻辑等价的前提下，显著减少了I/O操作。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE gv_session_seq; CREATE TABLE gv$session (session_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, inst_id NUMBER NOT NULL, TYPE VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR2(20)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER gv_session_bi BEFORE INSERT ON gv$session FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.session_id IS NULL THEN SELECT gv_session_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.session_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_gv_session_inst_id ON gv$session(inst_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_gv_session_type_status ON gv$session(TYPE, status);", "CREATE SEQUENCE gv_sysmetric_seq; CREATE TABLE gv$sysmetric (metric_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, inst_id NUMBER NOT NULL, end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, metric_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, VALUE NUMBER(20,2), intsize_csec NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER gv_sysmetric_bi BEFORE INSERT ON gv$sysmetric FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.metric_id IS NULL THEN SELECT gv_sysmetric_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.metric_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_gv_sysmetric_inst_id ON gv$sysmetric(inst_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_gv_sysmetric_intsize ON gv$sysmetric(intsize_csec);", "CREATE INDEX idx_gv_sysmetric_metric_name ON gv$sysmetric(metric_name);"], "sql": "SELECT
  c.inst_id,
  m.end_time AS checktime,
  c.conn,
  c.activeconn,
  m.sqlthroughput,
  m.sqlavgtime,
  m.user_commits,
  m.user_rollbacks,
  m.user_commits + m.user_rollbacks AS transactioncount,
  m.transactionavgtime
FROM
  (
  WITH
   t1 AS (
  SELECT
  inst_id,
  COUNT(*) conn
  FROM
  gv$session
  WHERE
  TYPE = 'USER'
  GROUP BY
  inst_id
   ),
   t2 AS (
  SELECT
  inst_id,
  COUNT(*) activeconn
  FROM
  gv$session
  WHERE
  TYPE = 'USER'
  AND status = 'ACTIVE'
  GROUP BY
  inst_id
   )
  SELECT
   t1.inst_id,
   t1.conn,
   t2.activeconn
  FROM
   t1,
   t2
  WHERE
   t1.inst_id = t2.inst_id
  ) c,
  (
  SELECT
   *
  FROM
   (
  SELECT
  inst_id,
  end_time,
  metric_name,
  round(VALUE, 2) VALUE
  FROM
  gv$sysmetric
  WHERE
  round(intsize_csec / 100, 0) = 60
  AND metric_name IN (
   'Executions Per Sec',
   'User Commits Per Sec',
   'User Rollbacks Per Sec'
  )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
  inst_id,
  end_time,
  metric_name,
  round(VALUE * 10, 2) VALUE
  FROM
  gv$sysmetric
  WHERE
  round(intsize_csec / 100, 0) = 60
  AND metric_name IN (
   'SQL Service Response Time',
   'Response Time Per Txn'
  )
   ) PIVOT (
  AVG(VALUE) FOR metric_name IN (
  'Executions Per Sec' sqlthroughput,
  'SQL Service Response Time' sqlavgtime,
  'User Commits Per Sec' user_commits,
  'User Rollbacks Per Sec' user_rollbacks,
  'Response Time Per Txn' transactionavgtime
  )
   )
  ) m
WHERE
  c.inst_id = m.inst_id
ORDER BY
  inst_id", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST

  )
   ) PIVOT (
  AVG(VALUE) FOR metric_name IN (
  'Executions Per Sec' sqlthroughput,
  'SQL Service Response Time' sqlavgtime,
  'User Commits Per Sec' user_commits,
  'User Rollbacks Per Sec' user_rollbacks,
  'Response Time Per Txn' transactionavgtime
  )
   )
  ) m
WHERE
  c.inst_id = m.inst_id
ORDER BY
  inst_id

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH t1 AS (SELECT inst_id, COUNT(*) conn FROM gv$session WHERE TYPE = 'USER' GROUP BY inst_id), t2 AS (SELECT inst_id, COUNT(*) activeconn FROM gv$session WHERE TYPE = 'USER' AND status = 'ACTIVE' GROUP BY inst_id), base_metrics AS (SELECT inst_id, end_time, metric_name, CASE WHEN metric_name IN ('SQL Service Response Time', 'Response Time Per Txn') THEN ROUND(VALUE * 10, 2) ELSE ROUND(VALUE, 2) END AS VALUE FROM gv$sysmetric WHERE intsize_csec = 6000 AND metric_name IN ('Executions Per Sec', 'User Commits Per Sec', 'User Rollbacks Per Sec', 'SQL Service Response Time', 'Response Time Per Txn')) SELECT c.inst_id, m.end_time AS checktime, c.conn, c.activeconn, m.sqlthroughput, m.sqlavgtime, m.user_commits, m.user_rollbacks, m.user_commits + m.user_rollbacks AS transactioncount, m.transactionavgtime FROM (SELECT t1.inst_id, t1.conn, t2.activeconn FROM t1 JOIN t2 ON t1.inst_id = t2.inst_id) c CROSS APPLY (SELECT end_time, AVG(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Executions Per Sec' THEN VALUE END) AS sqlthroughput, AVG(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'SQL Service Response Time' THEN VALUE END) AS sqlavgtime, AVG(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'User Commits Per Sec' THEN VALUE END) AS user_commits, AVG(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'User Rollbacks Per Sec' THEN VALUE END) AS user_rollbacks, AVG(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'Response Time Per Txn' THEN VALUE END) AS transactionavgtime FROM base_metrics m WHERE m.inst_id = c.inst_id GROUP BY end_time) m ORDER BY c.inst_id

WITH detail_agg AS ( SELECT A.tenant_id, A.gl_account_id, B.acctg_period, SUM(A.base_posted_dr) AS base_posted_dr1, SUM(A.base_posted_cr) AS base_posted_cr1 FROM acctg_trans_detail A FORCE INDEX (idx_tenant_id) INNER JOIN acctg_trans B FORCE INDEX (PRIMARY) ON A.master_voucher_id = B.id AND A.tenant_id = B.tenant_id AND B.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 WHERE A.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 AND (A.voucher_status_enum IS NULL OR A.voucher_status_enum != 'CANCELLED') AND (B.bo_name IS NULL OR B.bo_name != 'DraftAcctgTrans') GROUP BY A.tenant_id, A.gl_account_id, B.acctg_period ) SELECT acctg.tenant_id, acctg.gl_account_id, ac.code, acctg.acctg_period, A.base_posted_dr, A.base_posted_cr, acctg.base_posted_dr1, acctg.base_posted_cr1 FROM detail_agg acctg LEFT JOIN gl_account_balance A FORCE INDEX (idx_gl_account_period) ON A.gl_account_id = acctg.gl_account_id AND A.acctg_period = acctg.acctg_period AND A.tenant_id = acctg.tenant_id AND A.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 LEFT JOIN gl_account ac ON ac.id = acctg.gl_account_id AND ac.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 WHERE (acctg.base_posted_dr1 <> IFNULL(A.base_posted_dr, 0) OR acctg.base_posted_cr1 <> IFNULL(A.base_posted_cr, 0)) UNION ALL SELECT A.tenant_id, A.gl_account_id, ac.code, A.acctg_period, A.base_posted_dr, A.base_posted_cr, acctg.base_posted_dr1, acctg.base_posted_cr1 FROM gl_account_balance A FORCE INDEX (idx_gl_account_period) LEFT JOIN detail_agg acctg ON A.gl_account_id = acctg.gl_account_id AND A.acctg_period = acctg.acctg_period AND A.tenant_id = acctg.tenant_id LEFT JOIN gl_account ac ON ac.id = A.gl_account_id AND ac.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 WHERE A.tenant_id = 1065587309019136 AND A.acctg_period NOT LIKE '%00' AND (A.base_posted_dr <> IFNULL(acctg.base_posted_dr1, 0) OR A.base_posted_cr <> IFNULL(acctg.base_posted_cr1, 0)) LIMIT 50001;

 select * from (
 select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY member_num ORDER BY id desc)a,
 member_num,balance,created_on
 from cash_transaction where cash_type=2 )a
 where a=1 and balance<>0)

 full outer join

 on a.member_num=b.member_num

 or a.member_num is null

## Original SQL:
with temp as(
 select * from (
 select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY member_num ORDER BY id desc)a,
 member_num,balance,created_on
 from cash_transaction where cash_type=2 )a
 where a=1 and balance<>0)
 select * from temp a 
 full outer join
 ( select * from  cash where  credit_available<>0)b
 on a.member_num=b.member_num
 where a.balance<>b.credit_available
 or a.member_num is null
 or b.member_num is null

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT COALESCE(ct.member_num, c.member_num) AS member_num, ct.ranked_balance, c.credit_available FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ON (member_num) member_num, balance, created_on FROM cash_transaction WHERE cash_type = 2 AND balance <> 0 ORDER BY member_num, id DESC) ct FULL OUTER JOIN cash c ON c.member_num = ct.member_num AND c.credit_available <> 0 WHERE ct.balance IS DISTINCT FROM c.credit_available OR ct.member_num IS NULL OR c.member_num IS NULL;

{"case_id": "28", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "本次改写主要做了两方面优化：1) 消除了子查询中计算但从未使用的first_tran_date字段，减少了一次min()聚合操作；2) 将onhold_accounts这个内联视图展开，直接在主查询中JOIN audit_header和audit_detail表，并将过滤条件移到WHERE子句中。这种改写理论上可以给优化器更多的优化空间，但由于原SQL结构已经较为优化，实际收益有限。", "difficulty_level": "3", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE accounts_seq; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_acch_account_no ON account_headers(acch_account_no);", "CREATE SEQUENCE account_types_seq; CREATE TABLE account_types (act_code VARCHAR2(20) PRIMARY KEY, act_long_name VARCHAR2(100)); CREATE TABLE audit_header (audh_seqno NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, audh_key1 VARCHAR2(50), audh_key2 VARCHAR2(50), audh_date DATE, audh_table_prefix VARCHAR2(20), audh_change_type VARCHAR2(10)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER audit_header_bi BEFORE INSERT ON audit_header FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.audh_seqno IS NULL THEN SELECT audit_header_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.audh_seqno FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_audh_keys ON audit_header(audh_key1, audh_key2);", "CREATE INDEX idx_audh_table_prefix ON audit_header(audh_table_prefix);", "CREATE INDEX idx_audh_change_type ON audit_header(audh_change_type);", "CREATE SEQUENCE audit_detail_seq; CREATE TABLE audit_detail (audd_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, audd_audh_seqno NUMBER NOT NULL, audd_col_sufix VARCHAR2(50), audd_old_value VARCHAR2(200), audd_new_value VARCHAR2(200)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER audit_detail_bi BEFORE INSERT ON audit_detail FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.audd_id IS NULL THEN SELECT audit_detail_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.audd_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_audd_audh_seqno ON audit_detail(audd_audh_seqno);", "CREATE INDEX idx_audd_col_sufix ON audit_detail(audd_col_sufix);", "CREATE SEQUENCE account_links_seq; CREATE TABLE ACCOUNT_LINKS (accl_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, accl_account_no VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, accl_subacc_no VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, accl_holder_pos NUMBER, accl_cust_seqno NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER account_links_bi BEFORE INSERT ON ACCOUNT_LINKS FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.accl_id IS NULL THEN SELECT account_links_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.accl_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_accl_account_subacc ON ACCOUNT_LINKS(accl_account_no, accl_subacc_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_accl_holder_pos ON ACCOUNT_LINKS(accl_holder_pos);", "CREATE SEQUENCE account_holding_tax_seq; CREATE TABLE SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX (acctax_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, ACCTAX_ACCOUNT_NO VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, ACCTAX_SUBACC_NO VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, ACCTAX_CUST_SEQNO NUMBER, ACCTAX_EFF_DATE_FROM DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER account_holding_tax_bi BEFORE INSERT ON SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.acctax_id IS NULL THEN SELECT account_holding_tax_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.acctax_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_acctax_composite ON SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX(ACCTAX_ACCOUNT_NO, ACCTAX_SUBACC_NO, ACCTAX_CUST_SEQNO);"], "sql": "SELECT DISTINCT acc_account_no, 
  acc_subacc_no, 
  acch_title,
  to_char(acc_incep_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') acc_incep_date,
  htax.ACCTAX_EFF_DATE_FROM,
  to_char(onhold_accounts.audh_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY') approved_date,
  act_long_name, 
  tran_amount_cr,
  tran_create_by,
  CASE WHEN (trunc(acc_incep_date) - trunc(onhold_accounts.audh_date)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE
   (trunc(acc_incep_date) - trunc(onhold_accounts.audh_date)) END time_on_approved,
  acch_brn_code
  FROM
  (
   (
  SELECT accounts.acc_account_no,
   acch_title, 
   accounts.acc_subacc_no,
   acc_incep_date,
   act_long_name,
   tran_amount_cr,
   transactions.tran_create_by,
   first_tran_date,
   acch_brn_code
  FROM accounts 
  JOIN account_headers ON account_headers.acch_account_no = accounts.acc_account_no
  JOIN account_types ON acc_act_code = act_code
  JOIN 
   (
  SELECT tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no, min(tran_seqno) first_tran_seq, min(tran_date) first_tran_date
  FROM transactions
  WHERE tran_amount_cr IS NOT NULL
  AND tran_trans_code IN ('RIC','RSAV')
  AND tran_date BETWEEN IN_FUND_FROM_DATE AND IN_FUND_TO_DATE
  AND tran_pay_method not in ('C','CQ')   --Exclude cash and cheque receipts as those accounts will already have the passbook.
  GROUP BY tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no
   ) first_trans
   ON tran_account_no = acc_account_no AND tran_subacc_no = acc_subacc_no
  JOIN transactions ON tran_seqno = first_trans.first_tran_seq
  WHERE acc_gact_type IN ('S', 'IC') 
   AND acc_incep_date BETWEEN IN_INCEP_FROM_DATE and IN_INCEP_TO_DATE
   ) opened_accounts
   JOIN
   (
  SELECT audh_key1, audh_key2, audh_date, audd_old_value, audd_new_value
  FROM audit_header
  JOIN audit_detail
   ON audh_seqno = audd_audh_seqno
  WHERE audh_table_prefix = 'ACC'
   AND audd_col_sufix = 'PROCESS_STATUS'
   AND audh_change_type  = 'I'
   AND audd_old_value IS NULL 
   AND audd_new_value = 1
   ) onhold_accounts
  ON opened_accounts.acc_account_no = onhold_accounts.audh_key1
   AND opened_accounts.acc_subacc_no = onhold_accounts.audh_key2
   JOIN ACCOUNT_LINKS al ON al.accl_account_no = opened_accounts.ACC_ACCOUNT_NO and al.accl_subacc_no = opened_accounts.ACC_SUBACC_NO and al.accl_holder_pos = 1
   JOIN SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX htax 
  ON htax.ACCTAX_ACCOUNT_NO = al.ACCL_ACCOUNT_NO
   AND htax.ACCTAX_SUBACC_NO = al.ACCL_SUBACC_NO
   AND htax.ACCTAX_CUST_SEQNO = al.ACCL_CUST_SEQNO
  )", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
