## Original SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT acc_account_no, 
  acc_subacc_no, 
  acch_title,
  to_char(acc_incep_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') acc_incep_date,
  htax.ACCTAX_EFF_DATE_FROM,
  to_char(onhold_accounts.audh_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY') approved_date,
  act_long_name, 
  tran_amount_cr,
  tran_create_by,
  CASE WHEN (trunc(acc_incep_date) - trunc(onhold_accounts.audh_date)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE
   (trunc(acc_incep_date) - trunc(onhold_accounts.audh_date)) END time_on_approved,
  acch_brn_code
  FROM
  (
   (
  SELECT accounts.acc_account_no,
   acch_title, 
   accounts.acc_subacc_no,
   acc_incep_date,
   act_long_name,
   tran_amount_cr,
   transactions.tran_create_by,
   first_tran_date,
   acch_brn_code
  FROM accounts 
  JOIN account_headers ON account_headers.acch_account_no = accounts.acc_account_no
  JOIN account_types ON acc_act_code = act_code
  JOIN 
   (
  SELECT tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no, min(tran_seqno) first_tran_seq, min(tran_date) first_tran_date
  FROM transactions
  WHERE tran_amount_cr IS NOT NULL
  AND tran_trans_code IN ('RIC','RSAV')
  AND tran_date BETWEEN IN_FUND_FROM_DATE AND IN_FUND_TO_DATE
  AND tran_pay_method not in ('C','CQ')   --Exclude cash and cheque receipts as those accounts will already have the passbook.
  GROUP BY tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no
   ) first_trans
   ON tran_account_no = acc_account_no AND tran_subacc_no = acc_subacc_no
  JOIN transactions ON tran_seqno = first_trans.first_tran_seq
  WHERE acc_gact_type IN ('S', 'IC') 
   AND acc_incep_date BETWEEN IN_INCEP_FROM_DATE and IN_INCEP_TO_DATE
   ) opened_accounts
   JOIN
   (
  SELECT audh_key1, audh_key2, audh_date, audd_old_value, audd_new_value
  FROM audit_header
  JOIN audit_detail
   ON audh_seqno = audd_audh_seqno
  WHERE audh_table_prefix = 'ACC'
   AND audd_col_sufix = 'PROCESS_STATUS'
   AND audh_change_type  = 'I'
   AND audd_old_value IS NULL 
   AND audd_new_value = 1
   ) onhold_accounts
  ON opened_accounts.acc_account_no = onhold_accounts.audh_key1
   AND opened_accounts.acc_subacc_no = onhold_accounts.audh_key2
   JOIN ACCOUNT_LINKS al ON al.accl_account_no = opened_accounts.ACC_ACCOUNT_NO and al.accl_subacc_no = opened_accounts.ACC_SUBACC_NO and al.accl_holder_pos = 1
   JOIN SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX htax 
  ON htax.ACCTAX_ACCOUNT_NO = al.ACCL_ACCOUNT_NO
   AND htax.ACCTAX_SUBACC_NO = al.ACCL_SUBACC_NO
   AND htax.ACCTAX_CUST_SEQNO = al.ACCL_CUST_SEQNO
  )

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: WITH first_trans AS (SELECT tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no, MIN(tran_seqno) keep (dense_rank first order by tran_date) AS first_tran_seq, MIN(tran_date) AS first_tran_date FROM transactions WHERE tran_amount_cr IS NOT NULL AND tran_trans_code IN ('RIC','RSAV') AND tran_date BETWEEN :IN_FUND_FROM_DATE AND :IN_FUND_TO_DATE AND tran_pay_method NOT IN ('C','CQ') GROUP BY tran_account_no, tran_subacc_no), opened_accounts AS (SELECT a.acc_account_no, a.acc_subacc_no, a.acc_incep_date, atype.act_long_name, ah.acch_title, ah.acch_brn_code, ftran.tran_amount_cr, ftran.tran_create_by FROM accounts a JOIN account_headers ah ON ah.acch_account_no = a.acc_account_no JOIN account_types atype ON a.acc_act_code = atype.act_code JOIN first_trans ft ON a.acc_account_no = ft.tran_account_no AND a.acc_subacc_no = ft.tran_subacc_no JOIN transactions ftran ON ftran.tran_seqno = ft.first_tran_seq WHERE a.acc_gact_type IN ('S', 'IC') AND a.acc_incep_date BETWEEN :IN_INCEP_FROM_DATE AND :IN_INCEP_TO_DATE), onhold_accounts AS (SELECT ah.audh_key1, ah.audh_key2, ah.audh_date FROM audit_header ah JOIN audit_detail ad ON ah.audh_seqno = ad.audd_audh_seqno WHERE ah.audh_table_prefix = 'ACC' AND ah.audh_change_type = 'I' AND ad.audd_col_sufix = 'PROCESS_STATUS' AND ad.audd_old_value IS NULL AND ad.audd_new_value = 1) SELECT DISTINCT oa.acc_account_no, oa.acc_subacc_no, oa.acch_title, TO_CHAR(oa.acc_incep_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as acc_incep_date, ht.ACCTAX_EFF_DATE_FROM, TO_CHAR(oha.audh_date, 'DD-MON-YYYY') as approved_date, oa.act_long_name, oa.tran_amount_cr, oa.tran_create_by, CASE WHEN (TRUNC(oa.acc_incep_date) - TRUNC(oha.audh_date)) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (TRUNC(oa.acc_incep_date) - TRUNC(oha.audh_date)) END AS time_on_approved, oa.acch_brn_code FROM opened_accounts oa JOIN onhold_accounts oha ON oa.acc_account_no = oha.audh_key1 AND oa.acc_subacc_no = oha.audh_key2 JOIN ACCOUNT_LINKS al ON al.accl_account_no = oa.acc_account_no AND al.accl_subacc_no = oa.acc_subacc_no AND al.accl_holder_pos = 1 JOIN SUMMIT.ACCOUNT_HOLDING_TAX ht ON ht.ACCTAX_ACCOUNT_NO = al.ACCL_ACCOUNT_NO AND ht.ACCTAX_SUBACC_NO = al.ACCL_SUBACC_NO AND ht.ACCTAX_CUST_SEQNO = al.ACCL_CUST_SEQNO

You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE jobinfo_his_seq; CREATE TABLE jobinfo_his (id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, jobid VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, tellercode VARCHAR2(50), jobname VARCHAR2(100), jobstatus VARCHAR2(10), jobstartpersname VARCHAR2(100), jobpriorpersname VARCHAR2(100), jobtype VARCHAR2(50), createtime DATE NOT NULL, tranname VARCHAR2(100), issucc VARCHAR2(1), tranprop VARCHAR2(100), trandata VARCHAR2(4000), jbjg VARCHAR2(100), jbgy VARCHAR2(100), ldlcid VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER jobinfo_his_bi BEFORE INSERT ON jobinfo_his FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.id IS NULL THEN SELECT jobinfo_his_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_jobinfo_his_jobid ON jobinfo_his(jobid);
CREATE INDEX idx_jobinfo_his_status ON jobinfo_his(jobstatus);
CREATE INDEX idx_jobinfo_his_createtime ON jobinfo_his(createtime);
CREATE INDEX idx_jobinfo_his_composite ON jobinfo_his(jobid, jobstatus, createtime);
CREATE SEQUENCE businodeinst_seq; CREATE TABLE businodeinst (id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nodeinstid VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, flowinstid VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER businodeinst_bi BEFORE INSERT ON businodeinst FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.id IS NULL THEN SELECT businodeinst_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_businodeinst_nodeinstid ON businodeinst(nodeinstid);
CREATE INDEX idx_businodeinst_flowinstid ON businodeinst(flowinstid);
CREATE SEQUENCE busiflowinst_seq; CREATE TABLE busiflowinst (id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, flowinstid VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR2(10)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER busiflowinst_bi BEFORE INSERT ON busiflowinst FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.id IS NULL THEN SELECT busiflowinst_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_busiflowinst_flowinstid ON busiflowinst(flowinstid);

   partition by

  t3.createtime desc
  ) as rn
  from

  where
  exists (
   select
  t2.jobid
   from
  jobinfo_his t2
   where
  t2.jobid = t3.jobid
  and exists (

   and t1.jobstatus = 'O'
   and substr(jobid, 0, 1) = 'A'
  )
   group by

  count(decode(t2.jobstatus, 'N', 1, null)) = 0
  )

  where
   tt.rn = 1

  select
   t.jobid,
   t.tellercode,

   t.tranname,
   t.issucc,
   t.tranprop,
   t.trandata,
   t.jbjg,
   t.jbgy,
   t.ldlcid
  from
   jobinfo_his t,
   businodeinst t1,
   busiflowinst t2
  where
   t.jobid = t1.nodeinstid
   and t1.flowinstid = t2.flowinstid
   and t2.status = '1'
   and t.jobstatus = 'O'
  )

model_answer.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT jh.jobid, jh.tellercode, jh.jobname, jh.jobstatus, jh.jobstartpersname, jh.jobpriorpersname, jh.jobtype, jh.createtime, jh.tranname, jh.issucc, jh.tranprop, jh.trandata, jh.jbjg, jh.jbgy, jh.ldlcid FROM (SELECT jobid, tellercode, jobname, jobstatus, jobstartpersname, jobpriorpersname, jobtype, createtime, tranname, issucc, tranprop, trandata, jbjg, jbgy, ldlcid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY jobid ORDER BY createtime DESC) AS rn FROM jobinfo_his WHERE jobid IN (SELECT jobid FROM jobinfo_his WHERE jobstatus = 'O' AND jobid LIKE 'A%' AND jobid NOT IN (SELECT jobid FROM jobinfo_his WHERE jobstatus = 'N' GROUP BY jobid) GROUP BY jobid)) jh WHERE jh.rn = 1 UNION ALL SELECT t.jobid, t.tellercode, t.jobname, t.jobstatus, t.jobstartpersname, t.jobpriorpersname, t.jobtype, t.createtime, t.tranname, t.issucc, t.tranprop, t.trandata, t.jbjg, t.jbgy, t.ldlcid FROM jobinfo_his t JOIN businodeinst t1 ON t.jobid = t1.nodeinstid JOIN busiflowinst t2 ON t1.flowinstid = t2.flowinstid WHERE t2.status = '1' AND t.jobstatus = 'O')

{"case_id": "30", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "此改写的核心是将原SQL中针对nortran表的7个独立子查询(n1-n7)和1个去重子查询(z)通过CTE的GROUP BY + MAX + CASE WHEN技术合并。原SQL中每个子查询都有WHERE条件过滤不同的nortran_aufd_code，改写后通过CASE WHEN在单次扫描中同时提取所有需要的字段值，然后用MAX聚合选择每个transaction的值。这种行列转换技术将EAV(Entity-Attribute-Value)模型的多行数据透视为宽表的单行数据。同时，将nobtran的过滤条件前置，减少JOIN时的数据量。这种改写方式在OLAP场景中常用于优化维度属性的多次JOIN。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);", "CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);", "CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;", "CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);"], "sql": "select s.spriden_id EID,
  s.spriden_last_name ||', '||s.spriden_first_name "NAME",
  b.nobtran_transaction_no "TRANS NO.",
  z.nortran_posn "POSN NO",
  b.nobtran_effective_date "QUERY DATE", 
  b.nobtran_acat_code "ACAT CODE",
  n1.nortran_value "CURRENT HIRE DATE",
  n2.nortran_value "BEGIN PERSONNEL DATE",
  n3.nortran_value "SALARY GROUP",
  n4.nortran_value "APPOINTMENT PERCENT",
  n5.nortran_value "ANNUAL SALARY",
  t1.nortern_effective_date "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE",
  t1.nortern_earn_code "PAY DATA EARNINGS",
  t1.nortern_hrs "PAY DATA HOURS",
  t1.nortern_special_rate "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE",
  n6.nortran_value "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE",
  n7.nortran_value "END PERSONNEL DATE"
   ,case b.nobtran_trans_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved'
   when 'C' then 'Completed'
   when 'V' then 'Voided' 
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
   when 'P' then 'Pending'
   when 'W' then 'Waiting'
   when 'T' then 'Partially Completed'
   when 'N' then 'Cancelled'
   when 'U' then 'Superuser Update'
  end trans_status   
  ,case r.norrout_queue_status_ind
   when 'A' then 'Approved by that Approver'
   when 'D' then 'Disapproved'
   when 'F' then 'FYI'
   when 'I' then 'In Queue'
   when 'K' then 'Acknowledged'
   when 'L' then 'Applied by Applier'
   when 'M' then 'More Information'
   when 'O' then 'Overridden'
   when 'P' then 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier '
   when 'Q' then 'Removed from Queue'
   when 'R' then 'Return for Correction'
  end queue_status
  ,r.norrout_level_no
  

  from nobtran b,spriden s, norrout r, pebempl pp, /*nbrjobs nbr,*/
  (select nc.nortran_transaction_no,nc.nortran_apty_code,nc.nortran_aufd_code,nc.nortran_value
  from nortran nc
   where nc.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE'
  ) n1, /* Current Hire Date */
  (select nb.nortran_transaction_no,nb.nortran_apty_code,nb.nortran_aufd_code,nb.nortran_value
  from nortran nb
   where nb.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' 
  ) n2,  /*Begin Personnnel Date*/ 
  (select ns.nortran_transaction_no,ns.nortran_apty_code,ns.nortran_aufd_code,ns.nortran_value
  from nortran ns
   where ns.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE'
   ) n3, /* Salary Group */
  (select na.nortran_transaction_no,na.nortran_apty_code,na.nortran_aufd_code,na.nortran_value
  from nortran na
   where na.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT'
  ) n4, /*Appointment Percent*/ 
  (select nu.nortran_transaction_no,nu.nortran_apty_code,nu.nortran_aufd_code,nu.nortran_value
  from nortran nu
   where nu.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY'
  ) n5, /*Annual Salary*/
  (select nj.nortran_transaction_no,nj.nortran_apty_code,nj.nortran_aufd_code,nj.nortran_value
  from nortran nj
   where nj.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE'  
  and nj.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n6,  /*End Job Effective Date*/
  (select np.nortran_transaction_no,np.nortran_apty_code,np.nortran_aufd_code,np.nortran_value
  from nortran np
   where np.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE'  
  and np.nortran_apty_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM')) n7,  /*End Personnel Date*/

  (select t.nortern_transaction_no,t.nortern_effective_date,t.nortern_earn_code,
   t.nortern_hrs, t.nortern_special_rate
  from nortern t) t1 

   ,(select unique zz.nortran_transaction_no,zz.nortran_posn
  from nortran zz
   where zz.nortran_posn is not null
  ) z

 where b.nobtran_acat_code in ('CFOAP','NWHIR','NWTMP','ADCOMP','JBTERM') /*employee*/
  /*waiting,completed,partially completedc,ancelled,supperuser update */
  /* and nobtran_trans_status_ind in ('W','C','T','U') */
   and b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm
   and s.spriden_change_ind is null
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no(+) /*Pay Data*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Current Hire Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Begin Personnnel Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Salary Group*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Appointment Percent*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*Annual Salary*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Job Effective Date*/
   
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no(+) /*End Personnel Date*/
   
   and nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no(+)
   --get all queue status
   /*and r.norrout_queue_status_ind = 'A'*/
   and r.norrout_level_no = 90 /* Pending HR approval Queue */
   -- not applied yet
   and b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' /*Applied ePAFs will not be listed*/
   --HR does not care about voided ePAFs
   and nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V'
   --get posn
   and b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no
   and r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A'
  -- exclude student
   and s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm
   and pp.pebempl_ecls_code not in ('RE','FW','GS','MW')

case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE SEQUENCE nobtran_seq; CREATE TABLE nobtran (nobtran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nobtran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_acat_code VARCHAR2(20), nobtran_effective_date DATE, nobtran_trans_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), nobtran_pidm NUMBER NOT NULL, nobtran_apply_ind VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nobtran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nobtran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nobtran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nobtran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nobtran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_acat_code ON nobtran(nobtran_acat_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_pidm ON nobtran(nobtran_pidm);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_transaction_no ON nobtran(nobtran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_status ON nobtran(nobtran_trans_status_ind);
CREATE INDEX idx_nobtran_apply_ind ON nobtran(nobtran_apply_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE spriden_seq; CREATE TABLE spriden (spriden_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, spriden_id VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, spriden_last_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL, spriden_first_name VARCHAR2(100), spriden_change_ind VARCHAR2(1)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER spriden_bi BEFORE INSERT ON spriden FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.spriden_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT spriden_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.spriden_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_spriden_change_ind ON spriden(spriden_change_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE norrout_seq; CREATE TABLE norrout (norrout_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, norrout_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, norrout_queue_status_ind VARCHAR2(1), norrout_level_no NUMBER); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER norrout_bi BEFORE INSERT ON norrout FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.norrout_id IS NULL THEN SELECT norrout_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.norrout_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_transaction_no ON norrout(norrout_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_level_no ON norrout(norrout_level_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_norrout_queue_status ON norrout(norrout_queue_status_ind);
CREATE SEQUENCE pebempl_seq; CREATE TABLE pebempl (pebempl_pidm NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, pebempl_ecls_code VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, pebempl_current_hire_date DATE); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER pebempl_bi BEFORE INSERT ON pebempl FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.pebempl_pidm IS NULL THEN SELECT pebempl_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.pebempl_pidm FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_pebempl_ecls_code ON pebempl(pebempl_ecls_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortran_seq; CREATE TABLE nortran (nortran_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortran_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortran_apty_code VARCHAR2(20), nortran_aufd_code VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL, nortran_value VARCHAR2(200), nortran_posn VARCHAR2(50)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortran_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortran FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortran_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortran_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortran_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_transaction_no ON nortran(nortran_transaction_no);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_aufd_code ON nortran(nortran_aufd_code);
CREATE INDEX idx_nortran_apty_code ON nortran(nortran_apty_code);
CREATE SEQUENCE nortern_seq; CREATE TABLE nortern (nortern_id NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, nortern_transaction_no NUMBER NOT NULL, nortern_effective_date DATE, nortern_earn_code VARCHAR2(20), nortern_hrs NUMBER(10,2), nortern_special_rate NUMBER(15,2)); CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER nortern_bi BEFORE INSERT ON nortern FOR EACH ROW BEGIN IF :NEW.nortern_id IS NULL THEN SELECT nortern_seq.NEXTVAL INTO :NEW.nortern_id FROM DUAL; END IF; END;
CREATE INDEX idx_nortern_transaction_no ON nortern(nortern_transaction_no);

n4.nortran_value AS "APPOINTMENT PERCENT", n5.nortran_value AS "ANNUAL SALARY", t1.nortern_effective_date AS "PAY DATA EFFECTIVE DATE", t1.nortern_earn_code AS "PAY DATA EARNINGS", t1.nortern_hrs AS "PAY DATA HOURS", t1.nortern_special_rate AS "PAY DATA SPECIAL RATE", n6.nortran_value AS "END JOB EFFECTIVE DATE", n7.nortran_value AS "END PERSONNEL DATE", CASE b.nobtran_trans_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Completed' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Voided' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending' WHEN 'W' THEN 'Waiting' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Partially Completed' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Cancelled' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Superuser Update' END AS trans_status, CASE r.norrout_queue_status_ind WHEN 'A' THEN 'Approved by that Approver' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Disapproved' WHEN 'F' THEN 'FYI' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Queue' WHEN 'K' THEN 'Acknowledged' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Applied by Applier' WHEN 'M' THEN 'More Information' WHEN 'O' THEN 'Overridden' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Pending Action by Approver/Applier ' WHEN 'Q' THEN 'Removed from Queue' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Return for Correction' END AS queue_status, r.norrout_level_no FROM nobtran b INNER JOIN spriden s ON b.nobtran_pidm = s.spriden_pidm AND s.spriden_change_ind IS NULL INNER JOIN pebempl pp ON s.spriden_pidm = pp.pebempl_pidm INNER JOIN ( SELECT nortran_transaction_no, nortran_posn FROM nortran WHERE nortran_posn IS NOT NULL ) z ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = z.nortran_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortern t1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = t1.nortern_transaction_no LEFT JOIN nortran n1 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n1.nortran_transaction_no AND n1.nortran_aufd_code = 'PEBEMPL_CURRENT_HIRE_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n2 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n2.nortran_transaction_no AND n2.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' LEFT JOIN nortran n3 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n3.nortran_transaction_no AND n3.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_SGRP_CODE' LEFT JOIN nortran n4 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n4.nortran_transaction_no AND n4.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_APPT_PCT' LEFT JOIN nortran n5 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n5.nortran_transaction_no AND n5.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_ANN_SALARY' LEFT JOIN nortran n6 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n6.nortran_transaction_no AND n6.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_EFFECTIVE_DATE' AND n6.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN nortran n7 ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = n7.nortran_transaction_no AND n7.nortran_aufd_code = 'NBRJOBS_PERS_CHG_DATE' AND n7.nortran_apty_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') LEFT JOIN norrout r ON b.nobtran_transaction_no = r.norrout_transaction_no AND r.norrout_queue_status_ind <> 'A' AND r.norrout_level_no = 90 WHERE b.nobtran_acat_code IN ('CFOAP', 'NWHIR', 'NWTMP', 'ADCOMP', 'JBTERM') AND b.nobtran_apply_ind = 'N' AND b.nobtran_trans_status_ind <> 'V' AND pp.pebempl_ecls_code NOT IN ('RE', 'FW', 'GS', 'MW') ORDER BY 3

{"case_id": "31", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "本次改写是一个纯语法层面的变更，仅将派生表（子查询）的别名从't'改为't2'，并相应更新外层SELECT语句中的列引用（t.age→t2.age等）。这种改写不改变SQL的语义、执行逻辑或数据访问路径，对数据库优化器来说两个查询完全等价。从性能优化角度看，这不是一个有效的改写方案，因为它不涉及任何能够提升性能的技术手段，如索引利用、连接顺序调整、谓词下推、子查询展开等。", "difficulty_level": "2", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BSIS (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BUZEI VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, HKONT VARCHAR2(10), DMBTR NUMBER(15,2), WAERS VARCHAR2(3), MONAT VARCHAR2(2), BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bsis PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR, BUZEI));", "CREATE INDEX idx_bsis_query ON SAPR3.BSIS(GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, MANDT, BUZEI, WAERS, MONAT, BLDAT);", "CREATE INDEX idx_bsis_join ON SAPR3.BSIS(BELNR, GJAHR, BUKRS);", "CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BKPF (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bkpf PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR));"], "sql": "SELECT

ORDER BY t.age;", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BSIS (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BUZEI VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, HKONT VARCHAR2(10), DMBTR NUMBER(15,2), WAERS VARCHAR2(3), MONAT VARCHAR2(2), BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bsis PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR, BUZEI));
CREATE INDEX idx_bsis_query ON SAPR3.BSIS(GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, MANDT, BUZEI, WAERS, MONAT, BLDAT);

CREATE TABLE SAPR3.BKPF (MANDT VARCHAR2(3) NOT NULL, BUKRS VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BELNR VARCHAR2(10) NOT NULL, GJAHR VARCHAR2(4) NOT NULL, BLDAT VARCHAR2(8), CONSTRAINT pk_bkpf PRIMARY KEY (MANDT, BUKRS, BELNR, GJAHR));

## Original SQL:
SELECT
  t.age,
  CASE 
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 0 AND 3 THEN '0-3 Days'
  WHEN t.age BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '3-7 Days'
  ELSE 'Above 7 Days'
  END AS age_bucket,
  t.amount_local,
  t.hkont AS gl_account,
  t.bukrs AS company_code
FROM (
  SELECT 
  b.BUKRS,
  b.HKONT,
  b.DMBTR AS amount_local,
  (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT,'YYYYMMDD')) AS age
  FROM (
  SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(30) */
   BELNR, GJAHR, BUKRS, HKONT, DMBTR
  FROM SAPR3.BSIS
  WHERE GJAHR = '2025'
  AND BUKRS = '0100'
  AND HKONT = '0000895200'
  AND MANDT = '500'
  AND BUZEI = '002'
  AND WAERS = 'INR'
  AND MONAT = '01'
  AND BLDAT = '20240401'
  ) b
  JOIN SAPR3.BKPF k
   ON b.BELNR = k.BELNR
  AND b.GJAHR = k.GJAHR
  AND b.BUKRS = k.BUKRS
) t
ORDER BY t.age;

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT, 'YYYYMMDD')) AS age, CASE WHEN (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT, 'YYYYMMDD')) BETWEEN 0 AND 3 THEN '0-3 Days' WHEN (TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TO_DATE(k.BLDAT, 'YYYYMMDD')) BETWEEN 4 AND 7 THEN '3-7 Days' ELSE 'Above 7 Days' END AS age_bucket, b.DMBTR AS amount_local, b.HKONT AS gl_account, b.BUKRS AS company_code FROM SAPR3.BSIS b JOIN SAPR3.BKPF k ON (b.BELNR = k.BELNR AND b.GJAHR = k.GJAHR AND b.BUKRS = k.BUKRS) WHERE b.GJAHR = '2025' AND b.BUKRS = '0100' AND b.HKONT = '0000895200' AND b.MANDT = '500' AND b.BUZEI = '002' AND b.WAERS = 'INR' AND b.MONAT = '01' AND b.BLDAT = '20240401' ORDER BY age;

{"case_id": "32", "db_type": "postgresql", "description": "本次改写采用了经典的查询优化技术组合：

1. **谓词下推（Predicate Pushdown）**：将out_date的过滤条件从最外层WHERE子句移到tmep_ip CTE内部。这样可以尽早过滤数据，减少CTE物化的数据量，虽然在本例中优化器已经将过滤推到了Parallel Seq Scan阶段，但显式下推使逻辑更清晰，且在某些复杂场景下能帮助优化器更好地生成执行计划。

2. **投影裁剪（Column Pruning）**：在diagnosis_ranked子查询中，移除了不再需要的diagnosis_type_name字段。该字段仅用于窗口函数的排序，在rn=1筛选后就没有实际意义了，因此在WindowAgg之后立即裁剪，避免传递到上层的GroupAggregate和Materialize节点。

3. **聚合维度优化**：diagnosis_end的GROUP BY从4个字段减少到3个字段。因为diagnosis_type_name在窗口函数排序后已被隐含使用（通过rn=1保证了每组只保留优先级最高的记录），在最终聚合时不需要再作为分组键。这减少了哈希表的键空间和比较开销。

4. **逻辑等价性保证**：虽然进行了多处优化，但查询的核心逻辑保持不变：
   - 诊断类型的优先级排序规则完全一致
   - ROW_NUMBER()窗口函数的分区和排序逻辑相同
   - MAX聚合对diagnosis_flag分组的处理逻辑相同
   - 最终JOIN关联条件和结果集完全一致", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_patient_info (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, inpatient_name VARCHAR(100), age INTEGER, sex VARCHAR(10), in_date TIMESTAMP, out_date TIMESTAMP, times VARCHAR(20), person_type VARCHAR(50), patient_no VARCHAR(50), current_dept_code VARCHAR(50));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(register_no, times);", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_patient_info_out_date ON his_temp_ip_patient_info(out_date);", "CREATE TABLE his_temp_ip_settle (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, register_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, times VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, total_cost DECIMAL(12,2));", "CREATE INDEX idx_his_temp_ip_settle_register_no_times ON his_temp_ip_settle(register_no, times);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_type_name VARCHAR(100), diagnosis_flag VARCHAR(1), diagnosis_code VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_name VARCHAR(200), diagnosis_no INTEGER, file_visit_type VARCHAR(10));", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_file_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(file_visit_type, inp_no, visit_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis_group ON emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis(inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag);", "CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_operation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, operation_code VARCHAR(50), operation_no INTEGER);", "CREATE INDEX idx_emr_temp_ip_patient_operation_inp_visit ON emr_temp_ip_patient_operation(inp_no, visit_id);"], "sql": "with tmep_ip as (
  select 
  a.register_no as patientid, 
  a.inpatient_name as patientname, 
  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc", "explain": "QUERY PLAN
Sort  (cost=445130.58..445963.91 rows=333333 width=308)

CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, type VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_type_name VARCHAR(100), diagnosis_flag VARCHAR(1), diagnosis_code VARCHAR(50), diagnosis_name VARCHAR(200), diagnosis_no INTEGER, file_visit_type VARCHAR(10));

CREATE TABLE emr_temp_ip_patient_operation (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, inp_no VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, visit_id VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, operation_code VARCHAR(50), operation_no INTEGER);

  a.age,
  a.sex as gender, 
  date(a.in_date) as indate, 
  date(a.out_date) as outdate,
  a.times as inhospitaltimes, 
  a.person_type as persontype, 
  a.patient_no as serialno,
  b.total_cost as medicalcost, 
  'doctor' as entrymode, 
  'remind' as defaulttab,
  a.current_dept_code as deptcode, 
  '440100' as citycode 
  from his_temp_ip_patient_info a 
  left join his_temp_ip_settle b on a.register_no = b.register_no and a.times = b.times
),
diagnosis as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  diagnosis_flag,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_code, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then string_agg(diagnosis_name, ',' order by diagnosis_no) end as chinese_diagnosis_names 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis 
  where file_visit_type = '2'
  group by inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag
),
diagnosis_ranked as (
  select 
  *,
  row_number() over (
   partition by inp_no, times, type 
   order by 
  case 
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' then 1
  when type = '病历诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' then 2
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' then 1
  when type = '首页诊断' and diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' then 2
  else 3
  end
  ) as rn
  from diagnosis
),
diagnosis_end as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  times, 
  type, 
  diagnosis_type_name,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '1' then diagnosis_codes end) as diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_codes end) as chinese_diagnosis_codes,
  max(case when diagnosis_flag = '0' then chinese_diagnosis_names end) as chinese_diagnosis_names
  from diagnosis_ranked
  where rn = 1
  group by inp_no, times, type, diagnosis_type_name
),
operations as (
  select 
  inp_no, 
  visit_id as times, 
  string_agg(operation_code, ',' order by operation_no) as operation_codes 
  from emr_temp_ip_patient_operation
  group by inp_no, visit_id 
)
select 
  t.patientid, 
  t.patientname, 
  t.age,
  t.gender, 
  t.indate, 
  t.outdate, 
  t.inhospitaltimes, 
  d.type,
  d.diagnosis_codes as diagnosiscode,
  o.operation_codes as operationcode,
  t.medicalcost, 
  t.persontype, 
  t.entrymode, 
  t.serialno, 
  t.defaulttab,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_codes as chinesediagnosiscode,
  d.chinese_diagnosis_names as chinesediagnosename,
  t.deptcode, 
  t.citycode 
from tmep_ip t 
left join diagnosis_end d on t.patientid = d.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = d.times
left join operations o on t.patientid = o.inp_no and t.inhospitaltimes::varchar = o.times
where t.outdate > '2025-01-01'
order by t.outdate desc

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT a.register_no AS patientid, a.inpatient_name AS patientname, a.age, a.sex AS gender, DATE(a.in_date) AS indate, DATE(a.out_date) AS outdate, a.times AS inhospitaltimes, d.type, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN dr.diagnosis_codes END) AS diagnosiscode, o.operation_codes AS operationcode, b.total_cost AS medicalcost, a.person_type AS persontype, 'doctor' AS entrymode, a.patient_no AS serialno, 'remind' AS defaulttab, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes END) AS chinesediagnosiscode, MAX(CASE WHEN dr.diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN dr.chinese_diagnosis_names END) AS chinesediagnosename, a.current_dept_code AS deptcode, '440100' AS citycode FROM (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY inp_no, visit_id, type ORDER BY CASE WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '最后诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '病历诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '初步诊断' THEN 2 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '出院诊断' THEN 1 WHEN type = '首页诊断' AND diagnosis_type_name = '门诊诊断' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) AS rn FROM (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '1' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_code, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_codes, CASE WHEN diagnosis_flag = '0' THEN STRING_AGG(diagnosis_name, ',' ORDER BY diagnosis_no) END AS chinese_diagnosis_names FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_diagnosis WHERE file_visit_type = '2' GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id, type, diagnosis_type_name, diagnosis_flag) AS diagnosis_filtered) dr INNER JOIN his_temp_ip_patient_info a ON dr.rn = 1 AND dr.inp_no = a.register_no AND dr.visit_id = a.times AND DATE(a.out_date) > '2025-01-01' LEFT JOIN his_temp_ip_settle b ON a.register_no = b.register_no AND a.times = b.times LEFT JOIN (SELECT inp_no, visit_id, STRING_AGG(operation_code, ',' ORDER BY operation_no) AS operation_codes FROM emr_temp_ip_patient_operation GROUP BY inp_no, visit_id) o ON a.register_no = o.inp_no AND a.times = o.visit_id CROSS JOIN LATERAL (SELECT dr.type, dr.diagnosis_flag, dr.diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_codes, dr.chinese_diagnosis_names WHERE dr.rn = 1) d GROUP BY a.register_no, a.inpatient_name, a.age, a.sex, DATE(a.in_date), DATE(a.out_date), a.times, d.type, o.operation_codes, b.total_cost, a.person_type, a.patient_no, a.current_dept_code ORDER BY DATE(a.out_date) DESC;

{"case_id": "35", "db_type": "mysql", "description": "这是一个典型的消除无用计算的优化案例。当外层查询只是COUNT(*)时，内层子查询中计算的所有列值（包括通过子查询计算的auditJobIdcounts）都不会影响最终结果。COUNT(*)只关心有多少行满足WHERE条件，而不关心这些行的具体内容。因此可以直接将内层子查询展开，删除所有不必要的列选择和子查询计算，只保留WHERE条件。这种改写消除了189504次依赖子查询执行、临时表物化和34个列的数据读取，大幅提升性能。", "difficulty_level": "3", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE hotel_price_adjustment (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), brand_code VARCHAR(50), brand_name VARCHAR(200), hotel_code VARCHAR(50), hotel_name VARCHAR(200), currency VARCHAR(10), category VARCHAR(50), rate_code VARCHAR(50), rate_name VARCHAR(200), price_array_type VARCHAR(50), price_array_code VARCHAR(50), price_array_sequence INT, price_array TEXT, price_array2 TEXT, date_segment VARCHAR(100), weeks VARCHAR(50), brand_maximum_price DECIMAL(18,2), brand_minimum_price DECIMAL(18,2), room_code VARCHAR(50), room_name VARCHAR(200), room_standard_price DECIMAL(18,2), pre_adjustment_price DECIMAL(18,2), adjusted_price DECIMAL(18,2), price_adjustment_range VARCHAR(50), occupancy INT, status VARCHAR(20), reason TEXT, approve_status VARCHAR(20), approve_reason TEXT, operator VARCHAR(100), create_time DATETIME, update_time DATETIME, CREATE_USER_ID BIGINT) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_hotel_code ON hotel_price_adjustment(HOTEL_CODE);", "CREATE INDEX idx_create_user_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(CREATE_USER_ID);", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id ON hotel_price_adjustment(apply_id);", "CREATE TABLE price_adjustment_audit_job (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, apply_id VARCHAR(100), job_id VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;", "CREATE INDEX idx_apply_id_job_id ON price_adjustment_audit_job(apply_id, job_id);"], "sql": "SELECT 
  COUNT(*) 
FROM 
  (
  SELECT 
   id, 
   apply_id, 
   brand_code, 
   brand_name, 
   hotel_code, 
   hotel_name, 
   currency, 
   category, 
   rate_code,

   price_array_type,

   occupancy, 
   status, 
   reason, 
   approve_status, 
   approve_reason, 
   operator, 
   create_time, 
   update_time, 
   CREATE_USER_ID, 
   (
   SELECT 
   count(paaj.id) 
   FROM 
   price_adjustment_audit_job paaj 
   WHERE 
   paaj.apply_id = pa1.apply_id 
   AND paaj.job_id = '4_004'
   ) AS auditJobIdcounts 
  FROM 
   hotel_price_adjustment pa1 
  WHERE 
   (
   HOTEL_CODE IN ('6199', 'JJXRSEH802967') 
   OR CREATE_USER_ID = 289865
   )
  ) TOTAL;", "explain": "id	select_type	table	partitions	type	possible_keys	key	key_len	ref	rows	filtered	Extra
1	PRIMARY	<derived2>		ALL					189504	100.0	
2	DERIVED	pa1		ALL	idx_hotel_code,idx_create_user_id				947046	20.01	Using where

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) 
FROM 
  (
  SELECT 
   id, 
   apply_id, 
   brand_code, 
   brand_name, 
   hotel_code, 
   hotel_name, 
   currency, 
   category, 
   rate_code, 
   rate_name, 
   price_array_type, 
   price_array_code, 
   price_array_sequence, 
   price_array, 
   price_array2, 
   date_segment, 
   weeks, 
   brand_maximum_price, 
   brand_minimum_price, 
   room_code, 
   room_name, 
   room_standard_price, 
   pre_adjustment_price, 
   adjusted_price, 
   price_adjustment_range, 
   occupancy, 
   status, 
   reason, 
   approve_status, 
   approve_reason, 
   operator, 
   create_time, 
   update_time, 
   CREATE_USER_ID, 
   (
   SELECT 
   count(paaj.id) 
   FROM 
   price_adjustment_audit_job paaj 
   WHERE 
   paaj.apply_id = pa1.apply_id 
   AND paaj.job_id = '4_004'
   ) AS auditJobIdcounts 
  FROM 
   hotel_price_adjustment pa1 
  WHERE 
   (
   HOTEL_CODE IN ('6199', 'JJXRSEH802967') 
   OR CREATE_USER_ID = 289865
   )
  ) TOTAL;

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "37", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：查询通过 CTE a1 对 FEE_LIST_D 做了大量的聚合（多个 LISTAGG、SUM、MIN 等），并在 a2 中使用 `a1.*` 再做计算和过滤后与 SETL_D_MERGED 连接。实际最终 SELECT 只使用了 a1 中的一部分列（例如 b_fee、min_amt 等列并未被外层查询引用），但由于使用了 `a1.*` 导致这些不必要的列在聚合阶段就被计算/传递，增加了 CPU、内存与 I/O 开销，同时阻止了投影下推优化。建议通过投影下推（在 a1 中仅输出外层实际需要的列，避免 a1.*）来减少中间数据量与聚合成本；同时可考虑在 a1 中下推过滤谓词并为连接列建索引以进一步降低成本。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE FEE_LIST_D (setl_id VARCHAR2(50), MEDINS_LIST_CODG VARCHAR2(100), medins_list_name VARCHAR2(200), hilist_code VARCHAR2(100), hilist_name VARCHAR2(200), MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), CHRGITM_LV_NAME VARCHAR2(50), BILG_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), BILG_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), cnt NUMBER, det_item_fee_sumamt NUMBER(18,2), pric NUMBER(18,4), inscp_amt NUMBER(18,2));", "CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_setl_id ON FEE_LIST_D(setl_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_cnt ON FEE_LIST_D(cnt);", "CREATE TABLE SETL_D_MERGED (setl_id VARCHAR2(50) PRIMARY KEY, fixmedins_code VARCHAR2(50), fixmedins_name VARCHAR2(200), HOSP_LV_NAME VARCHAR2(50), mdtrt_id VARCHAR2(50), ipt_otp_no VARCHAR2(50), psn_no VARCHAR2(50), psn_name VARCHAR2(200), certno VARCHAR2(30), GEND_NAME VARCHAR2(20), brdy DATE, age NUMBER, insu_admdvs VARCHAR2(50), INSUTYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), PSN_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), SP_PSN_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), med_type_name VARCHAR2(100), PAY_LOC_NAME VARCHAR2(100), setl_time DATE, adm_dept_name VARCHAR2(200), dscg_dept_name VARCHAR2(200), begntime DATE, endtime DATE, IPT_DAYS NUMBER, chfpdr_name VARCHAR2(200), adm_diag_dscr VARCHAR2(4000), dscg_maindiag_name VARCHAR2(4000), DIAG_NAME VARCHAR2(4000), dise_no VARCHAR2(50), dise_name VARCHAR2(200), OPRN_NAME VARCHAR2(4000), medfee_sumamt NUMBER(18,2), pool_prop_selfpay NUMBER, hifp_pay NUMBER, hifmi_pay NUMBER, maf_pay NUMBER, cvlserv_pay NUMBER, othfund_pay NUMBER, acct_pay NUMBER, cash_payamt NUMBER, fund_pay_sumamt NUMBER, insutype VARCHAR2(50));", "CREATE INDEX idx_setl_d_merged_setl_id ON SETL_D_MERGED(setl_id);", "CREATE INDEX idx_setl_d_fund_pay ON SETL_D_MERGED(FUND_PAY_SUMAMT)"], "sql": "with
a1 as (
  select
  setl_id,
  -- 聚合项目信息
  listagg(distinct MEDINS_LIST_CODG, ',') within group (order by MEDINS_LIST_CODG) b_medins_list_codg,
  listagg(distinct medins_list_name, ',') within group (order by medins_list_name) b_medins_list_name,
  listagg(distinct f.hilist_code, ',') within group (order by f.hilist_code) b_hilist_code,
  listagg(distinct hilist_name, ',') within group (order by hilist_name) b_hilist_name,
  listagg(distinct MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME, ',') within group (order by MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME) MED_CHRGITM_TYPE,
  listagg(distinct CHRGITM_LV_NAME, ',') within group (order by CHRGITM_LV_NAME) CHRGITM_LV,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DEPT_NAME) BILG_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DR_NAME) BILG_DR_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DEPT_NAME) ACORD_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DR_NAME) ACORD_DR_NAME,
  -- 统一转换为“日”单位后的总数量
  sum(f.cnt ) as b_cnt,
  -- 总费用
  sum(f.det_item_fee_sumamt) as b_fee,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小单价
  min(f.pric ) as min_pric,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小金额
  min(abs(f.inscp_amt / f.cnt) ) as min_amt
  from FEE_LIST_D f
  -- 关联单位转换系数表
   where f.cnt <> 0
   and f.CHRGITM_LV_NAME in ('甲类','乙类')
  -- 按结算流水号分组
  group by f.setl_id
),
a2 as (
  select a1.*,
  -- 违规数量
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   else 0
  end as break_cnt,
  -- 违规金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_pric * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_fee,
  -- 违规范围内金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_amt * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_amt
  from a1
  -- 关联结算表获取住院天数
  inner join SETL_D_MERGED s on a1.setl_id = s.setl_id
  -- 过滤违规数据
  where a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   and s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0
)
select
  s.fixmedins_code 医院代码,

  s.HOSP_LV_NAME 医院级别,

  s.fund_pay_sumamt 基金支付总额,
  fl.MED_CHRGITM_TYPE 费用类别,
  fl.BILG_DEPT_NAME 开单科室名称,
  fl.BILG_DR_NAME 开单医生姓名,
  fl.ACORD_DEPT_NAME 受单科室名称,

  null 收费日期,
  fl.b_medins_list_codg 违规医院项目代码,

  fl.b_hilist_code 违规医保项目代码,
  fl.b_hilist_name 违规医保项目名称,
  null 正常医院项目代码,

  null 正常医保项目代码,
  null 正常医保项目名称,
  null 正常项目数量,
  null 正常项目金额,
  fl.b_cnt 违规项目收费数量,
  fl.min_pric 违规项目单价,
  fl.break_cnt 违规项目数量,
  fl.CHRGITM_LV 违规项目支付类别,
  fl.break_fee 违规项目金额,
  fl.break_amt 违规项目范围内金额,
  gettcamount(fl.break_amt, s.pool_prop_selfpay, s.hifp_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt) 基本统筹违规金额,
  getdbamount(fl.break_amt, s.insutype, s.hifmi_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt) 大病统筹违规金额,
  GETMAFAMOUNT(fl.break_amt, s.maf_pay, s.fund_pay_sumamt) 医疗救助违规金额,
  case when substr(s.INSU_ADMDVS,1,4) != '{pool_no}' then '是' else '否' end 是否异地,
  'CB_0020' 违规规则代码,
  '超标准收费' 违规类型,
  '按小时收费的血液净化类诊疗项目（如自动腹膜透析、连续性血液净化等），收费数量超过实际提供的诊疗服务数量。' 违规事项,
  '《江西省医疗服务价格项目目录（2023年修订版）》中血液净化类诊疗项目收费的真实性。' 违规依据
from SETL_D_MERGED s
inner join a2 fl on s.setl_id = fl.setl_id
where s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST

case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE FEE_LIST_D (setl_id VARCHAR2(50), MEDINS_LIST_CODG VARCHAR2(100), medins_list_name VARCHAR2(200), hilist_code VARCHAR2(100), hilist_name VARCHAR2(200), MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME VARCHAR2(100), CHRGITM_LV_NAME VARCHAR2(50), BILG_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), BILG_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DEPT_NAME VARCHAR2(200), ACORD_DR_NAME VARCHAR2(200), cnt NUMBER, det_item_fee_sumamt NUMBER(18,2), pric NUMBER(18,4), inscp_amt NUMBER(18,2));
CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_setl_id ON FEE_LIST_D(setl_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_fee_list_d_cnt ON FEE_LIST_D(cnt);

## Original SQL:
with
a1 as (
  select
  setl_id,
  -- 聚合项目信息
  listagg(distinct MEDINS_LIST_CODG, ',') within group (order by MEDINS_LIST_CODG) b_medins_list_codg,
  listagg(distinct medins_list_name, ',') within group (order by medins_list_name) b_medins_list_name,
  listagg(distinct f.hilist_code, ',') within group (order by f.hilist_code) b_hilist_code,
  listagg(distinct hilist_name, ',') within group (order by hilist_name) b_hilist_name,
  listagg(distinct MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME, ',') within group (order by MED_CHRGITM_TYPE_NAME) MED_CHRGITM_TYPE,
  listagg(distinct CHRGITM_LV_NAME, ',') within group (order by CHRGITM_LV_NAME) CHRGITM_LV,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DEPT_NAME) BILG_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct BILG_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by BILG_DR_NAME) BILG_DR_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DEPT_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DEPT_NAME) ACORD_DEPT_NAME,
  listagg(distinct ACORD_DR_NAME, ',') within group (order by ACORD_DR_NAME) ACORD_DR_NAME,
  -- 统一转换为“日”单位后的总数量
  sum(f.cnt ) as b_cnt,
  -- 总费用
  sum(f.det_item_fee_sumamt) as b_fee,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小单价
  min(f.pric ) as min_pric,
  -- 转换为“日”单位后的最小金额
  min(abs(f.inscp_amt / f.cnt) ) as min_amt
  from FEE_LIST_D f
  -- 关联单位转换系数表
   where f.cnt <> 0
   and f.CHRGITM_LV_NAME in ('甲类','乙类')
  -- 按结算流水号分组
  group by f.setl_id
),
a2 as (
  select a1.*,
  -- 违规数量
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   else 0
  end as break_cnt,
  -- 违规金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_pric * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_fee,
  -- 违规范围内金额
  case
   when a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24) then (a1.b_cnt - (s.ipt_days *12+24)) * (a1.min_amt * 1)
   else 0
  end as break_amt
  from a1
  -- 关联结算表获取住院天数
  inner join SETL_D_MERGED s on a1.setl_id = s.setl_id
  -- 过滤违规数据
  where a1.b_cnt > (s.ipt_days *12+24)
   and s.FUND_PAY_SUMAMT <> 0
)

  case when substr(s.INSU_ADMDVS,1,4) != '{pool_no}' then '是' else '否' end 是否异地,

  '《江西省医疗服务价格项目目录（2023年修订版）》中血液净化类诊疗项目收费的真实性。' 违规依据
from SETL_D_MERGED s
inner join a2 fl on s.setl_id = fl.setl_id

{"case_id": "38", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：该查询在 HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(B) 上有多重等值过滤（BU_ID、HAC_ID、KEY_STATION_ID 列和 MFG_PROCESS_ID、DEL_FLAG），并且在主表 P 上按 WORK_DATE 与 DEL_FLAG 进行筛选，同时包含一个关联的 EXISTS 子查询来确认员工在对应站点的有效执照记录。潜在性能问题包括：1) 如果用于比较的列与字面量类型不匹配（例如 WORK_DATE 字段若为 VARCHAR 则与 DATE 常量比较会发生隐式类型转换），会导致索引失效；2) 缺少覆盖这些谓词和关联列的复合索引，会使得优化器采用全表扫描或大量回表，增加 I/O；3) EXISTS 子查询使用逗号分隔的老式连接写法（F, H）且为相关子查询，会导致对每一行执行索引查找/范围扫描，若 H/F 没有在 (EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID) 与 (LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID) 上建立合适索引，会产生大量随机 I/O。建议：确认 WORK_DATE/相关列数据类型与谓词匹配以避免隐式转换；为 B 表建立复合索引覆盖 (BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG) 或拆分为多个选择性索引；为 P 表建立 (WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO) 索引以支持主谓词和后续关联；为 R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T 与 R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T 分别建立针对 (EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG) 与 (LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID, DEL_FLAG) 的索引；将 EXISTS 子查询改写为显式 JOIN 或至少使用关联索引以减少对每行的重复查找。同时建议将高选择性谓词（如 P.DEL_FLAG=0、B.DEL_FLAG=0、B.BU_ID 等）尽量作为最先评估的过滤条件，降低后续关联数据量。", "difficulty_level": "2", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_NAME_ENG VARCHAR2(200), BU_ID NUMBER, HAC_ID NUMBER, KEY_STATION_ID NUMBER, MFG_PROCESS_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL ON HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, WORK_DATE DATE, DEL_FLAG NUMBER, HWT_TYPE_ID NUMBER, LINE_ID NUMBER, STATION_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T(WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, LICENSE_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50), LOSE_FLAG NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T(EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG);", "CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T (LICENSE_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_STATION ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T(LICENSE_ID, STATION_ID, DEL_FLAG);"], "sql": "SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID,   --班別ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (P.HWT_TYPE_ID) SHIFT,   --班別
  B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID,   --機種ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME,  --機種名稱
  P.LINE_ID,  --線體ID
  GET_LOCATION_INFO (P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME,  --線體名稱
  P.STATION_ID,  --工站ID
  B.STATION_NAME_ENG,   --工站名稱
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.KEY_STATION_ID) KEY_STATION_TYPE,  --工站類型
  P.EMP_NO
  --,P.CONFIRM_FLAG, --確認狀態
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P
  -- 使用INNER,以便只要 同時符合預排配和工站基礎資訊的
  INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B
  ON  P.STATION_ID = B.ID
  AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND B.BU_ID = 245346  --iPad
  AND B.HAC_ID = 7137  --CD
  AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131)   --K/K+/K++
  AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185  --製程為Mainline
   WHERE  P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04'
  AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0
  -- 確認該員工有對應的「有效執照+在職」鑰匙站記錄（仍需站點一致）
  AND EXISTS
   (SELECT 1
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F,
  HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H
   WHERE  H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID
  AND H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO
  AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078
  AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT	120	200	16000	8000	40
1	  NESTED LOOPS	120	200	16000	8000	40
2	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL	10	200	8000	1000	5
3	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID C_BASE_STATION_T	30	200	8000	2000	10
4	   INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE	20	200	2000	1000	5
5	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T	70	200	8000	5000	20
6	   FILTER (P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04' AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0)	---	---	---	---	---
7	   NESTED LOOPS (correlated) -- EXISTS subquery	20	200	4000	2000	5
8	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE (H)	2	1	40	10	1
9	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T	5	1	40	20	1

case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_NAME_ENG VARCHAR2(200), BU_ID NUMBER, HAC_ID NUMBER, KEY_STATION_ID NUMBER, MFG_PROCESS_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);
CREATE INDEX IDX_C_BASE_STATION_BU_HAC_KEY_PROC_DEL ON HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T(BU_ID, HAC_ID, KEY_STATION_ID, MFG_PROCESS_ID, DEL_FLAG);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, WORK_DATE DATE, DEL_FLAG NUMBER, HWT_TYPE_ID NUMBER, LINE_ID NUMBER, STATION_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50));
CREATE INDEX IDX_R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_WORKDATE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T(WORK_DATE, DEL_FLAG, STATION_ID, EMP_NO);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T (ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, LICENSE_ID NUMBER, EMP_NO VARCHAR2(50), LOSE_FLAG NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);
CREATE INDEX IDX_R_KEY_STATION_MAN_EMP_LICENSE ON HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T(EMP_NO, LICENSE_ID, LOSE_FLAG, DEL_FLAG);
CREATE TABLE HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T (LICENSE_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_ID NUMBER, DEL_FLAG NUMBER);

## Original SQL:
SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID,   --班別ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (P.HWT_TYPE_ID) SHIFT,   --班別
  B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID,   --機種ID
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME,  --機種名稱
  P.LINE_ID,  --線體ID
  GET_LOCATION_INFO (P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME,  --線體名稱
  P.STATION_ID,  --工站ID
  B.STATION_NAME_ENG,   --工站名稱
  HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC (B.KEY_STATION_ID) KEY_STATION_TYPE,  --工站類型
  P.EMP_NO
  --,P.CONFIRM_FLAG, --確認狀態
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P
  -- 使用INNER,以便只要 同時符合預排配和工站基礎資訊的
  INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B
  ON  P.STATION_ID = B.ID
  AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND B.BU_ID = 245346  --iPad
  AND B.HAC_ID = 7137  --CD
  AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131)   --K/K+/K++
  AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185  --製程為Mainline
   WHERE  P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04'
  AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0
  -- 確認該員工有對應的「有效執照+在職」鑰匙站記錄（仍需站點一致）
  AND EXISTS
   (SELECT 1
  FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F,
  HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H
   WHERE  H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID
  AND H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO
  AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078
  AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0
  AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)

## Optimized SQL:

model_answer.optimized_sql: SELECT P.HWT_TYPE_ID, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(P.HWT_TYPE_ID) AS SHIFT, B.FAMILY_ID AS MODEL_ID, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(B.FAMILY_ID) AS MODEL_NAME, P.LINE_ID, GET_LOCATION_INFO(P.LINE_ID, '1') AS LINE_NAME, P.STATION_ID, B.STATION_NAME_ENG, HRM_EMP.GET_ID_TO_DESC(B.KEY_STATION_ID) AS KEY_STATION_TYPE, P.EMP_NO FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_EMP_STATION_PLAN_T P INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.C_BASE_STATION_T B ON P.STATION_ID = B.ID AND B.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND B.BU_ID = 245346 AND B.HAC_ID = 7137 AND B.KEY_STATION_ID IN (4976, 8877, 38131) AND B.MFG_PROCESS_ID = 140185 WHERE P.WORK_DATE = DATE '2025-08-04' AND P.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_LICENSE_T F INNER JOIN HRM_FLOOR.R_KEY_STATION_MAN_T H ON H.LICENSE_ID = F.LICENSE_ID WHERE H.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO AND H.LOSE_FLAG = 10078 AND H.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND F.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND F.STATION_ID = P.STATION_ID)

case_datas.case_content:
{"case_id": "39", "db_type": "sqlserver", "description": "问题概述：原始查询包含一个全表聚合 + 窗口函数的 CTE（rank_general），多个 LEFT JOIN 与一个 CROSS JOIN(me 子查询)，以及对 otr.otr_consulta 的行级展开 (CROSS APPLY (VALUES ...)) 再做 GROUP BY。性能瓶颈可能来自几处：
1) rank_general 需要对 flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago 做 GROUP BY 并按 SUM 排序再计算 ROW_NUMBER，若无合适索引/预聚合会导致全表扫描与昂贵的排序；
2) me 使用常量筛选但被 CROSS JOIN 到主查，若 me 返回多行会乘扩大外层行数；即使 me 仅返回一行，保留未被外层使用的列会造成不必要的数据传递（可用投影下推移除 proveedor 与 estilo）；
3) otr 子查询对 otr.otr_consulta 做了 VALUES 展开后 GROUP BY，若不把高选择性谓词（c.tienda = 3064）下推，会扫描大量无关行并产生大规模聚合中间结果；
4) 多个 LEFT JOIN（例如 ranking_tda_jerarquia、control_asignacion_matrices）若缺乏覆盖索引，会引发大量回表和随机 I/O。

建议（与实习生给出的规则一致）：
- 进行投影下推：在 me 子查询中移除未被外层用到的列（如 proveedor、estilo），减少中间结果宽度；
- 进行谓词下推：把高选择性条件 c.tienda = 3064 下推至 otr 的扫描/聚合子查询（即 WHERE oc.id_tienda = 3064），显著降低 otr 聚合量；
- 检查并建立必要索引：例如 otr.otr_consulta 上应有 (id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, id_subclase, tipo_articulo) 的复合索引或至少 id_tienda 的索引；catalogos.maestro_estilos 可在 (proveedor, estilo) 建索引；catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia 在 (id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase) 上建索引；clusters.tienda_atributos 在 (centro_comercial, clima, tienda) 建复合/前缀索引；catalogos.tiendas 在 TIENDA 列建主键/索引。 
- 对 rank_general 的全表排序开销敏感时，考虑离线物化/周期维护排名表或限制计算范围（若业务允许）。

在满足语义前提下（确保移除的列确实不被外层引用，且 c.tienda 为强选择性过滤），方式1 的投影与谓词下推是低风险且立即见效的改进；方式2（更激进的提前过滤/LEFT→INNER 等）若要采用需严格验证不会改变结果。", "difficulty_level": "1", "create_table_statements": ["CREATE TABLE catalogos.tiendas (TIENDA INT PRIMARY KEY, nombre NVARCHAR(200), tipo CHAR(1), estatus CHAR(1), marca INT, ciudad NVARCHAR(100), estado NVARCHAR(100), m2 DECIMAL(10,2));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_TIPO_MARCA ON catalogos.tiendas(tipo, estatus, marca);", "CREATE TABLE flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, TIENDA INT, MERCANCIASINIVA DECIMAL(18,4), FECHA DATETIME);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_VETAS_TIENDA ON flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago(TIENDA);", "CREATE TABLE clusters.tienda_atributos (tienda INT PRIMARY KEY, centro_comercial INT, clima NVARCHAR(200));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_ATR_CENTRO_CLIMA ON clusters.tienda_atributos(centro_comercial, clima, tienda);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.maestro_estilos (departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, proveedor INT, estilo NVARCHAR(100), tipo_articulo INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_MAESTRO_ESTILOS_PROV_ESTILO ON catalogos.maestro_estilos(proveedor, estilo);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia (id_tienda INT, departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, ranking INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_RJ_IDTIENDA_DEPT ON catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia(id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase);", "CREATE TABLE catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices (clasificacion INT, matrices_min INT);", "CREATE INDEX IDX_CAM_CLASIFICACION ON catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices(clasificacion);", "CREATE TABLE otr.otr_consulta (id_tienda INT, id_departamento INT, id_subdepartamento INT, id_clase INT, id_subclase INT, tipo_articulo INT, mes1_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes2_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes3_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes4_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes5_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes6_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes7_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes8_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes9_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes10_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes11_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes12_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_OTR_ID_TIENDA_FULL ON otr.otr_consulta(id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, id_subclase, tipo_articulo);", "CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_supervisores AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例", "CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_regionales AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例"], "sql": ";WITH rank_general AS (
  SELECT 
  ta.TIENDA AS id,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
  ORDER BY SUM(v.MERCANCIASINIVA) DESC
  ) AS actual_rank_global
  FROM catalogos.tiendas ta
  LEFT JOIN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago v ON v.TIENDA = ta.TIENDA
  WHERE ta.tipo = 'S' AND estatus = 'A' AND ta.marca = 30
  GROUP BY ta.TIENDA
) 
SELECT 
  rg.actual_rank_global   
  ,t.nombre
  ,vw_r.nombre as regional
  ,vw_s.nombre as supervisor
  ,t.estado
  ,'RUTA' as ruta  ----
  ,t.m2 as tienda_m2
  ,'TAMAÑO' as tamanio   ----
  ,rj.ranking as rank_jerarquia_n4
  ,t.ciudad
  ,cam.matrices_min as propuesta
  ,otr.abierto_otr as abierto_otr
  ,c.* 
FROM clusters.tienda_atributos c
LEFT JOIN catalogos.tiendas t ON c.tienda = t.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_supervisores vw_s ON c.tienda = vw_s.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_regionales vw_r ON c.tienda = vw_r.tienda
LEFT JOIN rank_general rg ON c.tienda = rg.id
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase, proveedor, estilo, tipo_articulo
  FROM catalogos.maestro_estilos me
  WHERE me.proveedor = 1162 AND me.estilo = 'C21031101'
) me
LEFT JOIN catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia rj 
  ON c.tienda = rj.id_tienda
  AND rj.departamento = me.departamento
  AND rj.subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND rj.clase = me.clase
  AND rj.subclase = me.subclase
LEFT JOIN catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices cam
  ON rj.ranking = cam.clasificacion
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo,
  SUM(CASE WHEN n >= MONTH(GETDATE()) THEN ISNULL(val, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS abierto_otr
  FROM otr.otr_consulta oc
  CROSS APPLY (VALUES
  (1,  oc.mes1_compra_adicional),
  (2,  oc.mes2_compra_adicional),
  (3,  oc.mes3_compra_adicional),
  (4,  oc.mes4_compra_adicional),
  (5,  oc.mes5_compra_adicional),
  (6,  oc.mes6_compra_adicional),
  (7,  oc.mes7_compra_adicional),
  (8,  oc.mes8_compra_adicional),
  (9,  oc.mes9_compra_adicional),
  (10, oc.mes10_compra_adicional),
  (11, oc.mes11_compra_adicional),
  (12, oc.mes12_compra_adicional)
  ) m(n, val)
  GROUP BY
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo
) otr
  ON  otr.id_tienda = c.tienda
  AND otr.id_departamento = me.departamento
  AND otr.id_subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND otr.id_clase = me.clase
  AND otr.id_subclase = me.subclase
  AND otr.tipo_articulo = me.tipo_articulo
WHERE 1=1  AND c.centro_comercial = 1 AND c.clima LIKE '%calor todo el tiempo%' AND c.tienda = 3064", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT	15200	10000	1200000	452000	14800
1	  MERGE JOIN	15200	10000	1200000	452000	14800
2	   HASH AGGREGATE (rank_general: SUM + SORT for ROW_NUMBER)	9200	10000	600000	300000	9000
3	  TABLE SCAN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago	4800	10000	480000	240000	4800
4	   INDEX SEEK catalogos.tiendas (type/estatus/marca filter)	200	5000	80000	20000	200
5	   SORT	3000	10000	200000	80000	3000
6	   HASH MATCH (left outer join rj/cam/others)	2400	5000	300000	100000	2400
7	  VIEW (me CROSS JOIN) -- expands outer rows when me has >1 row	50	10	800	500	50
8	  HASH AGGREGATE (otr subquery grouping)	6800	8000	400000	160000	6800
9	   TABLE SCAN otr.otr_consulta	6600	8000	380000	150000	6600
10	  CROSS APPLY (VALUES ...) expansion per row	---	---	---	---	---
11	   NESTED LOOPS (apply joins to clusters.tienda_atributos filtered by centro_comercial/clima/tiena)	1200	1	160	600	120
12	  INDEX SEEK IDX_TIENDA_ATR_CENTRO_CLIMA ON clusters.tienda_atributos (centro_comercial,clima,tienda)	10	1	80	20	5
13	  TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID catalogos.tiendas / vw_supervisores / vw_regionales	300	1	320	100	30
14	  FILTER (c.centro_comercial = 1 AND c.clima LIKE '%calor todo el tiempo%' AND c.tienda = 3064)	---	---	---	---	---"}
case_datas.mode_question:
You are a database expert in SQL performance optimization.
Given the table definitions, explain output and the original SQL, apply appropriate optimizations.
Output only the optimized SQL as a single-line statement with no markdown or extra text.

## Table Definitions:
CREATE TABLE catalogos.tiendas (TIENDA INT PRIMARY KEY, nombre NVARCHAR(200), tipo CHAR(1), estatus CHAR(1), marca INT, ciudad NVARCHAR(100), estado NVARCHAR(100), m2 DECIMAL(10,2));
CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_TIPO_MARCA ON catalogos.tiendas(tipo, estatus, marca);
CREATE TABLE flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, TIENDA INT, MERCANCIASINIVA DECIMAL(18,4), FECHA DATETIME);
CREATE INDEX IDX_VETAS_TIENDA ON flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago(TIENDA);
CREATE TABLE clusters.tienda_atributos (tienda INT PRIMARY KEY, centro_comercial INT, clima NVARCHAR(200));
CREATE INDEX IDX_TIENDA_ATR_CENTRO_CLIMA ON clusters.tienda_atributos(centro_comercial, clima, tienda);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.maestro_estilos (departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, proveedor INT, estilo NVARCHAR(100), tipo_articulo INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_MAESTRO_ESTILOS_PROV_ESTILO ON catalogos.maestro_estilos(proveedor, estilo);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia (id_tienda INT, departamento INT, subdepartamento INT, clase INT, subclase INT, ranking INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_RJ_IDTIENDA_DEPT ON catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia(id_tienda, departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase);
CREATE TABLE catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices (clasificacion INT, matrices_min INT);
CREATE INDEX IDX_CAM_CLASIFICACION ON catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices(clasificacion);
CREATE TABLE otr.otr_consulta (id_tienda INT, id_departamento INT, id_subdepartamento INT, id_clase INT, id_subclase INT, tipo_articulo INT, mes1_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes2_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes3_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes4_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes5_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes6_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes7_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes8_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes9_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes10_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes11_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4), mes12_compra_adicional DECIMAL(18,4));
CREATE INDEX IDX_OTR_ID_TIENDA_FULL ON otr.otr_consulta(id_tienda, id_departamento, id_subdepartamento, id_clase, id_subclase, tipo_articulo);
CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_supervisores AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例
CREATE VIEW catalogos.vw_regionales AS SELECT tienda, nombre FROM catalogos.tiendas; -- 简化示例

## Explain Output in JSON:

4	   INDEX SEEK catalogos.tiendas (type/estatus/marca filter)	200	5000	80000	20000	200

7	  VIEW (me CROSS JOIN) -- expands outer rows when me has >1 row	50	10	800	500	50
8	  HASH AGGREGATE (otr subquery grouping)	6800	8000	400000	160000	6800

## Original SQL:
;WITH rank_general AS (
  SELECT 
  ta.TIENDA AS id,
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
  ORDER BY SUM(v.MERCANCIASINIVA) DESC
  ) AS actual_rank_global
  FROM catalogos.tiendas ta
  LEFT JOIN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago v ON v.TIENDA = ta.TIENDA
  WHERE ta.tipo = 'S' AND estatus = 'A' AND ta.marca = 30
  GROUP BY ta.TIENDA
) 
SELECT 
  rg.actual_rank_global   
  ,t.nombre
  ,vw_r.nombre as regional
  ,vw_s.nombre as supervisor
  ,t.estado
  ,'RUTA' as ruta  ----
  ,t.m2 as tienda_m2
  ,'TAMAÑO' as tamanio   ----
  ,rj.ranking as rank_jerarquia_n4
  ,t.ciudad
  ,cam.matrices_min as propuesta
  ,otr.abierto_otr as abierto_otr
  ,c.* 
FROM clusters.tienda_atributos c
LEFT JOIN catalogos.tiendas t ON c.tienda = t.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_supervisores vw_s ON c.tienda = vw_s.tienda
LEFT JOIN catalogos.vw_regionales vw_r ON c.tienda = vw_r.tienda
LEFT JOIN rank_general rg ON c.tienda = rg.id
CROSS JOIN (
  SELECT departamento, subdepartamento, clase, subclase, proveedor, estilo, tipo_articulo
  FROM catalogos.maestro_estilos me
  WHERE me.proveedor = 1162 AND me.estilo = 'C21031101'
) me
LEFT JOIN catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia rj 
  ON c.tienda = rj.id_tienda
  AND rj.departamento = me.departamento
  AND rj.subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND rj.clase = me.clase
  AND rj.subclase = me.subclase
LEFT JOIN catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices cam
  ON rj.ranking = cam.clasificacion
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo,
  SUM(CASE WHEN n >= MONTH(GETDATE()) THEN ISNULL(val, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS abierto_otr
  FROM otr.otr_consulta oc
  CROSS APPLY (VALUES
  (1,  oc.mes1_compra_adicional),
  (2,  oc.mes2_compra_adicional),
  (3,  oc.mes3_compra_adicional),
  (4,  oc.mes4_compra_adicional),
  (5,  oc.mes5_compra_adicional),
  (6,  oc.mes6_compra_adicional),
  (7,  oc.mes7_compra_adicional),
  (8,  oc.mes8_compra_adicional),
  (9,  oc.mes9_compra_adicional),
  (10, oc.mes10_compra_adicional),
  (11, oc.mes11_compra_adicional),
  (12, oc.mes12_compra_adicional)
  ) m(n, val)
  GROUP BY
  oc.id_tienda,
  oc.id_departamento,
  oc.id_subdepartamento,
  oc.id_clase,
  oc.id_subclase,
  oc.tipo_articulo
) otr
  ON  otr.id_tienda = c.tienda
  AND otr.id_departamento = me.departamento
  AND otr.id_subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento
  AND otr.id_clase = me.clase
  AND otr.id_subclase = me.subclase
  AND otr.tipo_articulo = me.tipo_articulo
WHERE 1=1  AND c.centro_comercial = 1 AND c.clima LIKE '%calor todo el tiempo%' AND c.tienda = 3064

model_answer.optimized_query: WITH rank_general AS ( SELECT ta.TIENDA AS id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(v.MERCANCIASINIVA) DESC) AS actual_rank_global FROM catalogos.tiendas ta LEFT JOIN flashdeventas.vetas_y_formas_de_pago v ON v.TIENDA = ta.TIENDA WHERE ta.tipo = 'S' AND ta.estatus = 'A' AND ta.marca = 30 GROUP BY ta.TIENDA ) SELECT rg.actual_rank_global, t.nombre, vw_r.nombre AS regional, vw_s.nombre AS supervisor, t.estado, 'RUTA' AS ruta, t.m2 AS tienda_m2, 'TAMAÑO' AS tamanio, rj.ranking AS rank_jerarquia_n4, t.ciudad, cam.matrices_min AS propuesta, otr.abierto_otr AS abierto_otr, c.* FROM clusters.tienda_atributos c INNER JOIN catalogos.tiendas t ON c.tienda = t.tienda INNER JOIN catalogos.tiendas vw_r ON c.tienda = vw_r.tienda INNER JOIN catalogos.tiendas vw_s ON c.tienda = vw_s.tienda LEFT JOIN catalogos.maestro_estilos me ON me.proveedor = 1162 AND me.estilo = 'C21031101' LEFT JOIN rank_general rg ON c.tienda = rg.id LEFT JOIN catalogos.ranking_tda_jerarquia rj ON c.tienda = rj.id_tienda AND rj.departamento = me.departamento AND rj.subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento AND rj.clase = me.clase AND rj.subclase = me.subclase LEFT JOIN catalogos.control_asignacion_matrices cam ON rj.ranking = cam.clasificacion LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oc.id_tienda, oc.id_departamento, oc.id_subdepartamento, oc.id_clase, oc.id_subclase, oc.tipo_articulo, SUM(CASE WHEN n >= MONTH(GETDATE()) THEN ISNULL(val, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS abierto_otr FROM otr.otr_consulta oc CROSS APPLY (VALUES (1, oc.mes1_compra_adicional), (2, oc.mes2_compra_adicional), (3, oc.mes3_compra_adicional), (4, oc.mes4_compra_adicional), (5, oc.mes5_compra_adicional), (6, oc.mes6_compra_adicional), (7, oc.mes7_compra_adicional), (8, oc.mes8_compra_adicional), (9, oc.mes9_compra_adicional), (10, oc.mes10_compra_adicional), (11, oc.mes11_compra_adicional), (12, oc.mes12_compra_adicional) ) AS m(n, val) WHERE oc.id_tienda = 3064 GROUP BY oc.id_tienda, oc.id_departamento, oc.id_subdepartamento, oc.id_clase, oc.id_subclase, oc.tipo_articulo ) otr ON otr.id_tienda = c.tienda AND otr.id_departamento = me.departamento AND otr.id_subdepartamento = me.subdepartamento AND otr.id_clase = me.clase AND otr.id_subclase = me.subclase AND otr.tipo_articulo = me.tipo_articulo WHERE c.centro_comercial = 1 AND c.clima LIKE '%calor todo el tiempo%' AND c.tienda = 3064

{"case_id": "40", "db_type": "oracle", "description": "问题概述：此查询包含三层嵌套用于实现基于 ROWNUM 的分页（最内层包含大范围的 SELECT + 多个 LEFT JOIN + 多个标量子查询与函数调用；中间一层再包一层并限制 ROWNUM<=10；最外层再按 rn>0 过滤），导致不必要的视图物化与数据传递开销。主要性能隐患还有：1) 大量标量子查询（例如从 RES_SYS.PUB_MFR、RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE、RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL 等按 ID 查询名称）会对每一行触发独立索引/表访问，开销成倍放大；2) 频繁调用的行级函数（RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA / SF_GET_STAFF_NAME 等）若未缓存，会导致大量 CPU 时间；3) IN 子查询包含 CONNECT BY 的递归层次查询，若不先将其物化为较小集合，会使主表筛选成本增高；4) 宽表 SELECT *（以及许多未必要的列和文本转换）增加了 I/O 与网络传输量。建议：删除最外层冗余的 `where rn > 0` 并把分页逻辑简化；把 `ROWNUM <= 10` 的限制尽量下推或改为 `FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS` / 使用 FIRST_ROWS 优化；将标量子查询改写为 LEFT JOIN（或事先使用单表缓存/物化视图）以避免每行重复访问；为常用的连接/过滤列（ENT_ENTITY.ENTITY_ID、ENT_ROOM.ENTITY_ID、ENT_ENTITY.STATION_CODE、STA_STATION.STATION_CODE/ STATION_ID、STA_APP_INFO.STATION_ID、STA_BIZ_INFO.STATION_CODE、REG_MANAGE.REGION_ID）建立合适索引；对昂贵的行级函数考虑结果缓存或提前物化；对 CONNECT BY 结果先计算并临时表化以减少重复计算。这样可显著减少全表扫描、嵌套循环和重复的随机 I/O。", "difficulty_level": "2", TABLE RES_ENTITY.STA_STATION (STATION_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, STATION_CODE VARCHAR2(50), DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID VARCHAR2(50), DISTRICT_REGION_ID VARCHAR2(50), DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID VARCHAR2(50), VARCHAR2(200), DELETE_STATE VARCHAR2(2));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_REG_MANAGE_REGION_ID ON RES_ENTITY.REG_MANAGE(REGION_ID);", "CREATE TABLE RES_SYS.PUB_MFR (MFR_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY, MFR VARCHAR2(200), DELETE_STATE VARCHAR2(2));", "CREATE INDEX IDX_PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL_ID ON RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL(EQP_MODEL_ID);"], "sql": "select *  from (select t.*,ROWNUM AS rn  from (SELECT

	B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID,

	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_BRAND,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MODEL_DC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_DC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_MODEL,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_AC_NUM_DC_AC,
	B.INTEG_CABINET_SPACE_NUM AS INTEG_CABINET_SPACE_NUM_TEXT,

	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.TIME_TO_OVERDUE) AS TIME_TO_OVERDUE_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE WHERE EQP_TYPE_ID=B.MANUAL_IDENT_RESULT_ID AND DELETE_STATE = '0') AS MANUAL_IDENT_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(B.AGENT_MNT_CONTACT) AS AGENT_MNT_CONTACT_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID = 1 THEN '有' WHEN B.IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID= 0 THEN '无' END AS IS_VR_FULLSCENE_ID_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.AIRBLAST_STYLE = 1 THEN '下送风' WHEN B.AIRBLAST_STYLE= 0 THEN '上送风' END AS AIRBLAST_STYLE_TEXT,
	CASE WHEN B.WNG_STYLE = 1 THEN '上走线' WHEN B.WNG_STYLE= 0 THEN '下走线' END AS WNG_STYLE_STYLE_TEXT,

	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.AUDIT_FLOW_RESULT_ID) AS AUDIT_FLOW_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.ENT_AUDIT_RESULT_ID) AS ENT_AUDIT_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_OIL_MACH_ROOM) AS IS_OIL_MACH_ROOM_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_HAVE_WALL) AS IS_HAVE_WALL_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.STRUCTURE_ID) AS STRUCTURE_ID_TEXT,

	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.DEGREE_ARRIVAL_ID) AS DEGREE_ARRIVAL_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_ARRIVEL) AS IS_ARRIVEL_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_POWER) AS IS_POWER_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.INOUT_MODE) AS INOUT_MODE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.IS_EXPAND_OIL_ROOM) AS IS_EXPAND_OIL_ROOM_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.SECURITY_ENVIRONMENT_ID) AS SECURITY_ENVIRONMENT_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.WNG_STYLE) AS WNG_STYLE_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(B.ROOM_GRADE_ID) AS ROOM_GRADE_ID_TEXT,

	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.BUSINESS_ID) AS BUSINESS_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SUB_BUSINESS_ID) AS SUB_BUSINESS_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.PROP_ID) AS PROP_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.OLD_PROP_ID) AS OLD_PROP_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.PROPERTY_ID) AS PROPERTY_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.ENTITY_STATE_ID) AS ENTITY_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_LOCKED_ID) AS IS_LOCKED_ID_TEXT,

	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID) AS SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.CHECK_RESULT_ID) AS CHECK_RESULT_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SERVICE_STATE_ID) AS SERVICE_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_MONITOR_ID) AS IS_MONITOR_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.MONITOR_STYLE_ID) AS MONITOR_STYLE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_UPLOAD_PHOTO) AS IS_UPLOAD_PHOTO_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.STORAGE_STATE_ID) AS STORAGE_STATE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.IS_STORAGE) AS IS_STORAGE_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.RES_FROM_PROJBUILDTYPE_ID) AS RES_FROM_PROJBUILDTYPE_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_DESC_CHINA(EE.SPLIT_MERGE_REASON_ID) AS SPLIT_MERGE_REASON_ID_TEXT,
	EE.SOURCE_RES_NO AS SOURCE_RES_NO_TEXT,
	(SELECT ENTITY_NAME FROM res_entity.ent_entity WHERE ENTITY_ID=EE.ROOM_ID and res_type_id='205' and delete_state='0') AS ROOM_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT RES_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_RES_TYPE WHERE RES_TYPE_ID=EE.RES_TYPE_ID and delete_state='0') AS RES_TYPE_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_TYPE FROM RES_SYS.PUB_DIC_EQP_TYPE WHERE EQP_TYPE_ID=EE.DEV_TYPE_ID and delete_state='0') AS DEV_TYPE_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_MODEL FROM RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL WHERE EQP_MODEL_ID=EE.DEV_MODEL_ID and delete_state='0') AS DEV_MODEL_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT EQP_MODEL FROM RES_SYS.PUB_RME_EQP_MODEL WHERE EQP_MODEL_ID=EE.OLD_DEV_MODEL_ID and delete_state='0') AS OLD_DEV_MODEL_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.DW_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS DW_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.OLD_DW_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS OLD_DW_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	(SELECT MFR FROM RES_SYS.PUB_MFR WHERE MFR_ID=EE.MNT_MFR_ID and delete_state='0') AS MNT_MFR_ID_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.MODIFY_OP) AS MODIFY_OP_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.CREATE_OP) AS CREATE_OP_TEXT,
	RES_ENTITY.SF_GET_STAFF_NAME(EE.CHECK_PERSON) AS CHECK_PERSON_TEXT,
	ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID,
	ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID,
	ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID,
	ST.STATION_NAME,
	ST.STATION_NAME AS STATION_ID_TEXT,
	D.APP_REGION_ID,
	(SELECT REGION_NAME FROM res_entity.REG_MANAGE WHERE REGION_ID = D.APP_REGION_ID AND delete_state = '0') AS APP_REGION_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID) AS DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID) AS DISTRICT_REGION_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID) AS DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID_TEXT,
	res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_PROVINCE_ID) || res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_REGION_ID) || res_entity.SF_GET_DISTRICT_NAME(ST.DISTRICT_COUNTY_ID) AS REGION_ID_TEXT 
FROM RES_ENTITY.ENT_ENTITY EE 
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.ENT_ROOM B ON B.ENTITY_ID = EE.ENTITY_ID
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.STA_STATION ST ON ST.STATION_CODE = EE.STATION_CODE  
LEFT JOIN RES_ENTITY.STA_APP_INFO D ON ST.STATION_ID=D.STATION_ID
WHERE EE.DELETE_STATE = '0' AND EE.RES_TYPE_ID=205  
AND EE.STATION_CODE in  (select station_code  from res_entity.sta_biz_info  where  REGION_ID in (  select REGION_ID from res_entity.reg_manage  connect by prior REGION_ID = SUPER_REGION_ID and nvl(delete_state, '0') = '0' start with region_id in ('000102000000000000370100') ) ) 
)t where ROWNUM <= 10) where rn > 0;", "explain": "ID	PLAN_STEP	COST	CARDINALITY	BYTES	CPU_COST	IO_COST
0	SELECT STATEMENT	4200	10	120000	360000	14000
1	  NESTED LOOPS	4200	10	120000	360000	14000

3	  FILTER (EE.DELETE_STATE='0' AND EE.RES_TYPE_ID=205 AND EE.STATION_CODE IN (... CONNECT BY result ...))	---	---	---	---	---

5	  INDEX UNIQUE SCAN IDX_ENT_ROOM_ENTITY_ID (ENT_ROOM)	10	10	800	4000	50
6	   TABLE ACCESS BY INDEX ROWID RES_ENTITY.ENT_ROOM	20	10	800	2000	100
7	  INDEX RANGE SCAN IDX_STA_STATION_STATION_CODE (STA_STATION)	50	10	2000	5000	200
